T11arhebt_u:1298: ity āha -- sā vastutas tadbhāvatā sādhyasya viparyayo vipakṣaḥ tatra,
T11arhebt_u:1302: tasya yā vṛttiḥ pravṛttiḥ bādhakapramāṇavṛttiḥ tatsādhyatvāc ca vastutas tadbhāvatāyāḥ sā bādhakapramāṇavṛttir uktā /
T11arhebt_u:1303: tasyāṃ hi satyāṃ [T. 235b.] vipakṣāṭ nivṛtto hetuḥ sādhyadharmavaty eva dharmiṇi vartata iti sādhyadharmasyānarthāntarasya sādhanadharmasvabhāvatā sidhyati /
T11arhebt_u:1304: tayāca vastutas tadbhāvatayā sādhanadharmabhāvamātrānubandhaḥ sādhyadharmasya sidhyatīti
T11arhebt_u:1305: [S. 47b.] anvayaniścayaḥ `yatra yatra sādhanadharmas tatra sādhyadharmaḥ' ity evaṃ rūpo jāyate /
T11arhebt_u:1306: atrodāharaṇaṃ yathā-- yat sat tat kṣaṇikam eva /
T11arhebt_u:1309: nimittāntaram antareṇa sat ity eva kṛtvā kṣaṇikam ity upadarśanāt /
T11arhebt_u:1310: sa ca vastutas tadbhāvatayā sidhyatīti tatsiddhyupāyaṃ bādhakapramāṇavṛttiṃ darśayati
T11arhebt_u:1311: -- akṣaṇikatve kṣaṇikaviparyaye sati arthakriyāvirodhāt arthasya -- kāryasya kriyā
T11arhebt_u:1312: -- niṣpattis tasyā virodhāt tallakṣaṇaṃ sā 'rthakriyā lakṣaṇaṃ yasya vastutvasya
T11arhebt_u:1316: tad evaṃ vidhaṃ vastutvaṃ hīyate nivartate,
T11arhebt_u:1318: etac ca bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ vyāpakānupalabdhirūpam uttaratrāvasaraprāptaṃ svayam eva vakṣyati /
T11arhebt_u:1319: tadanayā bādhakapramāṇavṛttayā sādhyadharmasya [S. 48a.] vastutaḥ sādhanadharmasvabhāvatā sidhyati /
T11arhebt_u:1326: evaṃ svabhāvahetau [T. 236a] viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā tādātmyasiddhito 'nvayaniścayaṃ pratipādya kāryahetau pratipādayann āha -- kāryahetau anvayaniścayaḥ iti prakṛtam /
T11arhebt_u:1328: tasya yā siddhiḥ pratītiḥ sā kāryahetāv anvayaniścayaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1329: yathā ca kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhir bhavati tathopadarśayann āha -- yathā ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:1331: idaṃ dhūmādikam asya agneḥ upalambhe sati upalabhyata iti sambandhaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1333: na ca kevalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvam asandigdhaṃ sādhayati,
T11arhebt_u:1334: kintu prākpravṛttānupalambhasahāyam iti [S. 48b.] darśāyitum āha -- upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptam anupalabdham iti /
T11arhebt_u:1335: yadi tad dhūmādikam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ satsv anyai(nye)
T11arhebt_u:1337: dṛśyātmakaṃ sat nopalabdhaṃ bhavati agnyādisāmagrīsannidhānāt prāk tādātmyādi(tadagnyādi)
T11arhebt_u:1340: taddeśasannihitam apy anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatayāgnyādisāmagrī sannidhānāt prāganupalabdham iti /
T11arhebt_u:1345: etāvadbhiś ca prakārair atatkāryatā bhavantī bhavet /
T11arhebt_u:1347: na cāgnīndhanādibhāve niyatasannidher adṛśyātmanaḥ kutaścit dhūmasya bhāvaḥ syāt ity āśaṅkanīyam /
T11arhebt_u:1360: punaś codye sa eva parihāro 'navasthā ca /
T11arhebt_u:1362: tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānād eva ca dhūmasya tat[211]kāraṇaṃ kalpeta
T11arhebt_u:1364: tad api tatra kāraṇam astu iti cet; na,
T11arhebt_u:1370: yato dhūmadarśanāt tanniścayena pravṛttau tadvisaṃvādaḥ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:1371: na hi sarvasattvakarmādhipatyajanitatve 'pi jagadvaicitryasya dṛṣṭakāraṇahānitas tatkāryadarśanād vā pravṛttānāṃ atatprāptir ity alam atiprasaṅgena
T11arhebt_u:1372: kiṃ rūpaḥ punar asau kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'nupalambhasahāya pratyakṣanibandhana ity āha -- tadbhāve bhāvaḥtadabhāve 'bhāvaśca iti /
T11arhebt_u:1374: tadabhāve kāraṇatvābhimatasyā 'bhāve abhāva[217] eva kāryatvenābhimatasyābhāvaś ca /
T11arhebt_u:1376: sa hi tābhyām anyo bhavan svabhāvato 'pratipannakāryakāraṇarūpayor vā bhaved,
T11arhebt_u:1383: yato nānyayogas teṣāṃ pūrvarūpaṃ nāśayati vināśahetvayogād vakṣyamāṇakāt /
T11arhebt_u:1385: na hi teṣu niṣpanneṣv aniṣpanno bhinnahetuko vā tatsvabhāvo yuktaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1386: ayaṃ hi bhedo [T. 237b.] bhedahetur vā viruddhadharmādhyāsaḥ kāraṇa bhedaś ca /
T11arhebt_u:1388: anyanimittābhāvāt ekaṃ dravyaṃ viśvaṃ syāt ityādi prasajyeta /
T11arhebt_u:1391: [S. 50b.] tadavasthe eveti na tayor anyayoge 'pi kāryakāraṇarūpatāpattiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1393: tadā svabhāvata eva tayoḥ kāryakāraṇarūpatvād anyas tadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ na vaiyarthyam anubhavet? /
T11arhebt_u:1398: na hi tad arthāntaraṃ svasattāmātreṇa tadbuddhī pravartayati /
T11arhebt_u:1400: na ca viśeṣaṇam agṛhītaṃ [S. 51a.] viśeṣye svaviśiṣṭapratyayanibandhanam ity ayuktā 'syānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatā /
T11arhebt_u:1403: na hi yannimitto yo 'nyatrātadbuddhibhāji tadvyavasāyaḥ sa tadanupalakṣaṇe[221]yuktaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1409: tataś ca kāryakāraṇakāle tasyāsannidhānāt kathaṃ {p. 48.1} kāryakāraṇabuddhihetutā? /
T11arhebt_u:1410: niruddhayor adhyāhṛtya[222]tatpratyayakalpanāyāṃ[223]ca kalpitaviṣaya eva kāryakāraṇatādhyavasāyaḥ syāt na vastuviṣayaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1411: sa ca viśiṣṭabhāvābhāvanibandhano 'bhyupagata eveti kim arthāntarakalpanayā? /
T11arhebt_u:1416: yadā ca kāraṇena janyate tadā kiṃ svakāryasahito janyate,
T11arhebt_u:1421: bhayor anyata eva bhāvāt parasparam asambandha iti kāryasambandhitā 'sya hīyeta / atha
T11arhebt_u:1423: tadā kṣaṇikatayā kāraṇasya tam[226]eva janayitvā dhvaṃsāt kathaṃ svakāryakriyā? /
T11arhebt_u:1425: tasmiṃś cāsati katham akāraṇena kāryakāraṇasambandho janyate? /
T11arhebt_u:1426: atha svakāryaṃ kṛtvā paścāj janyeta tadā 'pi svakāryakāle eva vinaṣṭatvād asatastaduttarakālabhāvikāryakāraṇabhāvajananaṃ kutaḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:1429: [S. 53a.] janyatāyāṃ vā yadi samagrāḥ svarūpata eva tāṃ janayanti kārye ka eṣāṃ śaktivyāghātaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:1433: teṣāṃ ca kāraṇatvam ekaikāpāye kāryavyatirekataḥ samunnīyata ity āha -- satsv apy
T11arhebt_u:1434: anyeṣu tatsāmagryantarggateṣu hetuṣu janakeṣu {p. 49.1} pratyekaṃ teṣāṃ vyañjanakatvād[230]asyābhāve
T11arhebt_u:1435: janakatvena nirddhāryamāṇatayā vivakṣitasyābhāve na bhavati ity anenānupalambhasya viṣaya uktaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1436: pratyakṣavṛttis tu pūrvoktaivā 'nupalambharahitā tadbhāve bhāvagrāhiṇī saṃbandhyate /
T11arhebt_u:1437: tathā cāyam api tadbhāve bhāvaḥ tadabhāve 'bhāvaś ca kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kiṃ sādhanaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:1438: ity āha -- pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanaḥ pratyakṣapūrvako 'nupalambhaḥ tadviviktānyapadārthagrāhipratyakṣātmakaḥ sādhanam asyeti pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanaḥkāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ
T11arhebt_u:1439: yas tv anupalambhasāpekṣeṇa [S. 53b.] pratyakṣeṇa sādhyata iti prāguktaḥ so 'nupalambhapūrvakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ sādhanam asyeti anupalambhapratyakṣasādhana iti vaktavyaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1440: tasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasyānvayavyatirekātmanaḥ siddhiḥ niścayo yathoktābhyāṃ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryahetāv anvayaniścaya iti sambadhyate
T11arhebt_u:1441: nanu cānvayaniścayo nāma kāryahetoḥ sarvatra kāryasya bhavataḥ svakāraṇasattayā 'nugamanam 1ity evam avasāyaḥ tat[231]kathaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhir evā 'sāv[232]ucyate?
T11arhebt_u:1442: ity āśaṅkya kārya[T.239b.]kāraṇabhāvasiddhinibandhanatvād anvayaniścayasya kāraṇe kāryopacārād ananyopāyasādhyatāṃ darśayitum,
T11arhebt_u:1443: darśanamātranibandhanaṃ ye tam icchanti tanmataniṣedhārtham asāv evam ukta iti darśayann
T11arhebt_u:1444: āha -- kāryakāraṇabhāva eva hi kāryakāraṇabhāve saty eva hi yasmāt arthāntarasya
T11arhebt_u:1446: yas tv avyatiriktaḥ [S. 54a.] tasya viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā tādātmyaniścayād evānvayaniścaya iti pūrvam uktam evety arthāntaragrahaṇam
T11arhebt_u:1449: `yatra nāma kvacid dhūmaḥ tatrāvaśyam agniḥ' iti niyamena `agneḥ tatra bhāvaḥ' ity evaṃ rūpo 'nvayaniścayaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1452: {p. 50.1} atha yadi nāma kāryam agner dhūmas tathāpi kim iti yatrāsau tatrāvaśyam
T11arhebt_u:1453: agnir bhavati yataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhinibandhano 'nvayaniścaya ucyata ity āha
T11arhebt_u:1454: -- agneḥbhāve eva sattāyām eva hiḥ yasmāt bhāvaḥ sattā dhūmasya kāryatvam iti /
T11arhebt_u:1455: tasmāt kāryakāraṇabhāve saty eva yathokto 'nvayaniścaya iti /
T11arhebt_u:1456: yadi hi yatra dhūmas tatrāvaśyam agnir na syāt tadā 'gnim antareṇāpy asya bhāvād agnibhāva [S. 54b.] eva bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ kāryatvaṃ hīyeta /
T11arhebt_u:1464: [213] avadhāraṇagarbbham idaṃ vākyam iti tathaiva vyākhyāti
T11arhebt_u:1487: idānīm anupalabdhāv anvayaniścayam āha -- anupalabdhāv api [T. 240a.] na kevalaṃ svabhāvakāryaheto(tvo)
T11arhebt_u:1488: r anvayaniścaya uktaḥ kintv anupalabdhāv apy anvayaniścaya ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:1490: ity āha -- asadavyavahārasya sādhyadharmasya yogyatāyāś ca sādhyatvāt tadyogyatā 'sadvyavahāro 'bhipretaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:1492: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya yā anupalabdhiḥ tadanyopalabdhirūpā tanmātre nimittāntarānapekṣaṇī,
T11arhebt_u:1493: yā vṛttiḥ pravṛttir asadvyavahārasya tasyāḥ sādhanaṃ siddhiḥ anupalabdhāv anvayaniścayaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1494: kutaḥ punar asadvyahārasya tanmātre vṛttir bhavati?
T11arhebt_u:1497: nimittaṃ na bhavatīti [S. 55a.] sādhyate tadā yathoktānupalabdhimātre 'sya vṛttiḥ siddhā bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:1500: satyām api yathoktānupalabdhau nāvaśyam asadvyavahārasya bhāva iti kuto 'nvayaniścayaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:1501: nimittāntarābhāvas tu vistaratovādanyāya ukta iti tata evāvadhāryaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1502: athavā sadvyavahārasya yannimittam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya sattvam tad asadvyavahāranimittād
T11arhebt_u:1503: anyatvāt nimittāntaraṃ tatrānupalabdher abhāva upadarśyate yena pramāṇena tad evam uktam,
T11arhebt_u:1505: sati vastuni tasyā [T. 240b.] asambhavaniścayād anupalabdhāv anvayaniścayaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1507: {p. 51.1} tad evaṃ trayāṇām api hetūnāṃ tathāsvaṃ pramāṇenānvayaviniścaya uktaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1514: samprati trayāṇām api hetūnāṃ svasvapramāṇanibandhanaṃ vyatirekaniścayaṃ pratipādayitukāma
T11arhebt_u:1515: āha -- vyatirekaniścayo 'pi na kevalam anvayaniścayo yathāsvaṃ pramāṇanibandhanas
T11arhebt_u:1516: tayor uktaḥ api tu vyatirekaniścayo 'pi kāryasvabhāvahetvor yathāsvaṃ pramāṇanimitta ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:1519: yāv atadātmaka[tadātmakau hetū kāraṇavyāpakarūpasādhyasya sādhakau] sādhyābhāve cābhāvasiddhis tayoḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1524: kadā punas te 'nupalabdhī sādhike tasya bhavataḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:1525: kāryakāraṇavyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ kāryahetau sādhyābhāve 'bhāvasya
T11arhebt_u:1527: vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ [S. 56a.] [T. 241a.] vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ svabhāvahetau sādhyābhāve 'bhāvasya sādhiketi /
T11arhebt_u:1528: tad evaṃ bruvatā ubhayatra tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇapratibandhaniścayād eva dvayor apy anvayavyatirekayoḥ niścaya iti uktaṃ bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:1532: dṛśyaviṣayābhyāṃ dṛśyo viṣayo yayos te tathokte /
T11arhebt_u:1533: yadi kāraṇavyāpakāv upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptau bhavatas tadā tadanupalabdhī sādhyābhāve 'bhāvaṃ sādhyata iti yāvat /
T11arhebt_u:1535: ity āha -- uddiṣṭaviṣayasya uddiṣṭaḥ -- kathito viṣayaḥ -- ādhāro vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇo yasya sādhyābhāve 'bhāvasya tasyopadarśane kriyamāṇe
T11arhebt_u:1540: tadā 'nupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptau tatra kāraṇavyāpakāv api bhavata iti anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya
T11arhebt_u:1541: kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā kvacid viprakṛṣṭe viṣaye sumervādau abhāvāsiddheh
T11arhebt_u:1544: athānuddiṣṭaviṣayasyāpy abhāvasyopadarśane 'nupalabdhyor daśyaviṣayatāviśeṣaṇaṃ kim iti nāpekṣyate?
T11arhebt_u:1545: ity āha -- anuddiṣṭaviṣayam [T. 241b.] anuddiṣṭo viṣayaḥ -- vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntarūpo
T11arhebt_u:1546: yasmin sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvakhyāpane tat pratibandhamātrasiddhau satyāṃ dṛśyaviṣayatāviśeṣaṇam
T11arhebt_u:1547: antareṇāpi yasmāt sidhyati iti tasmāt na tatra anuddiṣṭaviṣaye vyatirekasādhane anupalabdhyor
T11arhebt_u:1549: [S. 57a.] tathā hi -- aśeṣapadārthaparigraheṇa sāmānyenāpi bruvato yo yatra pratibaddhasvabhāvaḥ
T11arhebt_u:1550: tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ sa tadabhāve 'vaśyam eva na bhavatīti niḥsvabhāvatvā 'hetukatvaprasaṅgāt / taduktam -
T11arhebt_u:1555: tatas tatra dṛśyaviṣayatā'pekṣyamāṇānupakārikaiveti na tayā kiñcid iti bhāvaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1556: pratibandhamātrasiddhau ity anena ye pratibandhaṃ hetor na varṇayanti kintv adarśanamātrād eva vyatirekam āhus teṣāṃ tadasambhavaṃ ca darśayati
T11arhebt_u:1557: tathā hi -- asati pratibandhe yadi sarve sādhyavirahiṇo 'rthā dṛśyā bhavanti tadā teṣv anupalabdhasya sādhanasyābhāvaḥ śiṣyet(ta) /
T11arhebt_u:1559: gatvāgatvātu tān deśān yady artho nopalabhyate /
T11arhebt_u:1562: deśādiviprakarṣitayā[235]tv adṛśyatve saty api tatra[236][S. 57b.] hetāv anupalambhamātrasya
T11arhebt_u:1563: sambhavāt sandigdho 'sāv 'śeṣe sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāvalakṣaṇo vyatirekaḥ tathāvidhasyaiva[237]yatra
T11arhebt_u:1564: yatra sādhyābhāvaḥ [T. 242a.] tatra tatra sādhanābhāva iti vīpsāpadābhyām abhidhānāt /
T11arhebt_u:1565: anvayaniścayo[238]'pi prāk pratibandhanibandhana eva varṇitaḥ tatas tenāpi[239]pareṣāṃ darśananibandhanām[240]anvayasiddhim icchatām abhāvo 'syāpi[241]kathita eva,
T11arhebt_u:1566: sarvārthānāṃ hetumatāṃ sādhyadharmavattayā draṣṭum aśakyatvād anumātṛbhiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1567: aśeṣadeśādiviṣayasya ca sādhyānugamasya yatra yatra hetuḥ tatra tatra sādhyam iti vīpsayā pratipādanāt /
T11arhebt_u:1568: na ca katipayadeśādau sādhanadharmasya sādhyadharmeṇa sahabhāvasya bhūyo darśane 'pi vyāptiḥ sidhyati,
T11arhebt_u:1569: asati pratibandhe kvacid bahulaṃ tathādṛṣṭānām apy anyathā tv asyāpi sambhavāt,
T11arhebt_u:1571: [235] nanu yo 'pi na dṛśyās teṣv adarśanam asti,
T11arhebt_u:1572: ato 'darśanād eva sarvatra vyatirekaniścayaḥ ity āha
T11arhebt_u:1581: anupalabdhim adhikṛtyādhunā ''ha -- vyatirekaniścayo 'nupalabdhau ucyata iti śeṣaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1585: yo 'bhāvaḥ sato yadgrāhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tadbhāvalakṣaṇas tasya darśanaṃ darśyate --
T11arhebt_u:1586: pratyāyyate 'neneti darśanam upadarśakaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadātmako 'nupalabdhau vyatirekaniścayaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1588: yadi hi sannihitānyopalambhapratyayo dṛśyasvabhāvo bhāvo vidyamāno 'pi nopalabhyeta katham asau {p. 54.1} [T. 242b.] dṛśyasvabhāvaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:1589: yo hi satsv anyeṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavati sa eva dṛśyasvabhāva ākhyāyate /
T11arhebt_u:1594: prayogaḥ -- yad yanmātranimittaṃ tat [S. 58b.] tasmin sati niyamena bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:1596: yathoktopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatāmātranimittaṃ ca sati vastuni tathāvidhe pratyakṣam iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1601: sa ca kāryasvabhāvahetvor upadarśita eveti pṛthag noktaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:1602: tathā hi -- kāraṇavyāpakayor abhāvaḥ kāryavyāpyābhāvābhyām avaśyam anvitaḥ kāryavyāpyābhāvavyatireke ca tadbhāvalakṣaṇe 'vaśyaṃ[247]vyatiricyate[248]kāraṇavyāpakayor bhāvāt /

T11arhebt_u:1735: [T. 246a.] kalpayitvā 'pi vastv ātmana evārthakriyānibandhanatayā tadarthibhiḥ cintyatvāt / taduktam --

T11arhebt_u:2167: vaidharmye ca sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvaḥ śabdād avagamyate,

T11arhebt_u:2171: yadi sādharmyaprayoge tadbhāvo nākṣipyeta tadā sādhanasya atatsvabhāvasya bhāve kim iti ekāntena avaśyan tayā sādhyasya bhāvaḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:2173: `yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam' ity ekāntabhāvaś ca hetau sati sādhyasya vyāptyā sādharmyaprayoge 'bhidhīyate /
T11arhebt_u:2174: sa[296]ca tādātmyam antareṇānarthāntarasya na sambhavatīti sāmarthyāt tadākṣipati /
T11arhebt_u:2175: katham ivātatsvabhāvasya bhāve na ekāntenānyabhāva iti āha -- kṛtakatvety ādi /
T11arhebt_u:2176: yadi prayatnānantarīyakatvām antareṇāpi kṛtakatvasya bhāvād atatsvabhāvatvam anityatve[297]'py ayam eva vṛttāntaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2177: tataś ca tādātmyavirahāt prayatnānantarīyakatvasyānityatvenānvayo na syāt,
T11arhebt_u:2180: tatra ca tādātmyasadbhāvād anvayavyatirekāv anivāritau anityatvakṛtakatvamātrāpekṣayā[304][T. 257a.] tu tādātmyaviraho 'syābhihita[305]iti /
T11arhebt_u:2181: nanv agninivṛttāv atatsvabhāvasyāpi dhūmasya nivṛttir dṛṣṭā 'nvayaś cety āha -- kāryasya iti /
T11arhebt_u:2185: tatrārthāntarasya dhūmasyāgnau tadutpattilakṣaṇaḥpratibando 'nvayavyatirekanimittam astīti bhavetāṃ tau[306]/
T11arhebt_u:2186: yatra tv anarthāntarasya tāv ucyete tatrāvaśyaṃ tādātmyena bhavitavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2187: atrodāharaṇam yathā-- anayor eva kṛtakatvaprayatnānantarīyakatvayor viparyayeṇa naikanivṛttāv[307]
T11arhebt_u:2188: anyanivṛttiḥ[308]-- `yat prayatnānantarīyakaṃ na bhavati [S. 78b.] tat kṛtakam api
T11arhebt_u:2190: yata evaṃ tasmād anvayavyatirekayor yathālakṣaṇaṃ hetubhāve sādhyasyāvaśyaṃ bhāvaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:2191: sādhyābhāve ca hetor avaśyam abhāvaḥ ity eko 'pi sādharmyamukheṇa vaidharmyamukheṇa vā prayukto dvitīyam ākṣipati,
T11arhebt_u:2194: to 'parasyārthata iti sambandhavacane 'pi prayoga eva vidhimukhena pratiṣedhamukhena vā bhidyate nārtha iti siddhiṃ tatas tasya dvidhā prayogaḥ sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca /
T11arhebt_u:2197: sarvo hetur anvayavyatireky eva vastuto na kaścid anvayī vyatirekī vā nāmety etad
T11arhebt_u:2198: upasaṃharann āha -- iti naikatrānvayamukhena vyatirekamukheṇa [S. 79a.] vā sādhanavākye
T11arhebt_u:2199: dvayor anvayavyatirekayoḥ prayogaḥ sākṣāc chabdena pratipādanam iṣyate,
T11arhebt_u:2201: {p. 75.1} tām evārthato 'parasya pratītiṃ sphuṭayann āha -- tatsvabhāvatayā ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:2202: yadi tatsvabhāvatayā sādhyena hetor anvayaḥ sidhyati tata eva tadabhāve 'bhāvo 'pi sidhyaty eva /
T11arhebt_u:2204: tathā tatsvabhāvatayā sādhyābhāve sādhanasyābhāva{1}siddhau {2}ca satyāṃ tata eva sādhyena hetoḥ anvayasyāpi siddher iti /
T11arhebt_u:2205: yais tu vyākhyāyate -- sādharmyavati[312]prayoge tadabhāva eva vipakṣe hetor abhāvakhyātir
T11arhebt_u:2206: yathā syāt nānyatra vipakṣe viruddhe vā hetvabhāvaprasaṅgāt viruddhata[313]eva vyavacchedaprasaṅāc
T11arhebt_u:2209: kutaḥ? anyaviruddhayor api na kevalaṃ tadabhāvasya vipakṣatvāt yasya hi -- anya eva vipakṣo 'nyadharmayogī vā 'nyo,
T11arhebt_u:2215: auṣṇye ca sādhye[317]'gnilakṣaṇasya hetor viruddhād eva śītāt nānuṣṇaśītād apy anyato vyavacchedaprasaṅgāt naikāntenauṣṇyam agnir grasayed iti tasyāyaṃ doṣaḥ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:2216: taṃ pratyācāryeṇoktam[318]-- yady ekasya[319]vipakṣatvam iṣyate tadā tadabhāvasyaiveṣyatām[320],
T11arhebt_u:2219: na tv asmākaṃ[324]trividham api vipakṣam icchatām[325],
T11arhebt_u:2239: [312] vaidharmye tu tadabhāve 'bhāvasya pratītatvān na śaṅkā
T11arhebt_u:2252: [325] yaś ca yujyate etanmadhyāt sa grahīṣyate
T11arhebt_u:2254: yadi svabhāvahetāv anvayavyatirekayoḥ sādhanadharmasya sādhyasvabhāvatā nibandhanam
T11arhebt_u:2255: ity anvayena vyatirekeṇa vā sādharmyavaidharmyavatoḥ {p. 76.1} prayogayor abhidhīyamānena
T11arhebt_u:2257: tadā pramāṇasiddhaiva tatsvabhāvatā tayor nibandhanaṃ [S. 80a.] na śabdamātrataḥ pratīyamānety abhiprāyavān āha -- 15katham idam[326]ityādi
T11arhebt_u:2260: pṛcchataś cāyam abhiprāyaḥ -- iha [T. 258b.] dvividhāḥ santaḥ -- kṛtakāś ca ghaṭādayaḥ akṛtakāś cākāśādayaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2261: tatra ye tāvad akṛtakās te sadakāraṇavat nityam [VaiSū 4.1.1.] iti nityalakṣaṇayogād anityā eva na bhavanti kuta eva kṣaṇikāḥ?
T11arhebt_u:2264: ye 'pi santaḥ kṛtakās teṣām api mudgarādyanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitayā vināśasya sahetukatvāt taddhetvasannidhāv
T11arhebt_u:2266: sya kṣaṇikatvasvabhāvatā na samasty eveti nānvayavyatirekayoḥ sambhava iti /
T11arhebt_u:2271: tad ihāpy[329]astīti kin na tadvyavahāraḥ pravarttyate? iti /
T11arhebt_u:2272: nanu cānvayaniścayaṃ pratipādayatā bādhakapramāṇavṛttivaśāt tatsvabhāvatā pūrvam eva pratipāditā `anvayaniścayo 'pi svabhāvahetau' ityādi vicanāt
T11arhebt_u:2274: satyam, kintupūrvācāryaiḥkṛtakatvasya kṣaṇikatāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ paraiḥ kṛtakānām ante
T11arhebt_u:2276: viparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ tādātmyaprasādhakam uktaṃ tat prasaṅgamukhena[330]kṛtakalakṣaṇasyaiva
T11arhebt_u:2278: arthakriyāvirodhalakṣaṇaṃ[332]tu sarvasya sattvasya iti vastumātreṇa[333]{p. 77.1} prāg uktam api vipañcayituṃ pūrvapakṣopanyāsaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2279: akṛtakalakṣaṇaṃ tu sattvaṃ na sambhavaty eva,
T11arhebt_u:2281: tataḥpūrvācāryair na [S. 81a.] tasyaikāṅgavaikalyād eva sadakāraṇavat nityam [VaiSū 4.1.1.] iti nityatāsambhava
T11arhebt_u:2299: [ § 11. sahetukaṃ vināśaṃ nirasituṃ tasya bhāvasvabhāvatāyāḥ samālocanam /]
T11arhebt_u:2300: tatrapūrvācāryoktaṃ `sarvasya sataḥ kṛtakasyāvaśyamante hetukṛto vināśa iti' yaḥ parair iṣyate taṃ pratyanapekṣatvaṃ kyāpayitum upakramate -- vināśahetvayogād iti /
T11arhebt_u:2302: sa teṣāṃ kṛtakānāṃ satām avaśyam bhāvī vināśaḥ kutaḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:2303: na hy ākasmikaḥ kaścit svabhāvo yukta ity āha -- svabhāvata eva /
T11arhebt_u:2304: bhavaty asmāt kāryam iti bhāvaśabdo hetuvacanaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2307: {2}naiṣāṃ kṛtakalakṣaṇānāṃ satāṃ bhāvānāṃ {1}svahetubhyo niṣpannānāṃ{2}anyataḥ abhighātāder vināśotpattiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2314: yāṃ ca vastugatau na kvacid atra vināśahetoḥ sāmarthyaṃ yujyate /
T11arhebt_u:2315: yato na hi vināśahetur bhāvasyendhanādeḥ svahetubhyaḥ sthirarūpasyotpannasya svabhāvam evāsthirātmatālakṣaṇaṃ karoti /
T11arhebt_u:2322: athavā tritaye samīkṣyamāṇe yat tāvat vināśyaṃ kāṣṭhādi na tatsvabhāvam[340]evāgnisaṃyogādir vināśahetuḥ karoti tasya svahetubhya eva nirvṛtter iti /
T11arhebt_u:2329: kumārilas tu manyate -- nāgnisaṃyogādinā bhāvasvabhāva eva kriyate kintv indhanādeḥ [S. 82a.] pradhvaṃsābhāvaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2330: sa cendhanādirūpavikalam aṅgārādikam uttaraṃ bhāvāntaram eva / taduktam --
T11arhebt_u:2337: tad etatkaumārilaṃ[T. 260a.] darśanam apanudann āha -- nāpi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:2338: yady uttaraṃ kāryātmakaṃ bhāvāntaram eva abhāvas tadā 'gnisaṃyogādayo 'ṅga(ṅgā)
T11arhebt_u:2341: kintu bhāvāntarakaraṇe abhyupagamyamāne 'gnyādīnām indhanādāv avyāpārāt tadavastham evendhanādikam /
T11arhebt_u:2342: tataś ca yathā 'gnisaṃyogāt prāg indhanāder upalabdhiḥ anyā ca tatsādhyā 'rthakriyā tathā 'ṅgārādyutpattāv apy upalabdhyādeḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2344: bhāvarūpatāyāṃ tadutpattāv indhanādīnāṃ [S. 82b.] pradhvas tatvādasatāṃ kathaṃ tathopalabdhyādiprasaṅgaḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:2345: satyam, evaṃ manyate -- sarvasyendhanāder anyasya gavāder api tathābhāvo mā bhūt ity aṅgārādeḥ dhvaṃsavyavasthāyāṃ nibandhanam {p. 79.1} abhidhānīyam
T11arhebt_u:2348: aho vacanakauśalam yato nivṛttes tucchasvabhāvatānaṅgīkaraṇāt tad eva bhāvāntaram aṅgārādikaṃ nivṛttiṃ brūṣe /
T11arhebt_u:2349: tad ayam arthaḥ sampannaḥ -- aṅgārādibhāve 'ṅgārādibhāvād aṅgārādikaṃ dhvaṃsaḥ kāṣṭhāder iti /
T11arhebt_u:2351: agnyādibhyaś ca tadutpādavacanād indhanādyupamarddenāṅgārādi[T. 260b.]bhāvāt asya dhvaṃsarūpateti cet /
T11arhebt_u:2353: yadi nivṛttiḥ sā 'ṅgārādilakṣaṇaiveti na pūrvasmād viśiṣyate /
T11arhebt_u:2355: agnyādibhyas tv aṅgārādijanma ity eva bhadrakam,
T11arhebt_u:2356: anyathā kāṣṭhādes tathopalabdhyādiprasaṅgaḥ kathaṃ na syāt?
T11arhebt_u:2357: api ca -- yadi bhāvāntaraṃ pradhvaṃsābhāvo ya ete 'nupajātavikārāḥ pradīpabuddhyādayo dhvaṃsante teṣāṃ katarad bhāvāntaraṃ pradhvanso(dhvaṃso)
T11arhebt_u:2359: te 'py avyaktatām[342]ātmabhāvaṃ[343]ca vikāram eva dhvaṃsaṃ samālambanta iti cet /
T11arhebt_u:2361: yadi hi śaktirūpatāpattir avyaktatā tadā śakteḥ kāryadarśanonnīyamānarūpatvāt tadabhāve[344]kathaṃ pradīpādayaḥ śaktyātmanā 'vasthitāḥ kalperan[345]?
T11arhebt_u:2365: ātmanaś cāsattvāt kathaṃ tadbhāvo[346]buddhyādīnāṃ [S. 83b.] vikāraḥ pariṇāmaś ca? /
T11arhebt_u:2366: anyatra vihitapratikriyatvāt neha pranyata ity alaṃ prasaṅgena /
T11arhebt_u:2367: syānmatam -- bhāvāntareṇāṅgārādinā ''vṛtatvāt indhanādes tathopalabdhyādayo na bhavantīty ata āha -- nāpi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:2368: svabhāvāntaram anyasyendhanāder āvaraṇam api na {1}yujyeta {2}tadavasthe avicalita[T. 261a.]rūpe tasminn indhanādau satyāvaraṇasyāpi na kevalam anupalabdhyāder ayogāt /
T11arhebt_u:2377: na kevalaṃ bhāvasvabhāvo bhāvāntaraṃ vā vināśahetunā na kriyate bhāvābhāvo 'pi na kriyata ity āha -- nāpi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:2379: abhāvasya vidhinā paryudāsena vivakṣitād bhāvādanyatayā kāryatvopagame kriyamāṇe kim indhanādirūpa evāsau?
T11arhebt_u:2385: sa cāvaśyam agnyādibhāvābhāvānuvidhāyitayā [S. 84a.] tatkāryas tadbhāvavyavahārasyānyatrāpi tannibandhanatvāt / taduktam --
T11arhebt_u:2388: prāg abhūtvābhavan bhāvo hetubhyo jāyate yathā/
T11arhebt_u:2389: bhūtvā'pi na bhavaṃs tadvaddhetubhyo na bhavaty ayam[349] //
T11arhebt_u:2392: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yady anapekṣitabhāvāntarasaṃsarggaś cyutimātram eva tuccharūpaṃ dhvaṃsaḥ tadā tatra kārakavyāpāro naiva sambhavati bhavanadharmiṇy eva tatsambhavāt /
T11arhebt_u:2393: tasyāpy [T. 261b.] abhūtvā bhāvopagamāt kāryatā na virudhyata iti cet / na /
T11arhebt_u:2405: sad iti pratyayā 'viṣayasya kathaṃ bhāvateti cet /
T11arhebt_u:2415: abhāvātmakatayaiva bhavaty asāv iti cet / na /
T11arhebt_u:2417: yato na bhavatīty abhāva ucyate sa kathaṃ bhavatīti vyapadiśyate? /
T11arhebt_u:2418: pratiṣṭhitena kenacid rūpeṇa svajñānātmany apratibhāsanāt na bhāva iti cet /
T11arhebt_u:2420: teṣāṃ jñānaheturūpatayā pratibhāsanāt iti cet / na /
T11arhebt_u:2426: asmākaṃ tv abhāvabuddhayaḥ svavāsanāparipākānvayā nirviṣayā eva /
T11arhebt_u:2427: abhāvasya ca bhavitṛtve kathaṃ paryudāsāt prasajyapratiṣedho bhidyeta /
T11arhebt_u:2435: yadi hi kiñcit kutaścit[353]nivartyeta tadā tadvyatireki[354]saṃspṛśyeta tatparyudāsena /
T11arhebt_u:2437: sarvatra nivṛttir bhavati ity ukte vastvantarasyaiva kasyacit vidhānāt /
T11arhebt_u:2445: pararūpeṇa tu sarvam eva vastvasadātmakam iti nāsya ghaṭādeḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ [T. 262b.] bhavatu vā 'yam abhāvo 'gnyādibhyas tadbhāve kim iti nopalabhyante kāṣṭhādayaḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:2446: tathā hi -- agnyādīnām anyakriyāyāṃ caritārthatvād anivṛttā eva tebhyaḥ {p. 82.1} [S. 85b.] indhanādayaḥ prāgvad upalabhyeran /
T11arhebt_u:2458: sa eva dhvaṃsa indhanāder agnyādijanmā nivṛttiḥ,
T11arhebt_u:2462: yadi cāyaṃ hetumāṃs tadbhedād ātmabhedaṃ kiṃ nānubhavati? /
T11arhebt_u:2463: śāliyavāṅkurādayo 'pi kāraṇabhedād evātmabhedam atyantavilakṣaṇam anubhavanto 'dhyakṣata evāvasīyante /
T11arhebt_u:2464: na tv evam anapekṣitabhāvāntarasaṃsarggaḥ cyutimātralakṣaṇo dhvaṃsaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2466: na hi bhāvaśūnyatāṃ vihāyāparaṃ tatra kiñcid rūpam īksāmahe /
T11arhebt_u:2469: [S. 86a.] tasmād agnyādisaṃyogakāle na tasya kiñcid bhavati na bhavaty eva kevalam ity evopagantuṃ yuktam /
T11arhebt_u:2470: yato nāyaṃ kasyacid [T. 263a.] bhāvena naṣṭo nāma kintu yataḥ svayam asthirarūpatayā bhūtas tato naṣṭo nāma /
T11arhebt_u:2471: tena nāsyā 'bhavanam anyad vā kiñcid bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:2472: tathā ca bhavanadharmaṇaḥ kasyacid abhāvād bhāvaṃ bhavantaṃ kutaścin na karotīti kriyāpratiṣedha evāgnisaṃyogādeḥ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:2473: eva ca sati karttā agnisaṃyogādiḥ na bhavati ity akartur ahetutvam iti tasmān na vināśahetuḥkaścit /
T11arhebt_u:2478: [350] bhāvaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ abhāvasyāpi yadi sāmarthyam asti tadā bhāvatvam atha nāsti tatrāha
T11arhebt_u:2488: tad evāha -- yadi svabhāvato naśvaro naśanaśīlaḥ svātmany anavasthāyī sthātum aśakto yathā sūcyagre sarṣapaḥ tasya na kiñcinnāśakāraṇaiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2491: na hi prakṛty eva sthātum aśakte sūcyagre sarṣape tadasthitaye prayāsaḥ phalavān bhavet /
T11arhebt_u:2492: {p. 83.1} atraiva vyāptim ādarśayati -- yo hi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:2493: na punaḥtadbhāve tatsvabhāvatve janakāt [S. 86b.] hetor {1}hetvantaram apekṣate /
T11arhebt_u:2495: tadātmatāyā hetvantarānapekṣaṇena vyāptiṃ tādātmyasādhakena pramāṇena darśayati --
T11arhebt_u:2496: tadātmano yo yasya svabhāvaḥ tatsvabhāvasya tādātmyābhāve hetvantaram apekṣamāṇasya
T11arhebt_u:2497: svahetor niṣpannasyāpi tatsvabhāvatvābhāve nairātmyasya niḥsvabhāvatāyāḥ prasaṅgāt /
T11arhebt_u:2498: tadvat prakāśādivat na punaḥ paścāt [T. 263b.] tadātmatāyāṃ asthitidharmātmatāyāṃ hetvantaram apekṣata iti pramāṇaphalam /
T11arhebt_u:2505: atra ca parasya vacanāv akāśam āśaṅkyāha -- bījādivat[8.16] ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:2506: syād etat ityādinā etad eva vibhajate kevalāna janayanti iti /
T11arhebt_u:2509: tataś ca na punas tadbhāve hetvantaram apekṣanta ity anekāntaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2510: tadvad bhāvo 'pīndhanādiḥ svahetor naśvarātmā niṣpanno 'pi vināśe vinaśvarātmatāyāṃ syād iti dārṣṭāntikam /
T11arhebt_u:2514: yaś ca kṣityādikam apekṣamāṇo na janayati kuśūlādyavasthaḥ tasya ajanakasya ca atatsvabhāvatvāt aṅkurādijananasvabhāvatvābhāvāt /
T11arhebt_u:2515: tatra tadātmatālakṣaṇo hetuḥ na vartata eveti na tenānekāntaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2517: nanu pratyabhijñāpratyakṣata eva bījādir ekasvabhāvo lakṣyate /
T11arhebt_u:2522: satsamprayogeṇendriyāṇāṃ bhāvataś ca pratyakṣam eva pratyabhijñānam /
T11arhebt_u:2523: na ca pratyakṣād gariṣṭhaṃ pramāṇam asti,
T11arhebt_u:2524: yatas tadviṣayasya bhedasiddhyā bādhām anubhavad apramāṇam etat [S. 87b.] syāt ity
T11arhebt_u:2525: āśaṅkyāha -- `ata eva' janakatvājanakatvād eva viruddhadharmādhyāsāt `tayor avasthayoḥ'
T11arhebt_u:2526: janakājanakāvasthayoḥ bījādeḥ vastubhedaḥ svabhāvabhedo niśceyaḥ adhyavasātavyaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2527: yathā hi śālibījaṃ tadaṅkurajananasvabhāvaṃ tadbhāve śālyaṅkurabhavadarśanāt pratyakṣato 'vagamyate,
T11arhebt_u:2529: pratīyate tathā 'trāpy avasthādvaye śālibījasya tadaṅkuraviviktāviviktāvasthāgrāhipratyakṣabalād eva svāṅkurajanakājanakasvabhāvatā kinna niścīyate?
T11arhebt_u:2530: iṣyata evāvasthayor bhedo 'vasthāvatas tv abheda iti cet / na /
T11arhebt_u:2532: na hi yadanātmarūpavivekena svajñāne na pratibhāsate tasya pratyakṣatā yuktā /
T11arhebt_u:2533: avasthātadvatoḥ svabhāvabhedābhāvāt [S. 88a.] kathaṃ rūpāntareṇa pratibhāsanam? iti cet /
T11arhebt_u:2534: nanv avasthābhyo 'navāptarūpabhedasyāvasthānām ivātmanas tadbhede saty abhedo na saṅgacchate /
T11arhebt_u:2535: [T. 265b.] tataś cāsyāvasthānām ivātmabhedam anubhavataḥ katham avasthātṛtvam? /
T11arhebt_u:2536: avasthābhede 'py abhinnarūpasya tathā vyavasthānāt kathañcidbhedasyāpi bhāvād adoṣa iti cet /
T11arhebt_u:2538: avasthāś cemāḥ' iti bhaṇyate tenāvasthātadvator bhedas tadā bheda eveti `kathañcit' ity andhapadam etat /
T11arhebt_u:2544: tayor api kathañcid bhedābhedāv iti cet /
T11arhebt_u:2545: tayos tarhy avasthātadvad ātmanor bhedavatoḥ kathañcid abhedanimittaṃ rūpāntaram iṣṭaṃ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:2547: anyathā tadekasvabhāvād atyantam abhedād avasthātadvatoḥ 3parasparam atyantaṃ bhedābhedau prasajyeyātām[358]/
T11arhebt_u:2549: tathā 'syāpi tadanyad ity aparimitarūpataivaikaikasya vastunaḥ samāsajyeta /
T11arhebt_u:2552: tasmād avasthārūpavivekenopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalambhād aparimitarūpatāprasaṅgāc ca kathañcid bhedābhedavato 'vasthātur asattvam eva /
T11arhebt_u:2554: [T. 266a.] pratyakṣata evāvagamyanta iti tadekatvādhyava-sāyi pratyabhijñānaṃ tadbādhām[359]anubhavat kathaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt?
T11arhebt_u:2555: , yato bījādīnāṃ aṅkurādijananasvabhāvānām api tadātmatāyāṃ hetvantarāpekṣaṇāt prāktanasya[360]hetor anaikāntikatā bhavet /
T11arhebt_u:2558: tathā hi -- tayoḥ [T. 264a.] janakājanakāvasthayor iti saptamīdvivacanam etat tadā bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:2559: tad ayam artho -- janakāvasthāyām ajanakāvasthāyāṃ ca vastunaḥ dharmilakṣaṇasya bheda svabhāvanānātvam ata eva[HBṬĀ 356,
T11arhebt_u:2563: na ca śakyate vaktum -- avasthā evāṅkurādijananasvabhāvā nāvasthātā iti /
T11arhebt_u:2565: [T. 264b.] tato yad ekarūpatayā pratyabhijñānaṃ bhaveṣu tat pūrvottarakālayor janakājanakasvabhāvabhedavyavasthāpakapratyakṣanibandhanām anubhavadbādhāṃ katham iva pramāṇaṃ syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:2566: tatpratibhāsinaś cābhinnarūpasyālīkatve 'kṣasamudbhavām api vṛttim anubhavato 'sya satsamprayogajatvābhāvāt taimirikādidhiyām iva kutaḥ pratyakṣatā?
T11arhebt_u:2567: na {p. 86.1} cārthakriyānibandhanaṃ rūpama-pāsya bījāder aparaḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvo 'sti,
T11arhebt_u:2570: tasmāt sadṛśāparabhāvanibandhana evāyaṃ keśakadalīstambādiṣv ivākārasāmyatāmātrāpahṛtahṛdayānāṃ bhrānta [S. 89b.] eva tattvādhyavasāyo mantavyaḥ
T11arhebt_u:2572: bālānām / yadā tu vidhurapratyayopanipātād visadṛśāparabhāvaprasavaḥ tadā 'sya tattvādhyavasāyī pratyabhijñāpratyayo na bhūtim avalambate /
T11arhebt_u:2575: arthajñānādilakṣaṇāṃ vā 'rthakriyāṃ kurvanti nāpara iti vipañcitaṃpramāṇavārtika
T11arhebt_u:2578: [356] In Tib. this passage -anupalabdhyā to tayoḥ (p. 85. line 15)
T11arhebt_u:2586: [ § 17. anumānenāpi pratyabhijñāyā bādhāt na tataḥ sthirabhāvasiddhiḥ /]
T11arhebt_u:2587: avaśyaṃ ca bījāder janakājanakāvasthayor vastubhedo yathokto 'vagantavya iti darśayitum
T11arhebt_u:2588: anumānam abhedasya [T. 265a.] bādhakam āha -- bhāvānāṃ bījādīnāṃ svakāryajanako yaḥ
T11arhebt_u:2591: paścād iva salilādikāraṇasannidhāna iva prāg api kuśūlādyavasthitikāle 'pi svakāryajananaprasaṅgāt /
T11arhebt_u:2592: tatha hi -- salilādisannidhāne 'pi bījādiḥ svarūpeṇaiva kāryaṃ karoti,
T11arhebt_u:2596: `sa evāyam' iti pratyabhijñāyāṃ puro 'vasthāyino janakasvabhāvasya prācyarūpābhedādhyavasāyāt,
T11arhebt_u:2597: tataḥ kim iti prāg api tatkāryaṃ na kuryād iti? /
T11arhebt_u:2598: prayogaḥ -- yad yadā yajjananasvabhāvaṃ tat tadā tajjanayaty eva /
T11arhebt_u:2602: kuśūlādyavasthāsv api cedaṃ bījādikaṃ svakāryajananasvabhāvam {p. 87.1} eva pratyabhijñayā vyavasthāpyata iti svabhāvahetuprasaṅgaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2606: nirvarttyaṃ kāryaṃ na janayati na tat tadā tajjananasvabhāvam,
T11arhebt_u:2607: tad yathā -- śālyaṅkurajananasvabhāvanirvartyaṃ kāryam ajanayat kodravabījam /
T11arhebt_u:2608: na janayati 1ca salilādikāraṇasannidheḥ[363]prāk tatkāryajananasvabhāvanirvarttyaṃ [S. 90b.] svakāryaṃ bījādikam iti [T. 266b.] vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ
T11arhebt_u:2609: tato 'numānato 'pi bādham anubhavat pratyabhijñānaṃ kathaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:2615: sa ca viparyaye bādhakapramāṇabalān niścita iti /
T11arhebt_u:2621: na pratyakṣād anyad gariṣṭhaṃ pramāṇam iti cet / na /
T11arhebt_u:2623: na hīyam anumānena pratyakṣātmikā satī bādhyata iti brūmahe /
T11arhebt_u:2625: tad dhy arthasyāsambhave 'bhāvāt pramāṇam ucyate tac cānumānasyāpy arthapratibaddhaliṅgajanyatayā samānam iti nāsya kaścid viśeṣaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2626: yadi cānumānavirodham aśnuvānāpi pratyabhijñā pramāṇaṃ tadā ''kārasya sāmyāt tadekatāṃ pratiyatī nīletarakusumādeḥ[366][pratītiḥ] kiṃ na pramāṇam?
T11arhebt_u:2627: na hi kusumaphalādikāryadarśanonnīyamāno bhedaḥ pratyakṣatas tathābhāvam anubhavati /
T11arhebt_u:2628: vistarataś ca pratyabhijñāprāmāṇyanirāsaḥ [S. 91a.]kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhāv eva vihita ity āstāṃ tāvad iha /
T11arhebt_u:2629: yataḥ evam uktena prakāreṇa janakājanakāvasthayoḥ bījāder vastubhedaḥ tasmād yo 'nyo 'vasthāviśeṣo yadantaraṃ aṅkurādikāryaprasavaḥ {p. 88.1} sa evāṅkurajananasvabhāvaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:2632: pūrvabhāvinām avasthābhedānām atajjananabhāvatvāt kathaṃ teṣu tatkāraṇavyapadeśaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:2634: ity ata āha -- `pūrvabhāvinas tu' kuśūlādyavasthitikālabhāvinas tu avasthāviśeṣāaṅkurakāraṇasyāntyasyāvasthāviśeṣasya
T11arhebt_u:2637: yatas tatsvabhāvasya bījāder jananaṃ na hetvantarāpekṣam,
T11arhebt_u:2638: yac cājanakam apekṣate na tasya [S. 91b.] tajjananasvabhāvatvam iti /
T11arhebt_u:2639: tasmān nānekānto bījādivat `tatsvabhāvatvāt' ity asya hetoḥ ity upasaṃhāraḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2640: tad evaṃ yadā tāvat pratyabhijñānaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇatayā sthairyasiddhaye parair ucyate bījādivad anekāntaṃ pratipādayitum,
T11arhebt_u:2641: tadā tasyoktena prakāreṇa pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ bādhyamānatvāt tadātmatā nāstīti kutas tata ekatā bhāvānām?
T11arhebt_u:2643: yadā tu pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt pūrvāparakālayor ekasvabhāvā bījādaya iti hetutayocyate paraiḥ,
T11arhebt_u:2645: na ca sa pakṣe kvacid varttata ity āha -- kṣaṇikeṣu bhāveṣu asmābhir iṣyamāṇeṣu ekyābhāvād iti sambandhaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2648: [ § 19. tatsvabhāvatvāt ity atra punar api anekāntadoṣoddhāraḥ /]
T11arhebt_u:2649: atha yasyāpi kṣanikā bhāvās tasyāpi bījādīnāṃ [T. 267b.] pratikṣaṇam aikyābhāve 'pi
T11arhebt_u:2650: viśeṣānupalakṣaṇād antyakṣaṇavat sarveṣāṃ janakasvabhāvānām api tadbhāvaṃ prati salilādyapekṣatvāt
T11arhebt_u:2651: tadavastham anaikāntikatvam ity āśaṅkyāha -- aparāparotpatteḥ kṣaṇikair api [S. 92a.] nānekāntaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:2652: aparebhyo 'parebhyaś ca pratyayebhyaḥ pratikṣaṇam utpatteḥ kṣaṇikānāṃ bhinnaśaktitvād antyakṣaṇavaj janakasvabhāvatāvirahāt kutas tair apy anekāntaḥ
T11arhebt_u:2653: na hi kāraṇabhedopadhīyamānajanmanāṃ viśeṣānupalakṣaṇe 'py abhinnasvabhāvatā yuktā,
T11arhebt_u:2655: tathā ca vakṣyati -- `aparāparapratyayayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ santanvantaḥ saṃskārā yady api kutaścit sāmyāt samānarūpāḥ pratīyante tathāpi bhinna eva eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:2656: tena kiñcid eva kasyacit kāraṇam' iti /
T11arhebt_u:2657: yad uktaṃ `tatsvabhāvasya jananāt' ity asyānekāntam udbhāvayann āha paraḥ -- te bījakṣityādayaḥ
T11arhebt_u:2658: antyāḥ ante bhavāḥ pratyekam aṅkurajanane samarthāḥ khaṇḍaśaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ kāryotpādābhāvād
T11arhebt_u:2659: bhavadbhir iṣyanta iti kinna janayanti pratyekam? /
T11arhebt_u:2660: tataś caiṣām eka eva kaścid aṅkuraṃ janayati,
T11arhebt_u:2661: tadanye tu tatsvabhāvā api na janayantīti `tatsvabhāvasya jananāt' ity anekāntaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2662: tadvat kuśūlādyavasthā api bījādayo 'ṅkurādijananasvabhāvā api na janayiṣyantīti tair anekāntaḥ [S. 92b.] tadavastha eveti manyateparaḥ/
T11arhebt_u:2663: atrāha -- iti yad evaṃ tvaṃ manyase /
T11arhebt_u:2664: pareṇa sāmānyenābhidhānāt sāmānyenaivottaram āha -- {1}janayanty eva [T.268a.] {2}nātra svakāryajanane anyathābhāvaḥ ajanakatvam āśaṅkanīyam
T11arhebt_u:2666: yadi hi na janayeyur jananasvabhāvā eva na syuḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2669: [ § 20. ekenaiva samarthyena kāryajanane pareṣām anupayogam āśaṅkya taduddhāraḥ /]
T11arhebt_u:2670: pratyekam antyānāṃ janakatve kāryasyaikena jananād apareṣām upayogasya nirviṣayatvād
T11arhebt_u:2671: ajananam eveti manyamāna āha paraḥ -- teṣu antyeṣu sahakāriṣu saha -- yugapat karaṇaśīleṣu
T11arhebt_u:2676: etat pariharati -- `na vai' naiva bhāvānāṃ bījādīnāṃ kācit prekṣāpūrvakāritā buddhipūrvakāritā,
T11arhebt_u:2677: yataḥ prekṣāpūrvakāritvāt `ayam asmāsv anyatam eko 'pi samarthaḥ kāryajanane,
T11arhebt_u:2679: ' ity ālocya apare nivarteran [S. 93a.] {p. 90.1} audāsīnyaṃ[367]bhajamānās tatkāryajanane na vyāpriyeran /
T11arhebt_u:2680: yasmāt te bījādayo bhāvāḥ nirabhiprāyavyāpārāḥ paryālocanāśūnyavyāpārā ekata utpadyamāne kārye sarva eva vyāpriyante /
T11arhebt_u:2683: yadi hi vyāpṛtād anya eva vyāpāraḥ [T. 268b.] tadā tata eva kāryotpādād vyāpāravataḥ kārakatvam eva hīyate /
T11arhebt_u:2684: tasyāsau vyāpāraḥ tatas tasya kārakatvam iti cet /
T11arhebt_u:2685: nanv evaṃ vyāpāropayogasya kāryānupayogini tatropacārāt[369]pāramārthikam asya kārakatvaṃ hīyeta /
T11arhebt_u:2691: abhimatenaiva vyāpṛtena tadvyāpārotpādanāt nātiprasaṅgaḥ iti cet /
T11arhebt_u:2694: yena ca pariśrameṇa vyāpāraṃ janayati tena kāryam eva kin notpādayati?
T11arhebt_u:2696: yathā ca svasannidhimātreṇaivāyaṃ vyāpāraṃ janayati na vyāpārāntareṇa,
T11arhebt_u:2699: tasmād bhāvini kārye prāgbhāva eva kāraṇasya vyāpāraḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2700: sa ca sarveṣāṃ astīti sarva eva kāryotpattau vyāpriyanta iti vyapadiśyante /
T11arhebt_u:2701: tad api kāryaṃsarvebhya eva jāyate sarveṣāṃ bhāva eva tadbhāvāt /
T11arhebt_u:2702: na hi kāryasya kāraṇābhimatabhāva eva bhāvam antareṇāparaṃ janma /
T11arhebt_u:2703: tathābhāve[378]hi tatraiva kāraṇavyāpārāt kāryakriyaivaiṣāṃ na sambhavet /
T11arhebt_u:2704: tataś ca satsv api kāraṇeṣu katham asya bhāva upalabdhir vā syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:2705: tatsambandhino janmanaḥ karaṇāt iti cet / na /
T11arhebt_u:2713: tasmāt kāryam evābhūtvā hetubhāve bhavatīti bhāva evāsya[387]tato janmeti sarvebhyas tat jāyate /
T11arhebt_u:2714: nanv ekasyāpi tajjanane sāmarthyāt apareṣāṃ tatra sannidhilakṣaṇo vyāpāro vyartha
T11arhebt_u:2715: eveti na tatrāpareṣāṃ bhāvaḥ saṅgacchata iti ced āha -- svahetoḥ kṣitibījasalilādisāmagrīlakṣaṇasya
T11arhebt_u:2716: pariṇāmaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣavataḥ pratikṣaṇam upadhīyamānātiśayasya kṣaṇāntarasya prasavaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:2717: tataḥ upanidhiḥ kāryadeśe sannidhānaṃ dharmo yeṣāṃ te tathābhavantaḥ kāryadeśe sannidhīyamānāḥ
T11arhebt_u:2718: nopālambham arhanti -- `ekasyāpy etatkāryakaraṇe samarthatvāt kim atra bhavantaḥ sannihitāḥ?
T11arhebt_u:2721: kutaḥ? tatprakṛte tatprakṛtitvāt iti bhāvapradhāno [S. 94b.] nirddeśaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2725: tataś[392]ca pratikṣaṇam upadhīyamānātiśayasyotpādāt kevalānāṃ [T. 269b.] ca tajjananasvabhāvavaikalyāt tadaparapratyayayogajanyasvabhāvatvāt samarthajanakasya hetoḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2726: etac ca yathāvasaraṃ tatra tatra vyaktīkariṣyati /
T11arhebt_u:2727: tasmād yatsāmagrījanyasvabhāvo yo bhāvaḥ sa tatraikābhāve 'pi kāraṇavaikalyān na sambhavatīty ekasāmagrījanmanāṃ sahabhāvo niyataḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2728: sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhāva eva kāryasya bhāvāt sarva eva janayantīti `tatsvabhāvasya jananāt' ity atra nānekāntaḥ iti /
T11arhebt_u:2729: {p. 92.1} yenābhiprāyeṇa `te 'ntyāḥ samarthāḥ kin na janayanti' ity uktaṃ taṃ prakaṭayann āha -- samarthāḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:2730: siddhāntavādy api `janayanty eva' iti yadabhiprāyavatoktaṃ tam ādarśayati -- na,
T11arhebt_u:2734: idam asamartham' iti pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanābhyām anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vyavahriyate,
T11arhebt_u:2736: tau cānvayavyatirekāv ekatraiva kārye dṛśyete nāparāparatreti tasyaivaikasya janane samarthā gamyanta iti nāparāparajananam /
T11arhebt_u:2737: te tu yadavasthā janayanto dṛśyante -- kiṃ tajjananasvabhāvās tadaiva?
T11arhebt_u:2740: tatra prāg api tatsvabhāvatve paścād iva prāg api jananaprasaṅga iti pratikṣaṇaṃ bheda ucyata iti /
T11arhebt_u:2758: [383] avyaktād avyaktam eva rūpaṃ jātaṃ yataḥ
T11arhebt_u:2770: parasparavyāvṛttaḥ svabhāvo yeṣāṃ tebhyaś cakṣurādibhyaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ yugapatkartṛbhyaḥ
T11arhebt_u:2772: bahūni bhinnasvabhāvāni kāraṇāni kāryaṃ tv ekam abhinnasvabhāvam iti na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥsyāt /
T11arhebt_u:2773: tataś cakṣurādayo na bhinnenātmanaikasya kāryasya janakā eṣṭavyāḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2774: kintv abhinnam eṣām ekakāryajanakaṃ sāmānyabhūtaṃ rūpam upeyaṃ yenābhinnaṃ kāryaṃ janayanti /
T11arhebt_u:2775: tac ca samagrāvasthāyām eva tatkāryaṃ janayati na vyagrāvasthāyām /
T11arhebt_u:2782: janakaṃ rūpaṃ tad ekaikābhāve 'pi vidyate na ca janayatīti `tatsvabhāvasya jananāt' ity anekānta iti /
T11arhebt_u:2786: evaṃ manyate -- kiṃ punar idaṃ kāraṇam abhimataṃ bhavataḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:2791: nanu tadavasthāyāṃ pratyekam eva sāmagrīśabdavācyānāṃ jananasvabhāvatvābhyupagamāt pratyekam eva cakṣurādikaṃ kāraṇam /
T11arhebt_u:2792: [T. 270b.] yady evaṃ ko 'yaṃ niyamo yadanekasmād bhavatā 'nekena bhavitavyam viparyaye bādhakapramāṇābhāvāt,
T11arhebt_u:2796: tad uktam -- tasyaivaikasya janane samarthāḥnānyasya iti nāparāparajananam iti /
T11arhebt_u:2798: yato nāsmākaṃ bhavatām iva kāraṇam eva [S. 96a.] kāryātmatām upaiti,
T11arhebt_u:2800: kintu apūrvam eva keṣucit satsu bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:2801: tac cānekabhāva eva bhāvāt tatkāryam ucyate tasya kuto
T11arhebt_u:2803: yat tv abhinnaṃ rūpaṃ janakam ucyate tasyaikasthitāv api bhāvāt tatkāryajananasvabhāvāc ca tataḥ kāryaprasavaprasaṅgaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:2804: tadanyasannidhau tasya viśeṣābhāvāt tadāpi vā na janayet /
T11arhebt_u:2805: tasmād yeṣu bhāvābhāvavatsu kāryaṃ bhāvābhāvavad dṛśṭaṃ ta eva viśeṣā janakā iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:2806: atha sāmagrīṃ kāraṇam āśrityocyate `na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syād iti',
T11arhebt_u:2808: {2}yathāsvaṃ yasyāḥ sāmagryāḥ ya ātmīyaḥ svabhāvas tadbhedena tadviśeṣopayogataḥ tasya -- vijñānalakṣaṇasya kāryasya,
T11arhebt_u:2810: teṣūpayogataḥ [T. 271a.] tadupayogaiḥ bhinnasāmagrīvyāpāraiḥ kāryāḥ ye svabhāvaviśeṣāḥ -- kāryāṇāṃ viśiṣṭāḥ svabhāvāḥ [S. 96b.] teṣām asaṅkarāt paras paravyāvṛttarūpatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:2811: sāmagrībhedād bhinnarūpataiva kāryāṇām iti kathan na kāraṇabhedād kāryabhedaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:2818: bhinnasāmagrījanmanāṃ {p. 94.1} kāryasvabhāvaviśeṣāṇām asāṅkaryād asty eva sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇabhedāt kāryāṇāṃ bheda iti /
T11arhebt_u:2819: nanu yadā viṣayendriyamanaskārebhyo vijñānasambhavaḥ tadā teṣām upayogaviṣayasyaikatvāt katham asāṅkaryam? /
T11arhebt_u:2824: kiṃ nu vai samagrāṇām anyānyakāryajananena janakatvam yatas tadbhāve tan na syāt /
T11arhebt_u:2825: janakatvaṃ hy eṣāṃ tadbhāva eva kasyacid bhāvāt /
T11arhebt_u:2826: tatraikasyānekasya vā bhāve teṣām ekānekajanakatvam ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:2833: nanv ekasyāḥ sāmagryā anekasya bhāve sāmagryantarajanyebhyo bhavatu bhedaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:2836: tatra yadā cakṣūrūpamanaskārebhyo vijñānajanma tadā cakṣūrūpakṣaṇayor api bhāvād vijñānenābhinnahetujatvāt tayor vijñānātmatā,
T11arhebt_u:2837: vijñānasya vā tadrūpatā kathaṃ na prasajyeta? / āha ca --
T11arhebt_u:2846: anyādṛśī ca vijñānader iti tadvailakṣaṇyād eva [S. 97b.] kāryāṇāṃ vailakṣaṇyam /
T11arhebt_u:2847: syād etat -- sarveṣāṃ anvayavyatirekāv anuvidhīyete tadā cakṣurādikṣaṇair iti kuto 'yaṃ bhedaḥ -- ihopādānabhāve bheda(-bhāveneda)
T11arhebt_u:2851: tathā hi -- vijñānaṃ manaskārasya bodharūpatām anukaroti,
T11arhebt_u:2854: niyamena ca vijñānamātrabhāve samanantarapratyayasya vyāpāro na cakṣurādeḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2861: yayā kiñcit kāryaṃ svasantānavyavasthānibandhanaṃ janayanty aparaṃ ca santānāntaravyapadeśanibandhanam
T11arhebt_u:2862: iti tasyā eva sāmagryā avāntaraviśeṣakṛtatvāc cakṣūrūpavijñānakṣaṇānāṃ parasparato
T11arhebt_u:2871: tasmād yadi `kāraṇabhedāt' kāraṇānekatvāt kāryasya bhedaḥ anekatvaṃ tadā pratibandhābhāvād anekāntaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2872: na ca tadabhyupagamyata iti na kācit kṣatiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2873: atha sāmagrīlakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya bhedaḥ sāmagryantarād vailakṣaṇyaṃ kāryasyāpi bhedo 'tatkāraṇebhyo bhinnasvabhāvatocyate /
T11arhebt_u:2874: tadā[402]tasyeha[403]bhāvāt kathaṃ na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāt?
T11arhebt_u:2878: ubhayaṃ[405]caitat kāryeṣu pramāṇaparidṛṣṭam iti darśayann āha -- yathā ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:2879: mṛtpiṇḍādibhyo hi bhavato ghaṭasya na kāraṇānekatve 'py anekarūpatā /
T11arhebt_u:2881: tatra [T. 272b.] sāmagryantarajanyāt tāvad bhedaṃ darśayati -- mṛtpiṇḍāt ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:2883: tadanyajanyebhyo bhinnasvabhāvāni [S. 98b.] yāni kāryāṇi sādhayanti tebhyo vilakṣaṇam
T11arhebt_u:2885: tathā hi -- kulālādinirapekṣo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ tadanyajanyād vṛkṣāder vilakṣaṇam evopādānabhāvena mṛdātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2887: tatkāraṇāhitaviśeṣaś ca kevalamṛtpiṇḍād bhinnasvabhāvatayā tatkāryād apīṣṭakāder vilakṣaṇam eva karoti /
T11arhebt_u:2889: api tadanyopādānasahitaṃ sahakāribhāvena yatkāryam karoti tadvilakṣaṇam eva mṛtpiṇḍasahitaṃ tatkāranāhitaviśeṣaṃ ghaṭātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti samudāyārthaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2890: tatra mṛtpiṇḍād bhinnaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭasya ye tadanyopādānakāraṇatayā mṛtsvabhāvā na bhavanti vṛkṣādayas tebhyo bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:2891: kulālāt mṛtpiṇḍopādānāhitātiśayāt sahakāribhāvenopayujyamānāt tasyaiva ghaṭasya mṛtpiṇḍopādānatayā
T11arhebt_u:2892: mṛdātmanaḥ sataḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ pṛthubudhnodarādyākāraḥ tadātmatayā tadanyebhyo
T11arhebt_u:2893: yeṣāṃ mṛtpiṇḍas tadanyanimittasahita [S. 99a.] upādānam iṣṭakādīnāṃ tebhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:2897: bhinnātmakatayā cakrāder vibhakto vicchinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati tasmād anu[krā]ntakāraṇatrayajanyo
T11arhebt_u:2898: ghaṭaḥ tadanyasmād ekaikakāryād dvidvikāryāc ca bhinnasvabhāva eva jāyata iti sāmagrībhedād
T11arhebt_u:2899: bhinnānyeva kāryāṇi parasparam asaṅkīrṇasvabhāvāni bhavantīti tadupayogakāryaviśeṣāsaṅkaraḥ[407]siddhaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2903: yata [S. 99b.] evaṃ sāmagrībhedād bhinnānyeveṣṭakācakrāvibhaktaghaṭa tadvibhaktaghaṭalakṣaṇāni kāryāṇi bhavanti tat tasmāt evam uktena prakāreṇa
T11arhebt_u:2904: kulālāt mṛtpiṇḍarahitād anyasāmagryantarbhūtāt na mṛtsvabhāvatā kasyacit kāryasya,
T11arhebt_u:2915: [407] teṣāṃ kāraṇānām upayogaiḥ vyāpāraiḥ kāryā ye svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ teṣām
T11arhebt_u:2921: tad evaṃ sāmagrībhedād bhedaṃ kārasyodāharaṇe pratipādya sahakāriṇām anekatve 'py
T11arhebt_u:2922: anekātmatāvirahaṃ pratipādayann āha -- na ca tayoḥ mṛtkulālayoḥ sahitayoḥ parasparopādānopakṛtātmanoḥ
T11arhebt_u:2923: yaḥ śaktiviśeṣaḥ pratyayāntarasahitāvasthāto viśiṣṭā yogyatā tadviṣayasya[412]tadanyāvasthāviṣayād
T11arhebt_u:2924: bhede saty api yathā tadanyasmād bhedaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:2927: tābhyāṃ janito yo viśeṣo mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmakaḥ sa eva tadanyasāmagrījanyād bhidyata iti bhedo asya /
T11arhebt_u:2928: kathaṃ punar eta[d] jñāyate `tadanyasmād iva [S. 100a.] svabhāvato 'py asya bhedo nāsti' ity ata āha -- mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:2929: yadi hi mṛtkulālayoḥ tadavasthābhāvinoḥ śaktiviśeṣaviṣayo mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmako
T11arhebt_u:2930: bhedas tadanyasmād iva svarūpato bhidyeta tadā mṛtsaṃsthānayor aparasparātmatayā
T11arhebt_u:2931: parasparātmatāviraheṇa kāraṇena saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa mṛt na pratibhāseta,
T11arhebt_u:2934: na[413]hi yo yasya svabhāvo na bhavati sa tenātmanā svagrāhiṇi jñāne pratibhāsate,
T11arhebt_u:2936: jñānaṃ vā tadrūpavikalārthasāmarthyenotpadyamānaṃ tadrūpam anukartuṃ yuktam,
T11arhebt_u:2938: tasmāt mṛtsaṃsthānayor ekātmataiveti [T. 274a.] na kāraṇānekatvāt kāryasyānekātmakatā aikāntikī,
T11arhebt_u:2943: paramārthatas tu tatsāmagryantarggatānāṃ sajātīyasyā 'pi kṣaṇāntarasyārambhāt sāmagryantarāvayavatvena
T11arhebt_u:2944: ca kāryāntarasyāpi yathā ekapratyayajanitaṃ kiñcid ekaṃ nāsti tathā 'nekapratyayajanitam
T11arhebt_u:2945: apīti kāraṇānekatvāt kāryānekatvopagame 'pi na kācit kṣatiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2952: nanu ca mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣayor ekasvabhāvatve 'pyahrīkādibhiḥ saṅkhyādibhedād bheda iṣyate tat katham anekapratyayajanitasyaikatve etad udāharanām syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:2953: sarvatraiva hi dravyaparyāyayoḥ saṅkhyāsaṃjñālakṣaṇakāryabhedād bhedo deśakālasvabhāvābhedāc cābheda iṣyate,
T11arhebt_u:2955: tathā hi -- eko ghaṭaḥ rūpādayo bahava iti saṅkhyābhedaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2962: evaṃ sarvatra dravyaparyāyayoḥ saṅkhyādibhir bhedaḥ deśādibhis tv abheda iti mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ kathañcit bhedāt mṛtkulālābhyāṃ janitasya kāryasyānekatā 'sty eva /
T11arhebt_u:2965: yat punar ekaṃ tat sahakāriṇām abhinnarūpajanyatayaikakāraṇam eveti na vyabhicāra iti /
T11arhebt_u:2967: svabhāvato bhedānabhyupagame anyathā[416]bhedāsiddheḥ anekasmād ekakāryotpatter abhādhanāt /
T11arhebt_u:2968: svabhāvato bhedopagame vā 'parasparātmatayā mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ saṃsthānamṛtsvabhāvaviśeṣābhyāṃ tayor apratibhāsanaṃ durnnivāram /
T11arhebt_u:2969: yadi hi svabhāvato na bhedo dharmadharmiṇoḥ,
T11arhebt_u:2971: na hi pararūpāḥ bhidyamānā api saṅkhyādaya ātmabhūtam abhedaṃ bādhituṃ samarthāḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2975: na ca bahuvacanasya niyamenādarśanād rūpādayo 'tra nimittam,
T11arhebt_u:2976: rūpādinimittatve hi guruḥ iti na kadācit ekavacanaṃ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:2977: [S. 101b.] sambhavi dharmirūpamātram abhidheyatvena vivakṣitam iti cet / na /
T11arhebt_u:2979: vrīhaya iti ca jātivacane [T. 275a.] dharmiṇo rūpādīnāṃ cānabhidhānāt na kiñcid uttaram /
T11arhebt_u:2980: ubhayarūpasya ca vastuno guruśabdavācyatvāt kathaṃ sambhavino dharmirūpasyaikatvena vivakṣā? /
T11arhebt_u:2981: tataś caiko gurur iti sāmānādhikaraṇy adarśanāt paryāyā apy ekasaṃkhyāviṣayāḥ /
T11arhebt_u:2986: ekasminn api saṃjñābhedadṛṣṭeḥ katham asya bhedanimittatā? /
T11arhebt_u:2988: atrāpi indanāt śakanāt dāraṇāc ca śaktibhedo gamyata iti cet / na /
T11arhebt_u:2990: na hi śaktir eva indati śaknoti dārayati ca /
T11arhebt_u:2996: yeṣāṃ ca paryāyāṇāṃ na kācid arthānugamamātrā tatra kiṃ vaktavyam? /
T11arhebt_u:2998: na hy eko bhāvaḥ kvacid apy anvayī siddha iti /
T11arhebt_u:2999: tathā hi -- na kūṭasthanityatayā nityaṃ {p. 100.1} dravyamahrīkair iṣyate,
T11arhebt_u:3002: na hy asya paryāyāṇām ivocchedaḥ tadrūpeṇa[418],
T11arhebt_u:3003: paryāyā [T. 275b.] eva paryāyarūpeṇa nirudhyante na tu dravyam iti nityam abhyupagamyate /
T11arhebt_u:3007: na punas tat tato vilakṣaṇam upalakṣyate /
T11arhebt_u:3008: kāryabhedas tv asmān prati asiddha eva /
T11arhebt_u:3012: tatra pūrvaṃ bhavati bhedanibandhanam yadīha sambhavet /
T11arhebt_u:3013: tat tu na sambhavati dharmadharmiṇos tulyakālatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:3016: paṭādayo 'pi hi vibhaktapariṇāmā anekaṃ kāryaṃ kurvanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3019: na hy atra kāraṇam eva kāryātmatām upaiti,
T11arhebt_u:3020: yata ekasya kāraṇātmanaḥ ekakāryarūpatopagame tadanyarūpābhāvāt tadanyakāryātmatopagatir na syāt /
T11arhebt_u:3021: kintv apūrvam eva kasyacid bhāve prāgavidyamānaṃ bhavat tatkāryam /
T11arhebt_u:3027: nanu ca tatsannidhau vijñānalakṣaṇakāryasambhavāt tajjananasvabhāvataivaiṣām avadhriyate,
T11arhebt_u:3031: tataś ca vijñānam eva na kuryuḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3035: tathā hi -- te tadavasthāyāṃ pratyekaṃ viśiṣṭasajātīyetarakṣāṇajananātmakāḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3037: tatra vijñānajananasvabhāvataiveti tasyājananasvabhāvatā vyavacchidyate tasyā eva pratiyogitvāt nānyajananasvabhavatā /
T11arhebt_u:3040: na hi tadanyāpekṣayā viparyayavyāvṛttim upādāyānekena śabdenābhidhīyamānaṃ vastu anekarūpatāṃ pratipadyate,
T11arhebt_u:3046: apekṣāyāṃ vā katham ekam aneka[T. 277b.]kāryaṃ na syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:3049: na ca nīlādīnām ātmabhedam adhyakṣam īkṣāmahe[428]/
T11arhebt_u:3055: ekasyānekakriyā 'nabhyupagame ca yo 'yaṃ rūparasagandhasparśaviśeṣāṇāṃ kvacit sahabhāvaniyamaḥ pramāṇaparidṛṣṭaḥ sa na syāt /
T11arhebt_u:3060: anekenaikasvabhāvatāṃ cānubhavataḥ tadvad[431]anekatāyā durnivāratvāt anyathā dharmadharmiṇāṃ kathaṃ {p. 102.1} naikāntiko bhedaḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:3063: yadi tasya bhedas tadā bheda eveti /
T11arhebt_u:3065: na hi parasparopādānakṛtopakārānapekṣā viṣayendriyamanaskārāḥ sahaikakāryārambhiṇo yuktāḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3066: na caikam eva kiñcit kvacit janayati /
T11arhebt_u:3071: tasmād ekasāmagryadhīnajanmanāmeva sahabhāvaniyamo bhāvānām ekakāryakriyāniyamo vā /
T11arhebt_u:3072: tataś ca svasantānakṣaṇam itaropādānaṃ[436]ca yugapad upakurvataḥ katham ekasyānekakāryatā na syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:3074: dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ caikasvabhāvatām ācakṣāṇa [S. 104a.] ekasyānekakāryatāṃ pratikṣipatīti kathaṃ nonmattaḥ[437]?
T11arhebt_u:3076: ekasvabhāvatve ca dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ tatkāryabheda[439]ekavastunibandhana eveti kāryabhedād bhedam abhidadhānaḥ sphuṭam ahrīka evāyam ity upekṣām arhati /
T11arhebt_u:3081: [417] śaktyor bhede 'pi tadādhārasyaikyād aupacārikaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyam ity āśaṅkyāha -- na ca ityādi //
T11arhebt_u:3086: [422] The order of the Tib. Fol. should be 275, 277,
T11arhebt_u:3087: 276 and 278 according to the S. Mss.
T11arhebt_u:3103: [438] svabhāvasyaiva bhedo vastuna iti ced āha
T11arhebt_u:3106: vaiśeṣiko 'pi dravyasyaikasya dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ samavāyikāraṇatāṃ bruvāṇaḥ karmaṇaś
T11arhebt_u:3109: yatas tadekopakāranirapekṣāḥ katham etāḥ śaktayo niyatārthādhārāḥ?
T11arhebt_u:3119: deśakālasvabhāvābhedād abhedas tu yo 'bhyupagamyate so 'py anupapanna eva /
T11arhebt_u:3120: tathā hi -- deśakālayor abhede 'pi rūparasagandhasparśāḥ paryāyarūpeṇa bhidyante tataḥ[444]katham abhedasiddhiḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:3121: svabhāvo 'pi yadi dravyaparyāyayor dvayor api pratyekam anuvṛttivyāvṛttirūpatā;
T11arhebt_u:3123: na tv ekaṃ dvirūpam iti kathan tasmād abhedasiddhiḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:3127: na tu tayor anuvṛttivyāvṛttī eva svabhāvaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3128: na hi smṛtiḥ smarttuḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:3129: anuvṛttivyāvṛttyoś ca svabhāvatve[446]lakṣaṇāt svabhāvasya bhedo vaktavyaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3131: atrāpy abheda iti yadi sādṛśyam ucyate;
T11arhebt_u:3135: eva syāt na tv ekaṃ dvirūpam iti /
T11arhebt_u:3139: vipratiṣiddhaṃ hy etat ekasvabhāvatā dvirūpatā ceti /
T11arhebt_u:3141: kathaṃ tarhi sa eka ity ucyate anekaḥ san? /
T11arhebt_u:3148: yogyatvāc ca viśvasya kṛtākṛtānām[447]ekābhidhānābhidheyatvasya kvacid asambhavāt śaktibhedāc ca viṣayabhedaṃ bruvāṇaṃ [S. 105a.] prati abhihitam[448]/
T11arhebt_u:3151: tathā hi -- śaśāṅkodayaṃ[449]bahavo nirīkṣante [T. 278a.] tasya katham {p. 104.1} ekatvam abhyupagatam? /
T11arhebt_u:3154: sarvathedaṃ na kathañcid api saṅgacchate yaduta ekasya dvairūpyam iti /
T11arhebt_u:3155: vijñānaṃ tu nīlapraticchāyatayotpadyamānaṃ pītādipratibhāsavyavacchedena prativiśiṣṭam khyāpyate,
T11arhebt_u:3156: na punar asya bhāvato[450]dve rūpe staḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3157: atha punar dravyaparyāyayoḥ sammūrcchitatvāt narasiṃhavad ekaṃ śabalarūpatvāt dvirūpam ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:3161: te ca paramāṇavaḥ pratyekaṃ narasiṃharūpā na bhavanti,
T11arhebt_u:3164: jātyantaraṃ ca sa eva narasiṃhābhyāṃ syāt,
T11arhebt_u:3169: iti kevalam anekatve 'pi bahuṣv ekakāryadarśanāt senādivad[451]ekavyavahāradarśanakṛto 'yaṃ viparyāso jaḍamatīnām /
T11arhebt_u:3170: tad evaṃ tāvat pratyekam ahetutvaṃ deśakālasvabhāvānām ekatvaprasādhane /
T11arhebt_u:3172: tathā hi -- paryāyā abhinnadeśakālasvabhāvāś ca paryāyarūpeṇa ca bhidyante pūrvoktāc ca dharmadharmiṇor niṣedhān[452]nobhayavādasambhava iti
T11arhebt_u:3203: ekabhāvo yatas tasmān naikasya syād dvirūpatā// 21 //
T11arhebt_u:3204: tasya bhedo 'pi tābhyāṃced yadi yenātmanāca te /
T11arhebt_u:3213: tena yadi mṛtpiṇḍasya mṛdātmatāyāṃ vyāpāraḥ kulālasya tatsaṃsthānaviśeṣe kathyate,
T11arhebt_u:3214: tadā tayor atyantabhedāt kāraṇānekatvāt kāryānekatvaṃ prāptam iti /
T11arhebt_u:3216: mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ svabhāvabhede dūṣaṇam uktam {p. 108.1} mṛtsaṃsthānayor aparasparātmatayā ityādikam iti na saṃsthānasya mṛddravyād anyatvam /
T11arhebt_u:3218: tatkāryakṣaṇasahakāriṇā mṛtpiṇḍena ca pratyekaṃ sakalam eva mṛtsaṃsthānātmakaṃ kāryaṃ
T11arhebt_u:3219: kriyata iti na kāraṇānekatve 'py anekatvam asya /
T11arhebt_u:3221: ityādi / yat tad ghaṭagataṃ saṃsthānaṃ yadi tata mṛdo bhinnaṃsyāt tadā kulālaḥ pṛthag eva kim iti na karoti? /
T11arhebt_u:3223: kulālaś cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tasya saṃsthānasya guṇātmanaḥ kāraṇatayā gamyata iti sa pṛthag api tat kāryāt /
T11arhebt_u:3225: {2}dravyāśrayya'guṇavān saṃyogavibhāgeṣv akāraṇam anapekṣa [VaiSū 1.1.16] iti guṇalakṣaṇāt sarvadā [S. 108b.] guṇo dravyapratantraḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3228: yadi svabhāvenaiva tasya guṇātmanaḥ saṃsthānasya kriyāvad guṇavad [VaiSū 1.1.15] ityādivacanād ādhārasvabhāvaṃ tat mṛddravyaṃ,
T11arhebt_u:3229: saṃsthānaṃ vā tathāvidhaṃ kapālādheyātmakaṃ tadā kim iti kulālavyāpāram apekṣate? /
T11arhebt_u:3234: yat tat mṛddravyaṃ pṛthuvudhnodarādyākāraṃ ca saṃsthānaṃ tayor yaḥ sambandha ādhārādheyalakṣaṇaḥ
T11arhebt_u:3235: tatra yā yogyatā tāṃ dvayam apy etat kulālād yataḥ pratilabhate tasmāt kulālam apekṣate
T11arhebt_u:3236: kulālānapekṣāyāṃ doṣam āha -- anyathā yadi tayoḥ parasparasambandhayogyatāyāṃ kulālāpekṣā
T11arhebt_u:3237: na syāt tadā svabhāvata eva mṛtpiṇḍasya [T. 281a.] tathāvidhasaṃsthānasambandhayogyatvaṃ bhavet /
T11arhebt_u:3238: tasmiṃś ca sati vastuna eva tatsaṃsthānasambandhayogyatālakṣaṇā dharmatā 'stīti kulālasannidheḥ prāg api saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa sambandhaḥ syād itivaiśeṣikīyaścodyaparihāraḥ
T11arhebt_u:3243: yadi [S. 109a.] parasparasambandhayogyatāyāṃ kulālam apekṣate evaṃ tarhi sāyogyatāmṛddravyasya kulālād bhavati iti[474]āpannam /
T11arhebt_u:3244: na ca anayoḥ mṛddravyayogyatayoḥ svabhāvasya bhedaḥ nānātvam /
T11arhebt_u:3245: yadi hi syāt tadā yogyatāyāḥ dravyāt pṛthakkaraṇaṃ prāgvat prasajyeta /
T11arhebt_u:3246: atha yogyatāyā api yogyapāratantryād apṛthaksiddhiṃ brūyāt tadā tasyā api vastudharmatayaiva
T11arhebt_u:3247: prāg api samāveśo mā bhūd iti dravyeṇa saha sambandhayogyatāyā anyā yogyatā kulālād bhavatīty eṣṭavyā /
T11arhebt_u:3249: pṛthakkaraṇaprasaṅge vā punaḥ sa eva parihāraḥ tadīyaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3251: ity anavasthāprasaṅgād avaśyam abhinnasvabhāvatā kapālātmamamṛddravyayogyatayor abhyupagantavyā /
T11arhebt_u:3253: ity ata āha -- asti tāvat ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3255: kapāladravyasya [S. 109b.] saṃyogaviśeṣasambandhayogyasyārambhāt yadaikasvabhāvatve 'py ekasyānekapratyayopādheyaviśeṣatā tadā siddhaḥ āsmākīnaḥ pakṣaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3256: tataś ca kim asmākaṃ mṛtsaṃsthānayor ekasvabhāvatvasādhanāya atinirbbandhanena? /
T11arhebt_u:3257: [T. 281b.] yadi yogyatām apy āśrityānekapratyayajanyatve 'py ekatvāt nānātvaprasaṅgābhāvaḥ sidhyati kāryasya,
T11arhebt_u:3260: nirbandhagrahaṇena ca mṛtsaṃsthānayor aparasparātmatayā saṃsthānamṛtsvabhāvaviśeṣābhyāṃ tayor apratibhāsanaprasaṅgāt ity anayopapattyā sādhitam evānayor ekatvam,
T11arhebt_u:3261: yuktyantarāṇāṃ sambhave 'pi tadabhidhānalakṣaṇo nirbbandho na kriyate,
T11arhebt_u:3266: tad evaṃ sāmagrībhedāt [S. 110a.] sāmagryantarajanyebhyo bhedaḥ sahakāriṇām anekatve
T11arhebt_u:3267: 'pi ca kāryasyaikatvam aviruddham iti pratipādya {p. 110.1} upasaṃharann āha -- tena
T11arhebt_u:3270: tac ca pūrvasāmagrījanyād bhinnaṃ kāryāntaram eva janayati;
T11arhebt_u:3272: tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyinaś ca kāryasyaikasya darśanāt svabhāvata ekatvaṃ sādhitam
T11arhebt_u:3273: -- tena kāraṇena sahakaraṇaśīlā ekasāmagryantarggatāḥ pratyayāḥ sāmagry-antaraiḥ
T11arhebt_u:3274: saha naikopayogaviṣayāḥ eka upayogasya viṣayo yeṣāṃ te na bhavanti,
T11arhebt_u:3275: sāmagryantarair eva saha bhinnopayogāviṣayatvasya nyāyabalāt pratīteḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3276: anena yat prāg vikalpitaṃ `yadi kāraṇaśabdena sāmagrī bhaṇyate tadā tadbhedād asty evātatsāmagrījanyebhyaḥ kāryasya bheda iti kim ucyate
T11arhebt_u:3277: -- na kāraṇabhedād bhedaḥ [T. 282a.] syāt' iti etad 1udāharaṇopadarśitaṃ nigamitam[475]/
T11arhebt_u:3278: atha kāraṇaśabdena sāmagrīvyapadeśaviṣayāḥ sahakāriṇa ucyante tadā tadbhedād anekatvalakṣaṇāt kāryasyānekatvalakṣaṇo bhedo neṣyata eva,
T11arhebt_u:3282: paramārthataḥ kalpanābuddhau mṛtsaṃsthānayor bhinnayor iva pratibhāsane 'pīti /
T11arhebt_u:3283: evam udāharaṇe sāmagrībhedāt kāryāṇāṃ bhedo naikasāmagrīviṣayapratyayabhedād anekatvaṃ
T11arhebt_u:3284: kāryasyeti pratipādya prakṛte cakṣurādau yojayann āha -- yathāihodāharaṇe kāraṇabhedaḥ
T11arhebt_u:3288: tathā tenaiva prakāreṇa cakṣurādibhyo vijñānasyotpattau sāmagryantarāt sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇabhedo 'nekakārya ity unneyaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3289: {p.111.1} etad eva vibhajann āha -- tathāhi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3290: yā cakṣūr uparahitā samanantarapratyayākhyavijñānalakṣaṇā pratyayāntarasāpekṣā sāmagrī,
T11arhebt_u:3291: tato vijñānasya [T. 282b.] vikalpakasyetarasya vā tadupādeyatvena yā bodharūpatopalabdhā sā cakṣurvijñānasyāpi bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:3294: upalambhātmanaḥsato bhavataḥ jāyamānasya tadaiva tadekakāryapratiniyatasya cakṣurindriyasya
T11arhebt_u:3299: viṣayād viṣayādhikāt[478]samanantarapratyayād indriyāc ca tena viṣayeṇa tulyarūpatā
T11arhebt_u:3300: na kevalaiva rūpapratibhāsitā bhrāntavijñānasyeveti viṣayendriyamanaskāralakṣaṇasāmagrīkāryam evaṃ pradarśitam /
T11arhebt_u:3303: atrābhinnatve 'pi vastutaḥ kāryasya cakṣurvijñānalakṣaṇasya kāraṇānāṃ viṣayendriyamanaskārāṇāṃ
T11arhebt_u:3304: bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyaḥ kevalānām eṣāṃ yaḥ svabhāvas tato bhinnā evātajjanyebhyo[479]vidhiśe(-nyebhyo 'pi viśe)
T11arhebt_u:3307: yata evam iti tasmāt na kāraṇabhede 'pi /
T11arhebt_u:3308: [S. 111b.] yathaikasāmagryantarggatapratyayabhede 'py abhedo naivaṃ sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇabhede 'py abhedaḥ sāmagryantarasjanyebhyaḥ kāryaviśeṣasya viśiṣṭasya kāryasyeti /
T11arhebt_u:3309: tena yaducyate -- [T. 283a.] `yadi sahakāriṇāṃ bhede 'py abhinnaṃ kāryaṃ bhavati sāmagrībhede 'py abhinnam astu,
T11arhebt_u:3310: atha sāmagrībhedād bhinnaṃ bhavati sahakāribhedād api kim iti bhinnaṃ na bhavati viśeṣābhāvāt?
T11arhebt_u:3312: tathā hi parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayāt pratyayaviśeṣād ekakāryoddeśenetaretarasantānopakārāc ca sahakāriṇāṃ pratiniyataśaktīnām udayād ekaṃ 7kāryaṃ
T11arhebt_u:3313: {p. 112.1} sāmagryantarasya tu kāryāntaraprabhavaśaktinibandhanebhyo hetvantarebhyaḥ svabhāvabhedavato bhāvād bhinnakāryaprasūtir iti kuto viśeṣābhāvaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:3323: nanu ca sarvaṃ kāryaṃ sādhāraṃ[482]yathā upādāyarūpam /
T11arhebt_u:3324: tad dhi bhūtebhyo 2jāyamānaṃ tāny evāśrayata[483]iti bhavadbhir iṣyate /
T11arhebt_u:3327: tasya ca kāraṇasya pūrvaṃ janakatvaṃ paścāt [S. 112a.] kāryaṃ pratyādhārabhāva eva,
T11arhebt_u:3329: tatas tatsvabhāvasya jananād ity anekāntaḥ tadavastha evety ata āha -- ta evaite ye 'nantaram uktāḥ kāraṇaśaktibhedāḥ kāraṇānāṃ śaktiviśeṣāḥ
T11arhebt_u:3330: kīdṛśāḥ? yathāsvaṃ yeṣāṃ kāraṇaśaktibhedānāṃ sahakārilakṣaṇānāṃ yadātmīyaṃ sāmagryantarajanyāt
T11arhebt_u:3331: prativiśiṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ tasya janane 'vyavadheyā vyavadhātuṃ [T. 283b.] pratibandhum
T11arhebt_u:3332: aśakyā śaktir yeṣāṃ tadbhāvas[484]tayā avyavadheyaśaktitayā avaśyaṃ kāryakāriśaktitayā
T11arhebt_u:3334: abhāvāt[485]sarvaṃ sāmagryā eva kāryam iti kṛtvā sāmagrīkāryasya svabhāvasthityāśraya ity ucyante /
T11arhebt_u:3337: na hi kṣaṇikasya śaktiḥ pratibandhuṃ śakyate,
T11arhebt_u:3338: 5svabhāvāntarotpādane yāvat[486]pratibandhako vyāpriyate tāvat kṣaṇikasya svakāryaṃ kṛtvaiva nirodhāt /
T11arhebt_u:3339: kathaṃ punar asamānakālaṃ kāraṇam ādhāro yujyate?
T11arhebt_u:3341: yasmāt tat vijñānalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ tebhyaḥ cakṣurādibhyaḥ samastabhyo bodharūpatayā
T11arhebt_u:3342: tadanyasmāt tadajanyāt [S. 112b.] prativiśiṣṭasvabhāvam ekaṃ khaṇḍaśaḥ kāryasyānutpādād
T11arhebt_u:3349: yad api bhūtānām upādāyarūpaṃ pratyāśrayatvam[487]ucyate tad api svadeśasyāsya janakatvam eveti na kiñcit prāg janakaṃ bhūtvā paścāt 7sthāpakatām
T11arhebt_u:3360: punar anyathā tatsvabhāvasya jananād ity anekāntodbhāvanaṃ parasyāśaṅkyāha -- apratirodhaśaktikeṣu
T11arhebt_u:3361: avidyamānaḥ pratirodhaḥ -- pratibandho yasyāḥ śakteḥ sā yeṣām [T. 284a.] apratirodhaśaktikatvaṃ
T11arhebt_u:3363: ye hy utpannāḥ kālakṣepeṇa kāryaṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ syād api śaktipratibandho,
T11arhebt_u:3364: na tu ya udayānantaram eva kāryaṃ kurvanti /
T11arhebt_u:3368: na hi kṣaṇikānāṃ viśeṣa ādhātuṃ śakyate,
T11arhebt_u:3371: teṣv evaṃvidheṣu pratyayeṣu parasparaṃkaḥsahakārārthaḥ yena sahakāriṇa ucyante? /
T11arhebt_u:3372: nanv anādheyaviśeṣatvenaiva sahakāritvābhāvaḥ pratipādita iti kim artham idam apratirodhaśaktikeṣv iti? /
T11arhebt_u:3378: tasmād atiśayādhāyinaḥ sahakāriṇo 'sambhavāt kṣaṇikānāṃ svahetumātrapratibaddham eva janakatvam /
T11arhebt_u:3380: na ca kevalā janayantīti tatsvabhāvasya jananād ity anekānta eveti manyate /
T11arhebt_u:3381: etat pariharati -- na vai naiva atiśayotpādanaṃ[489]sahakriyā yatas tadabhāvāt sahakāriṇo na syuḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3382: kva punar atiśayotpādanaṃ1 sahakriyā pratiyayānāṃ na bhavati? /
T11arhebt_u:3384: na hi kvacid api sahabhāvinām atiśayotpādanalakṣaṇā[490][T. 284b.] sahakriyā {p. 114.1} sambhavati /
T11arhebt_u:3388: [S. 113b.] nyāyabalād evaṃvidhām eva sarvatra sahakriyāṃ sambhāvayāmaḥ, nānyām iti /
T11arhebt_u:3389: atrodāharaṇam -- yathāantyasya anantarāṅkurādikāryasya kāraṇakalāpasya pratyayasāmagryā iti /
T11arhebt_u:3393: [ § 35. ekakāryakāritvam eva mukhyaṃ sahakāritvam itarat tu gauṇam /]
T11arhebt_u:3395: atiśayotpādanam eva tu mukhyam ity ata āha -- tad eva ekakāryakāraṇalakṣaṇaṃ mukhyaṃsahakāritvam nātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam,
T11arhebt_u:3398: kuta etat? ity āha -- tasyaiva anyasya vivakṣitakāryaṃ prati kāraṇatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:3400: yataḥ saha -- yugapat sarvantaḥ sahakāriṇa ucyante,
T11arhebt_u:3402: yathā cāntyasyaikārthakāraṇaṃ sahakāritvam evaṃ pūrvasyāpi kāraṇakalāpasyottarottaraviśiṣṭakṣaṇāntarārambhiṇa ity avaseyam,
T11arhebt_u:3404: tasmāt sarvaṃ kāryam aṅkurādikaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā 'nekapratyayajanyam iti /
T11arhebt_u:3407: syād etat -- ekārthakaraṇam api tatra [S. 114a.] sahakāritvam astu atiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam
T11arhebt_u:3408: apīty ata āha -- tatra ca kṣaṇe 'ntye viśeṣasya karttum aśakyatvāt nātiśayotpādanam api sahakāritvam /
T11arhebt_u:3410: ity ata āha -- ekasya anaṃśasya svabhāvasyāvivekāt /
T11arhebt_u:3411: na hi tatra `ayam anāhitātiśayo bhāgaḥ svahetubhyo jātaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3412: ayaṃ tu sahakāribhir āhitātiśayaḥ' iti viveko 'sti /
T11arhebt_u:3414: viśeṣas tu kim iti na kriyate?
T11arhebt_u:3417: syānmatam -- bhinnasvabhāva evāntyasya viśeṣo 'stu ity ata āha -- bhāvāntara- ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3418: yadi bhāvāntaralakṣaṇo viśeṣo {p. 115.1} bhavet tadā tasyāntyatvam eva hīyeta /
T11arhebt_u:3422: yata evaṃ tasmān na kāraṇasya mukhyasya sahakāribhyaḥ sakāśād[491]viśeṣasyotpattiḥ ity ekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvam iti /
T11arhebt_u:3423: nanv asatyāṃ sahakāribhyo viśeṣotpattau kāryajanane sāmarthyam eṣāṃ na yujyata ity ata [S. 114b.] āha -- te samarthāh ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3424: yadi hi te svabhāvenāsamarthā utpadyeran tadaiṣāṃ sahakāribhyaḥ sāmarthyotpattir abhyupagamyeta /
T11arhebt_u:3426: yeṣām[492]ekakṣaṇaniyatatvāt tataḥ prāk paścāt pṛthak tv abhāvo nāsti /
T11arhebt_u:3427: yebhyaścānantaram eva kāryam utpadyate na kālāntareṇa tatra teṣv evaṃvidheṣu ekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvam nātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam /
T11arhebt_u:3429: parasparataś cānabhyupagamāt samarthasya janmaivāyuktam iti manvānaḥ paraḥ āha -- samarthaḥkutaḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3433: [493]kāraṇasya sahakāribhyaḥ sāmarthyam icchatīti tanniṣedhaparaṃ[494]svabhāvata iti vacanam /
T11arhebt_u:3444: tathā hi -- `idam evaṃrūpaṃ naivaṃ ca' iti darśanādarśanābhyāṃ [S. 115a.] vibhajyate /
T11arhebt_u:3445: tatra yādṛśāḥ kṣityādayas tadanyapratyayasannidhāv upalabhyante tādṛśā eva kevalā api /
T11arhebt_u:3446: tatas tadanyasahitā iva kevalā api samartham aṅkurajanane svaṃ svaṃ kṣaṇāntaram ārabheran /
T11arhebt_u:3447: tataḥ kevalasyāpy aṅkurādijananasvābhāvyād ajananāc ca `tatsvabhāvasya jananāt' ity
T11arhebt_u:3448: anekānta eveti manyamānaḥ para {p. 116.1} āha -- tāni svakāraṇāni kṣitibījādīni enaṃ
T11arhebt_u:3449: samartham aparasya anyasya pratyayasya sannidhāna eva kiṃ kasmāt anayanti?
T11arhebt_u:3451: , sahitānām eva sarvadā sambhavāt iti cet āha -- kadācit kasmiṃścit kāle anyathā'pi kevalā api syuḥ bhaveyuḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3452: tathā hi -- dṛśyanta evādhyātikabāhyāḥ kvacit kārye yādṛśā yatsahitāḥ tādṛśā eva tadrahitā
T11arhebt_u:3453: apīti / [T. 286a.] janayan tu kevalā api sambhavantaḥ samartham, ko doṣaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:3454: iti ced āha -- tataśca kevalānām api samarthajanakānāṃ sambhavāt eko 'pi na kevalam
T11arhebt_u:3455: anekaḥ kvacid deśādau [S. 115b.] samarthaḥ utpannaḥ kṣitibījādir aṅkurādikāryaṃ janayet
T11arhebt_u:3457: na ca kevalo janayati tatsvabhāvasambhave 'pi tato 'nekānta iti paraḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3460: pratyayair yo yogaḥtena kāraṇena pratikṣaṇaṃbhinnaśaktayo na kadācit pūrvāparakālabhāvina
T11arhebt_u:3463: saṃskārāḥ sametya sambhūya ca pratyayaiḥ kriyamāṇāḥ santanvantaḥ santānena bhavanto
T11arhebt_u:3464: yady api kutaścit sāmyād varṇena saṃsthānena anyena vā kenacitprakāreṇa sādṛśyād
T11arhebt_u:3465: ekākāraparāmarśapratyayajananalakṣaṇāt samānaṃ rūpam eṣām iti sarūpāḥ sadṛśāḥ pratīyante
T11arhebt_u:3466: pratyabhijñāyante tathāpi kṛtrimakṛtrimāṇāṃ iva maṇimuktādīnām aparāparapratyayayogalakṣaṇasāmagrībhedād
T11arhebt_u:3467: bhinna eva visadṛśa eva na pratyabhijñānavaśād abhinnaḥ tulyarūpa eṣāṃ bījādīnāṃ
T11arhebt_u:3468: svabhāvaḥ [T. 286b.] yata evaṃ tena bhinnasvabhāvatvena bhinnaśaktitayā vā 'parāparasāmagrījanyatvena
T11arhebt_u:3469: kṣaṇānāṃ siddhayā kiñcid eva kṣitibījādikaṃ kasyacid eva kāryasyāṅkurādes {p. 117.1}
T11arhebt_u:3473: samarthakṣaṇajananasvabhāvatā vā nāsty eveti tatsvabhāvasya jananād ajanakasya cātatsvabhāvatvād
T11arhebt_u:3474: ity atra nānekāntaḥ yato yo yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetor evotpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati
T11arhebt_u:3475: na punas tadbhave hetvantaram apekṣata ity atrānekāntaḥ syād iti /
T11arhebt_u:3476: pratyabhijñānasya ca sarūpatāviṣayasya sāmagrībhedād anumitabhinnaśaktisvabhāvatvena bādhyamānatayā prāmāṇyābhāvāt na tataḥ sarūpatāsiddhiḥ kṣaṇakṣayiṇām iti /
T11arhebt_u:3478: yor avasthayor vastubhedo niśceyaḥ' ity[496]ādinā [S. 116b.] ekatvāviṣayaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ nirastam /
T11arhebt_u:3488: kiñcid eva kasyacit kāraṇam ity uktam tatra kiṃ kasya kāraṇam iti śakyaparicchedam apy ādhyātmikeṣu tāvad darśayann āha -- tatra -- ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3489: tatra teṣu pratikṣaṇaṃ śaktisvabhāveṣu kṣaṇikeṣu bhāveṣu /
T11arhebt_u:3491: tadādir yeṣāṃ atidūrātyāsannatvādīnāṃ te 'vidyamānā[499]yasmin deśe so 'vyavadhānādiḥ deśo yasya so 'vyavadhānādideśaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3492: [T. 287a.] rūpam indriyaṃ cādī yasya manaskārādeḥ 5sa rūpendriyādiḥ[500]sa cāsau kāraṇakalāpaś ca sāmagrīlakṣaṇas tathoktaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3493: avyavadhānādideśaś cāsau rūpendriyādikāraṇakalāpaś ca sa vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ nānyaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3502: {p. 118.1} imam evaṃvidhaṃ [S. 118a.] hetuphalabhāvapratiniyamaṃ niravadyamādhyātmakeṣu darśitam [T. 288a.] anyatrāpy atidiśann āha -- anena nyāyena ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3503: yo 'yam anantaraṃ hetuphalabhāvapratiniyame nyāya uktaḥ so 'anyatrā 'pi sarvatra draṣṭavyaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3504: sarvatreti vacanāt akṣaṇikeṣv api pratītir mmā bhūt ity āha -- pratikṣaṇam ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3505: yāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe 'nyāś cānyāś ca svabhāvabhedānvayinyaḥ śaktayo bhavanti tatrāyam ekārthakriyāpratiniyamaḥ sahakāriṇāṃ draṣṭavyaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3506: na tu ye sthiraikasvabhāvā bhāvāḥ paraiḥ kalpyante teṣv api /
T11arhebt_u:3516: na tu svata eva svabhāvasyānyathātvaṃ sambhavati /
T11arhebt_u:3517: tataś ca sthiraḥ padārtho yadi kāryotpādanasamarthasvabhāvaḥ tato 'syākriyā nopapadyata iti sarvadaiva kuryāt /
T11arhebt_u:3521: yat tu kadācit karoti kadācin na [S. 118b.] ity etan na labhyate /
T11arhebt_u:3526: yady api kevalasyāpy akṣaṇikasya samarthaḥ svabhāvaḥ tathāpi anyasahitaḥ karoti na kevalaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3527: ayam api hy asya svabhāvaḥ yad -- `anyasahitena svakāryaṃ karttavyam na samarthasvabhāvenāpi satā kevalena' iti /
T11arhebt_u:3529: anyasahitenaiva svakāryaṃ karttavyaṃ na kevalena ity etat kevalasyāsamarthasvabhāvatve yujyate nānyatheti manyamānasya praśnaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3530: paras tv anavagatābhiprāya āha -- samartha iti /
T11arhebt_u:3531: kevalasyāpy akṣaṇikasya samartha eva {p. 119.1} svabhāvaḥ anyathā 'syākṣaṇikataiva hīyeteti /
T11arhebt_u:3532: siddhāntavādy āha -- kin na karoti iti /
T11arhebt_u:3534: sahitasyāvasthāyām iva yujyata iti sahitasyaiva kriyām icchatā kevalasyāsamarthasvabhāvataivopagantavyā /
T11arhebt_u:3535: atha matam -- kevalasya yadi śiraś chidyate tathāpi na karotīty ata āha -- akurvan ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3536: kāryānumeyaṃ hi sāmarthyaṃ na ca kevalasya kadācid api kāryakriyā 'stīti kathaṃ sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate? /
T11arhebt_u:3537: nāyaṃ niyamaḥ yat samarthasvabhāvenāvaśyam eva kāryaṃ karttavyam,
T11arhebt_u:3538: anyathā 'pi darśanāt iti manyamāna [S. 119a.] āha paraḥ -- kuvindādayaḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3540: devānāṃpriyaḥ ṛjuḥ mūrkho vā [T. 289a.] sukhasaṃvardhitatvāt ramaṇasvabhāvaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3544: yo hy anabhiyukto durvuddhiś ca sa kṛtam api vastu vismaraṇaprakṛtitvāt punaḥ punaḥ kārayatīti punaḥ pratividhāpayati /
T11arhebt_u:3549: pratipādyopasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt tatsvabhāvasya kāryakriyāsamarthasya anyathātvāsambhā(mbha)
T11arhebt_u:3550: vāt 4kadācid asamarthatvābhāvāt[504]taddharmaṇaḥ kāryakriyādharmaṇaḥ tathābhāvaḥ kāryakriyā antyāvasthāvat sahitāvasthāyām iva anivāryaḥ /{120}
T11arhebt_u:3559: sahitāvasthāyāṃ tv asya sāmarthyaṃ sahakāribhyo jāyate /
T11arhebt_u:3560: tataḥ sahita eva karotīty ata āha -- antyāvasthāyāṃsāmarthyotpattau kīdṛśasya prāg
T11arhebt_u:3561: asamarthasya sataḥ tasya sāmarthyasya yasya tadupajāyate tatsvabhāvatvemīmāṃsakādibhir {120} iṣyamāṇe /
T11arhebt_u:3563: kathañcit tadbhede 'pi tatsvabhāvatayaiva pratīyamānatvād iti te manyante /
T11arhebt_u:3564: apūrvotpattir eva sā [T. 289b.] apūrvasyaiva vastunaḥ sā utpattir yā tatsvabhāvasya sāmarthyasya /
T11arhebt_u:3565: na hy ekasvabhāvatve sāmarthyam evāpūrvam upajātaṃ na samarthaḥ iti yuktam,
T11arhebt_u:3568: nanu pratīyamāne eva sāmarthyatadvator utpattyanupattī ekasvabhāvatā ca kathaṃ nihnotuṃ śakyate? iti cet / na /
T11arhebt_u:3570: anyathā pratītyanusāriṇā bhavatā dvicandrādayo 'pi na nihnotavyāḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3572: ihāpi vastuna ekasvabhāvasyotpattyanupattī parasparaviruddhe bādhike kiṃ neṣyete? /
T11arhebt_u:3573: vyavasthitasyaiva vajropalāder ddharmiṇaḥ [S. 120a.] tatsvabhāvaṃ sāmarthyam utpannam iti ca pūrvāparakālayor apratibhāsamānavivekaḥ kathaṃ pratīyāt? /
T11arhebt_u:3574: vijñānādikāryasyānutpattiyaugapadyodayaprasaṅgāt cakṣurādisānnidhye prāg asat tat sāmarthyam utpannaṃ kramavac ceti niścaya iti cet /
T11arhebt_u:3576: kṛtaṃ pratyabhijñānam upajāyamānam apūrvasāmarthyapratibhāsaviviktopalādigrāhy[506]apy anumānād arthāpattito vā bādhām anubhavan na pramāṇam ity upagataṃ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:3578: cārvāgdarśanānām ekatvavibhramo lūnapunarjjāteṣv iva keśanakhādiṣv iti kiṃ neṣyate? /
T11arhebt_u:3584: atha sāmarthyaṃ sahakāripratyayasānnidhyalakṣaṇam evety atatsvabhāvam iti nāpūrvotpattiprasaṅga
T11arhebt_u:3586: sa 3bījādiḥ padārthaḥ[508]prāg iva tadrūpāparityāgāt paścād apy akāraka eva /
T11arhebt_u:3588: sāmarthyam ity ākhyā yasya padārthāntarasya sahakāripratyayasānnidhyalakṣaṇasya sa evātiśaya[śabda]vācya itinaiyāyikair abhyupagamāt /
T11arhebt_u:3590: te 'pi sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayāḥ yady akṣaṇikāḥ teṣv apy evaṃ [S. 120b.] prasaṅgo 'nivārita eveti kṣaṇikataivaikārtha[kriyā]pratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvam icchato 'bhyupeyā /
T11arhebt_u:3591: punar apy akṣaṇikānām ekārthakriyāpratiniyamaṃ nirākartum upacayahetum āha -- api ca ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3592: yo 'sāv akṣaṇiko bhāvaḥ sakaleṣu sahakāriṣu svakāryaṃ karotītīṣyate,
T11arhebt_u:3594: yena hi kāraṇena tatkāryakriyāsvabhāvatvena tadā karoti tene(nai)
T11arhebt_u:3597: kācānyāmṛgyate yuktiḥyathātad dṛśyate tathā iti sarvatreyam apratihatā yuktir iti manyamānaḥkumārilaḥprāha -- kurvan dṛṣṭaḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3601: , prāk tat kurvan na dṛṣṭaḥ tena na karotīty ekārtha[kriyā]pratiniyamaḥ sidhyati akṣaṇikānām apīti /
T11arhebt_u:3602: bhāvo hi kāryaṃ karoti tajjananasvabhāvatayā na darśanabalenādṛṣṭasyāpi svakāryakaraṇāt ato nedam uttaraṃ sambadhyata ity upahasann āha -- aho mahāsāmarthyam ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3604: yasmād etad bhāvān kāryakaraṇasvabhāvavikalān api -- yadi kāryakaraṇasvabhāvatvād bhāvāḥ kāryaṃ kuryuḥ tadaitad evottaraṃ kiṃ noktam?
T11arhebt_u:3605: , yataḥ [S. 121a.] kāryakaraṇe darśanam uttarīkṛtam iti kṛtvā -- svabhāvamātreṇa ātmasattāmātreṇa
T11arhebt_u:3606: nānāprākāreṣu vyāpāreṣu niyuṅkte tat kathaṃ mahāsāmarthyaṃ na syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:3607: na cātra me kācid akṣamā[511]kintu yadi nāma kiñcit kāranaṃ kathañcid anādṛtasya
T11arhebt_u:3608: vā vyākṣiptasya vā atrabhavata iti pūjāvacanam {p. 122.1} darśanasya viṣayatām atikrāmet
T11arhebt_u:3610: aprasavo dharmo 'sya tad idam -- aprasavadharmakaṃ tato 'petasantānaṃ syād iti iyam asmākaṃ cintā cittaṃ dunoti /
T11arhebt_u:3611: para āha -- na vai vayam ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3612: naiva vayaṃ kāryakaraṇasvabhāvarahitānāṃ bhāvānām asmad darśanavaśāt kāṛyakriyāṃbrūmaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3621: kiṃ vayaṃ nyāyānurāgitayā nyāyyaṃ [T. 291a.] vacanam upalakṣayāmaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3622: uta bhavān eva sarvadā nyāyyavacanarahito 'pi kathañcin nyāyyam uktavān iti sañjātaparitoṣaḥ pṛcchati -- kiṃ tad?
T11arhebt_u:3623: ity āha -- svabhāvas teṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ kāryakriyādharmā kāryakaraṇadharmā tena kāraṇena
T11arhebt_u:3624: samastāh samagrāḥ pratyayāḥ sahakāriṇo yeṣāṃ teṣām akṛtvā kāryaṃ nopekṣāpattiḥ naudāsīny
T11arhebt_u:3625: apratipattiḥ iti satyam -- idam apy asti bhavato nyāyyaṃ vacanam iti,
T11arhebt_u:3626: kintu idam asi praṣṭavyaḥ -- [S. 121b.] so ['kṣepa]kriyādharmāsvabhāvaḥkiṃteṣāṃtadaivāntyāvasathāyāṃ samagrāvasthāyāṃ yadanantaraṃ kāryam utpadyate tadaiva utpannaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:3627: āhosvit prāg api parasparavirahāvasthāyām api āsīt? /
T11arhebt_u:3629: atatsvabhāvatve so 'kāraka eveti prāguktadoṣabhayāt para āha -- āsīt /
T11arhebt_u:3630: kutaḥ? pracyutaś ca utpannaś ca pracyutotpannaḥ[513],
T11arhebt_u:3631: tasya pratiṣedhaḥ apracyuto 'nutpannaḥ sthira ekaḥ svabhāvo yeṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ teṣāṃ kasmiṃścit kāle kasyacit svabhāvasya tatropalabdhasya abhāvavirodhāt
T11arhebt_u:3632: kṣaṇikeṣv eva hy ekadā dṛṣṭaḥ svabhāvo 'nyadā na bhavet tadā tasyānyatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:3635: syānmatam -- naivedam anena vākyena sadṛśam asmad vākyam ity āha -- ko vā'sya ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3636: yady etad anena tulyaṃ [T. 291b.] na bhavati tadā sakalasahakāryavasthāyāḥ[514]prāg
T11arhebt_u:3637: api ayam akṣepakriyāsvabhāvaḥ avilamvitakāryakaraṇasvabhāvaḥ kāryaṃca na karotīty
T11arhebt_u:3639: naiyāyikās tu manyante -- bhāvānāṃ sahakārisannidhānāsannidhānāpekṣayā kārakākārakasvabhāvavyavasthā,
T11arhebt_u:3641: tenāyam apracyutotpannasthiraikasvabhāvatve 'pi [S. 122a.] na prāg api svakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3651: śāliyavabījādīnām iva kathaṃ iva bhāvabhedo na syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:3652: na hi svabhāvād anyo bhāvaḥ yatas tadbhede 'pi na bhidyeta,
T11arhebt_u:3654: nanu coktaṃ svato janakājanakasvabhāvatāvirahāt pratyayāntarabhāvādyapekṣatvāt janakājanakarūpatāyās tadbhede 'pi kuto bhāvabhedaprasaṅgaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:3655: ,[515]tasyāparāpekṣasvabhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvāt[516]ity ata āha -- na hi sa sāhitye 'pi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3656: tadaitad uttaraṃ bhāvatkaṃ sambadhyeta[517]yadi bhāvo yo 'sau paraḥ sahakāritvābhimataḥ [T. 292a.] sannidhīyate tadrūpeṇa karttā syāt na svarūpeṇa
T11arhebt_u:3658: tathābhāve hi paramārthataḥ sa eva paraḥ[518]karttā syāt /
T11arhebt_u:3659: tatra tu kartṛtvavyapadeśaḥ [S. 122b.] kalpanānirmita eva bhavet /
T11arhebt_u:3661: na hi māṇavako dahanopacārād ādhīyate pāke /
T11arhebt_u:3662: tataś ca nāsyānupakāriṇo bhāvam apekṣeta kāryam iti tadrahitebhya eva {p. 124.1} sahakāribhyo bhavet /
T11arhebt_u:3664: teṣām api pararūpeṇa kartṛtve svayam akārakatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:3665: tataḥ sarveṣām evaṃ svayam akārakatve pararūpeṇāpy akārakatvāt sarvathā kārakocheda eveti na kiñcit
T11arhebt_u:3667: tasmāt svarūpeṇaiva bhāvaḥ svakāryasya karttā na pararūpeṇeti nāsyottarasyāvakāśaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3668: tato 'nyaḥ sahito 'nyaś ca kevalaḥ ity etad avicalam eveti /
T11arhebt_u:3669: atha yena svarūpeṇāyaṃ janakas tad asya sahitāsahitāvasthayoḥ sarvadā 'sti tadā svarūpaṃ
T11arhebt_u:3670: ca svakāryajanakam asya sthirasvabhāvasya prāg api sahitāvasthāyās tad eva yatsahitāvasthāyām
T11arhebt_u:3671: akṣepakriyāsvabhāvam iti tasmāt na kathaṃcit kāryakriyāvirāmaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3672: athavā kadācit paro brūyāt svahetubhir evāyaṃ pratyayāntarāpekṣaḥ [T. 292b.] svakāryajananasvabhāvo janita iti kevalo na karoti /
T11arhebt_u:3674: pratyayāntarāpekṣasvakāryajananasvabhāvatāyāḥ [S. 123a.] sarvadā bhāvāt ity ata āha -- na hi sa sāhitye 'pi ityādi /
