T11arhebt_u:3675: svarūpeṇaivāsya kartṛtvāt tasya ca prāg api bhāvāt pratyayāntarāpekṣāyāś ca tato labhyasyātmātiśayasyābhāvenāyogāt upakāralakṣaṇatvād asya,
T11arhebt_u:3677: kevalasya kāryakaraṇam anivāryam iti akurvataḥ kathaṃ sahitāvasthāyā na bhedaḥ syāt? iti bhāvaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3679: pratyayāntarasannidhānopalakṣitakāle kārakatvaṃ na prāg ity ayam arthaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3680: tataś ca kadācit kāryakriyāsvabhāvo na sarvadā iti bruvatā kathaṃ sarvadā kāryajananasvabhāvatā 'syoktā bhavati? /
T11arhebt_u:3681: nanv evaṃ svabhāvabheda evāsya tadatatkālayoḥ samarthitaḥ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:3682: tasmān nākṣaṇikānām ekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvam iti sthitam /
T11arhebt_u:3683: paraḥ 2samānadoṣatām āpādayann āha[519]-- yasyāpi ityādi subodham /
T11arhebt_u:3684: yadi nāma kṣaṇikas tathāpi kinna bhavati?
T11arhebt_u:3685: ity āha -- uktaṃyādṛśasya sahakāribhir apṛthagbhāvinaḥ kriyā /
T11arhebt_u:3686: `te[520]{p. 125.1} samarthā [S. 123b.] eva svabhāvato 'ntyāḥ pratyayāḥ saha jāyante kṣaṇikā yeṣāṃ [T. 293a.] prākpaścātpṛthagbhāvo nāsti' ity atra /
T11arhebt_u:3687: sa katham ekakṣaṇabhāvī ekasminn evāntye kṣaṇe bhavanaśilaḥ anyathābhavet antyakṣaṇāt prāk paścāt pṛthag vā bhavet?
T11arhebt_u:3688: yaścā anyathā bhavati sa evāntyakṣaṇabhāvī 4sahakārisantānopakṛtasvabhāvo 'kṣepakriyādharmā[521]na bhavatīti nāyam akṣaṇikapakṣoditaḥ prasaṅgaḥ[522]kṣaṇikapakṣe
T11arhebt_u:3691: kārako 'ntyaḥ akārakas tadanyaḥ tayor yaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa bhinno 'pi bhedāvivakṣayaikatvenoktaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3694: akārakasyāpi yo hetus tadanyaḥ sa bhinno 'py abhedavivakṣayaivaikatvenoktaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3695: tena kārakākārakayor yau svabhāvau tayor ekatra dharmiṇi virodhāt /
T11arhebt_u:3696: tathā tayoḥ svabhāvayor janakau yau hetū -- ekaḥ kārakasvabhāvajanako 'nyaś cākārakasvabhāvajanakaḥ -- tayor apy ekatra dharmiṇi virodhāt,
T11arhebt_u:3698: akārakasvabhāvajanakahetor utpannasyākārakasya svabhāvasyānyatvāt yaśca bhavati sa eva na bhavatīti nāyaṃprasaṅga iti /
T11arhebt_u:3716: aparas tv anyathā sthirarūpeṣv ekārthākriyāpratiniyamaṃ [S. 124a.] kalpitavān tam upanyasyati yo 'pi manyata ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3722: sa evaṃvidhasvabhāvo na kadācit sāhityaṃ svakāryakaraṇe 'pekṣate yato 'nyaḥ sahito 'nyaś ca kevalaḥ kārakākārakasvabhāvabhedāt syāt /
T11arhebt_u:3723: sa tarhi sarvadā tatsvabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ kinna karoti? iti cet /
T11arhebt_u:3729: tataḥ {p. 126.1} tadātmanaḥ kāryasya sahitebhya eva bhāvād ekārthakriyālakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvam akṣaṇikānām
T11arhebt_u:3731: siddhāntavādī pūrvadoṣānatikramam asya darśayann āha -- tasyāpi evaṃvādināḥ kathaṃsa
T11arhebt_u:3732: nityābhimato bhāvaḥ kevalaḥkaroty eva `akṣepakriyādharmaiva sa tasya svabhāvaḥ' iti [S.124b.] vacanāt /
T11arhebt_u:3735: tasmāt kevalān na bhavatīti tadavastho virodho yaḥ pūrvam uktaḥ. tathā hi -- yady
T11arhebt_u:3736: akṣepakriyādharmā tadā 'vaśyam anena kāryaṃ kartavyam na ced avaśyaṃ karoti katham
T11arhebt_u:3738: akṣepeṇa kāryadarśanād akṣepakriyāsvabhāvatā 'vagamyate [T. 294a.] nānyathā iti parābhiprāyāśaṅkayā ''ha -- na kevalaḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3739: naivaṃ mayoktaṃ kevalaḥ karoty eveti kintv akṣepakriyāsvabhāva iti /
T11arhebt_u:3741: yadi karoty eveti neṣyate katham akṣepakriyāsvabhāva iti kathyate? /
T11arhebt_u:3742: atha tathocyate tadā nanv etad evānena vacasāparidīpitam abhihitaṃ bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:3745: sa eva hy akṣepakriyāsvabhāvo yaḥ karoty eva,
T11arhebt_u:3746: yas tu nāvaśyaṃ karoti sa kathaṃ tadrūpaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:3747: yad apy uktaṃ `kāryasyaivāyam aparādho yat tasmiṃ(smin)
T11arhebt_u:3748: janakatayā 'vasthite pratyayāntarāṇy apekṣate' iti tad apy ayuktam,
T11arhebt_u:3749: yataḥ kāryaṃ cāyam akṣaṇiko bhāvaḥ kevalo 'pi samarthaḥsan paraṃ pratyayāntaram apekṣamāṇaṃkatham upekṣeta? naiva /
T11arhebt_u:3751: āha -- paraṃ pratyayāntaram anādṛtya tiraskṛtya etat [S. 125a.] kāryaṃ prasahya
T11arhebt_u:3753: ka evaṃ saty asya guṇo bhavati?
T11arhebt_u:3754: iti cet, āha -- evaṃhi param anādṛtya haṭhāt svakāryaṃ kurvatā'nena kevalenāpi samarthena satā yat tadātmanaḥ kevalasyāpi sāmarthyaṃ tad darśitaṃ prakāśitaṃ bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:3755: anyathā 'nyasahitasyaiva karaṇāt kevalasya ca kadācid apy akaraṇāt na `ayaṃ kevalo 'pi samarthaḥ' iti pareṣāṃ buddhiḥ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:3757: tasmād ayuktam ucyate kāryaṃ [T. 294b.] pratyayāntarāpekṣam iti /
T11arhebt_u:3758: {p. 127.1} kāryāpekṣayā 'pi virodhasya tādavasthyaṃ darśayann āha -- kāryaṃparam ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3759: kāryasya parāpekṣāṃ bruvan kevalāt kāraṇād anutpattim asya[527]kathayasi,
T11arhebt_u:3760: `sa kevalo 'pi samarthaḥ' itīdaṃ vadaṃs tataḥ kevalād utpattiṃ kāryasya brūṣe /
T11arhebt_u:3762: tata evaikasmāt kāraṇād utpattyanutpattī parasparaviruddhe katham ekatra kāryākhye dharmiṇi syātām?
T11arhebt_u:3764: ekatra te bruvāṇo `mātā ca vandhyā ca' ity anena sadṛśaṃ brūṣa iti na [S. 125b.] pūrvoktadoṣān mucyase,
T11arhebt_u:3765: yata evam api bruvāṇo viruddham eva brūte na ca lakṣayati tat tasmāt ayam akṣaṇikavādī
T11arhebt_u:3766: kṣaṇikapakṣasyānavadyatayā tadvādināṃ nirddoṣatāsampatsu amarṣalakṣaṇerṣyā eva śalyaṃ
T11arhebt_u:3767: antarduḥkhahetutvāt tena vitudyamānāni vyathyamānāni marmāṇi yasya so yamīrṣyāśalyavitudyamānamarmā
T11arhebt_u:3769: apy alakṣayan viklavam ākulaṃ pūrvāparāsambaddhaṃ vikrośati viroditi iti kṛtvā asvasthacittavacaneṣv
T11arhebt_u:3770: anādarāt taddoṣodbhāvanasya sutarāṃ duḥkhotpādanena kṣatakṣāraniṣekatulyatvāt upekṣām
T11arhebt_u:3773: tad evam akṣaṇikeṣu na kathañcid ekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ [T. 295a.] sambhavatīti pratipādyopasaṃhārann āha -- tasmād idam ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3774: yeṣāṃ hi sthirarūpatayā pṛthag api bhāvaḥ sambhavati teṣām akṣaṇikānāṃ pṛthak kevalānāṃ
T11arhebt_u:3775: kāryakaraṇasambhavena hetunā sahaiva kurvantīti sahakāritvaniyamāyogād idam ekārthakriyālakṣaṇaṃ
T11arhebt_u:3785: nanu atiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam api sahakāritvaṃ bhāveṣu dṛśyate tat katham uktaṃ prāk[528]`sarvatra naivātiśayotpādanaṃ sahakriyā,
T11arhebt_u:3786: kiṃ tarhi bahūnām ekārthakaraṇam eva' ity ata āha -- yatra tu santānopakāreṇa {p. 128.1} ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3787: ekārthakriyālakṣaṇam eva sahakāritvaṃ sarvatra na kvacid atiśayotpādanaṃ sambhavati /
T11arhebt_u:3789: bhāvāḥ sahakāriṇo vivakṣitakāryasya hetutāṃ pratipadyante- yathā taṇḍulādibhya odanādijanmani dahanodakādayaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3790: bījādibhyaś cāṅkurādijanmani pṛthivyādayaḥ -- tatra viśeṣotpādane pratyayānāṃ sahakriyocyate loke /
T11arhebt_u:3792: tya [T. 295b.] pūrvottarakṣaṇayor ekatvādhyavasāyena tasyaivāyam atiśaya iti na dravyāśrayeṇa /
T11arhebt_u:3795: pūrvakāraṇakalāpasyaikārthakriyālakṣaṇam eva tatra paramārthataḥ sahakāritvam iti
T11arhebt_u:3799: yadi tarhi kṣaṇike taṇḍulādidravye viśeṣo notpadyate,
T11arhebt_u:3801: tato yathā parasparato viśeṣamanāsādayanto 'pi kṣaṇikāḥ sahitā eva kurvanti na kevalāḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3804: na ca śakyaṃ vaktum -- yo yasya prāg akārakaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa paścād apīti /
T11arhebt_u:3805: tathā hi -- prabhāsvarād apavarakaṃ praviṣṭasyendriyam arthapratipattim akurvad api paścāt kurvāṇam upalabhyate / tad uktam --
T11arhebt_u:3809: ata āha -- na hi taṇḍulādīnām ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3810: viśeṣānutpattau sannidhānasyāpy asannidhānatulyatvāt [S. 127a.] dahanādibhāve 'pi taṇḍulādibhyo naudanajanma syāt /
T11arhebt_u:3811: [T. 296a.] tathā prabhāsvarād apavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo 'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyate tadā prāg iva paścād apy arthapratipattiṃ naiva janayet /
T11arhebt_u:3812: {p. 129.1} tasmād yad asambhavi kāryaṃ yatra dṛśyate tasya tato 'nyatvam eva,
T11arhebt_u:3813: śālibījād iva kodravabījasyeti niratiśayād anyatvam eva sātiśayatayā tatkāryakāriṇa iti /
T11arhebt_u:3814: evaṃ tāvad yatra sahakāribhyaḥ krameṇa kāryaṃ bhavati tatrātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam aupacārikaṃ sahakāritvam ekārthakriyālakṣaṇam eva tu mukhyaṃ tatrāpīti pratipāditam /
T11arhebt_u:3815: yatra tv akṣepeṇaivārthasannidhimātreṇa sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvanti kiṃ tatrāpi santānāśrayam atiśayotpādanam asti?
T11arhebt_u:3817: `ye hy avyavadhānādideśā indriyādayaḥ svahetubhyo jātās teṣv avilambitakāriṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati,
T11arhebt_u:3819: yadi na viśeṣotpattiḥ tadā kathaṃ nirviśeṣā jñānasya kāraṇī bhavanti?
T11arhebt_u:3820: ity ata āha -- tatra yathāsvaṃ yasya ye ātmīyāḥ pratyayāḥ taiḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3822: deśaś ca sa ādir yasyāvyavahitadeśādeḥ tatrāvasthānam avasthā yeṣāṃ te saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā
T11arhebt_u:3825: yadi hi svahetubhya eva parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrebhyaḥ svakāryajananakṣamā yogyadeśādyavasthānalakṣaṇaviśeṣayogino notpadyeran,
T11arhebt_u:3827: na tu svahetubhya eva tathāvidhānām utpattau /
T11arhebt_u:3828: yata evam iti tasmāt tatra teṣu akṣepakāriṣv indriyādiṣu ekārthakriyaiva mukhyaṃ sahakāritvaṃ na santānāśrayeṇa
T11arhebt_u:3830: atha viśeṣotpādanalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ kathaṃ na vyavasthāpyate? /
T11arhebt_u:3831: tad api hi loke pratītatvād vyavasthāpanīyam evety ata āha -- yatra tu kārye nāvyavadhānādideśopanipātamātreṇaivendriyādaya iva sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayatāṃ pratipadyante,
T11arhebt_u:3832: kintu {p. 230.1} vivakṣitakāryotpādānuguṇaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ viśeṣam utpādayantaḥ
T11arhebt_u:3833: tatra kālakṣepabhāvini kārye karttavye hetusantāno 'parāparakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇa ātmātiśayāsādanārthaṃ
T11arhebt_u:3836: tatas tebhyaḥ kāraṇāntarebhyaḥ svabhāvāntarasya kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣaparamparālakṣaṇasya pratilabhyaḥ santānasyaikatvenādhimuktasyocyate loke
T11arhebt_u:3837: paramārthas tu tatrāpi pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ pratyayakalāpa uttarottarakāryotpādānuguṇe [T. 297a.] viśiṣṭakṣaṇe pratiniyata ity ekārthakriyālakṣaṇam eva sahakāritvam
T11arhebt_u:3840: , yataḥ krameṇa kāryaṃ nirvarttayantīty ata āha -- tatra svarasataḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3841: tatra tasmin hetusantāne ye hetava upādānakāraṇākhyāḥ ye ca pratyayāḥ sahakārisaṃjñitās
T11arhebt_u:3842: teṣāṃ ye pūrve [S. 128b.] prathama upanipātakṣaṇāḥ teṣāṃ vināśahetvanapekṣitayā svarasato
T11arhebt_u:3843: nivṛttau satyāṃ tebhya eva svarasato nivarttamānebhyaḥ prathamakṣaṇebhyaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇena
T11arhebt_u:3846: evaṃ yāvad atyantātiśayavānantyaḥ kāraṇakalāpo jātaḥ tataḥ kāryasyotpattiḥ ity evaṃ sahakāribhyaḥ svabhāvāntarapratilambhaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3848: atra paraś codayann āha -- sahakāriṇaḥ saha karaṇaśīlāt kāraṇāt,
T11arhebt_u:3850: yat samutpannaviśeṣam anantaroktena prakāreṇa kāraṇaṃ antyasāmagrīkṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ tato
T11arhebt_u:3852: krameṇābhivarddhamānaḥ kāryasya janaka iṣyate tasyaiva utpattir na syāt prathamakṣaṇopanipātināṃ
T11arhebt_u:3853: [T. 297b.] parasparato viśeṣānāsādanāt kṣaṇānām avivekāt anabhyupagamāc ca /
T11arhebt_u:3854: parasparato 'navāptaviśeṣā eva kāryotpādanānuguṇaṃ viśeṣam ārapsyanta iti ced āha
T11arhebt_u:3858: tataś ca parasparato viśeṣotpādānapekṣiṇa eva sahakāriṇaḥ [S. 129a.] kāryaṃ kurvīran /
T11arhebt_u:3860: iti cet, āha -- tena yena kṣaṇikā api parasparato viśeṣotpādā 'napekṣā eva svakāryaṃ
T11arhebt_u:3861: kurvanti ekakāryapratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ ca sahakāritvaṃ pratipadyante tena kāraṇena
T11arhebt_u:3863: apekṣaṇīyebhyaḥsvabhāvātiśayotpattiśca na syāt ity akṣaṇikavādī kṣaṇikapakṣeṇa[531]svapakṣasya sāmyamāpādayati / yad āha -
T11arhebt_u:3873: iti / tatraitat syāt prathamakṣaṇe 'pi kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparataḥ samutpannaviśeṣā eva sannidhīyante --
T11arhebt_u:3875: iti nyāyād dhi dūradeśavarttinām api hetuphalabhāvāt ity āśaṅkyāha -- atha sahakāriṇā ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3876: sahakāriṇaḥ [T. 298a.] parasparasamparkkavikalā api vastudharmatayaivānyonyam upakurvantīti sahakāriṇā kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajananāya kṛtaviśeṣa eva samparkkakāla upatiṣṭheta,
T11arhebt_u:3878: tathā hi -- tadviśeṣotpattāv apy aparaḥ sahakārikṛto viśeṣo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3880: atha naivaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣanimittam aparaṃ viśeṣaṃ kurvanti,
T11arhebt_u:3881: svabhāvata eva tatra teṣāṃ yogyatvāt ity ata āha -- na ca ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3882: naiva hi sahakāriṇaḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇo yo viśeṣaḥ tadutpādane
T11arhebt_u:3883: nityaṃ sarvakālaṃ yogyāvasthā yena yogyāvasthatvena nityānuśaktaḥ nityānubaddhaḥ
T11arhebt_u:3884: eṣāṃ kṣitibījādīnāṃ {p. 132.1} kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanako viśeṣaḥ syāt yataḥ `aviśiṣtād
T11arhebt_u:3885: viśeṣotpattau kāryasyāpi syāt' ity etad api parihriyeta /
T11arhebt_u:3886: kuta etad? ity āha -- tadupāya ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3887: teṣāṃ kṣitibījādīnām upāye -- yogyadeśopanipāte kāryavyaktidarśanāt[532]apāye ca -- parasparasamparkkavirāme kāryānutpattidarśanāt /
T11arhebt_u:3888: yadi hi kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane sarvadā yogyāvasthāḥ syuḥ tadā so 'pi viśeṣaḥ sarvadā [T. 298b.] syāt /
T11arhebt_u:3889: tatas tatparamparābhāvi kāryam iti tadupāyāpāyayoḥ kāryasyotpattyanutpattī na syātām /
T11arhebt_u:3890: [S. 130a.] tasmān na sahakāriṇaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane yogyāvasthāḥ sarvadeti /
T11arhebt_u:3891: yataḥ sahakāriṇā pṛthagavasthitenānavasthābhayāt kṛtaviśeṣo nopatiṣṭhate parasparataś ca prathamasamparkkakṣaṇabhāvināṃ nopeyate[533]yujyate vā /
T11arhebt_u:3892: tena kāraṇenādyo viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ samānakālatayā nirupakārasya kṣitibījādeḥ notpadyate[534],
T11arhebt_u:3894: tena samagrāvasthāvat sarveṣāṃ vyagrāvasthābhāvinām api kṣaṇānām aviśeṣāt
T11arhebt_u:3896: yathā kṣaṇikānām ekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ tathā sthirasvabhāvānām
T11arhebt_u:3897: api bhaviṣyatīti kṣīṇasarvopāyo 'kṣaṇikavādī sāmyam evātura iva bahumanyamānas tatraiva
T11arhebt_u:3898: siddhāntavādī bhaṅgyā param upahasann āha -- nāsmākaṃpunaḥpunaḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3899: yadi punaḥ punar vacane 'pi lokasya nyāyapratītir bhavati śataśo 'pi brūmaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3900: kim aṅga punar dvau trīn vā vārān? /
T11arhebt_u:3901: na hi parārthapravṛttānām asmākaṃ punaḥ punar abhidhāne kaścid udvego bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:3902: evaṃ vādinaś ca śāstrakṛtaḥ kvacit prakārāntareṇa[536]tam evārthaṃ [T. 299a.] sphuṭīkurvato ye punaruktāparihārāya yat ante sa teṣām asthānapariśrama eva /
T11arhebt_u:3903: yadi nodvego hanta tarhy ucyatām ity ata āha -- na viśeṣotpādanād eva ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:3904: naiva viśeṣotpādanāt {p. 133.1} sahakāriṇāṃ sahakāritvaṃ paramārthataḥ kvacit [S. 130b.] sambhavati,
T11arhebt_u:3905: yataḥ prathamakṣaṇabhāvināṃ bījādīnāṃ tadabhāvāt kāryotpādānuguṇe viśeṣe karttavye sahakāritāvirahaḥ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:3906: kintv ekārthakriyaiva sahakāriṇāṃ pāramārthikaṃ sahakāritvaṃ pūrvoktābhir yuktibhiḥ sambhāvyate /
T11arhebt_u:3909: para āha -- sā 'py ekārthakriyā na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām /
T11arhebt_u:3910: yadi punaḥ parasparato viśeṣarahitānām api tadekārthakriyā 'ṅgīkriyate tadā pratyekaṃ tadavasthāyāṃ tadutpādanasāmarthyābhyupagamāt tadavasthāyām iva pṛthag api sā bhavet /
T11arhebt_u:3911: tathā hi -- te tadavasthāyām api parasparato nirviśeṣā eva kurvanti /
T11arhebt_u:3912: teṣāṃ pṛthag api tadviśeṣakriyā katham iva na prasajyeta? /
T11arhebt_u:3913: na hy eṣāṃ saṃhatāsaṃhatāvasthayoḥ kaścid viśeṣo 'stīti /
T11arhebt_u:3915: iti cet; tathāca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣasya pṛthakkaraṇaprasaṅge sati tasmād viśeṣād bhavanaśīlam aṅkurādi kāryam api viśeṣavat kevalāt sahakāriṇaḥ syāt iti cen manyase,
T11arhebt_u:3917: tathā hi -- saṃhatāsaṃhatāvasthayor nirviśeṣā eva kṣaṇakṣayiṇo bhāvā iti taducyate tat kiṃ tāvad viśeṣamātrāpekṣayā?
T11arhebt_u:3922: na hi kadācit kiṃcid ekam eva,
T11arhebt_u:3924: na ca tabhāve 'pi tat tādṛśam eva,
T11arhebt_u:3926: etāvat tu syāt -- kaścid viśeṣaḥ kvacit kārye 'nuguṇo na sarvaḥ sarvatreti /
T11arhebt_u:3927: etac ca prāg evoktam iti darśayann āha -- pratikṣaṇam aparāparaiḥpratyayaiḥ iti /
T11arhebt_u:3928: `aparāparapratyayayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yady api kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpāḥ pratīyante,
T11arhebt_u:3931: `kṣaṇikeṣu {p.134.1} bhāveṣv aparāparotpatter aikyābhāvāt'[538]iti cātra saṃkṣiptataram uktam /
T11arhebt_u:3932: evaṃ ca `nāsmākaṃ punaḥ punar vacana' ity atra dviḥ punargrahaṇaṃ yujyate /
T11arhebt_u:3933: yathā yena prakāreṇa bhāvasantāne viśeṣasyotpattiḥ [ta]d apy uktam
T11arhebt_u:3934: -- `tatra svarasataḥ pūrvakṣaṇanirodhe tebhya eva viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpādād viśeṣotpattiḥ'[539]iti /
T11arhebt_u:3935: atha kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakaviśeṣāpekṣayā prāgvat prathamasamparkkabhājaḥ parasparato nirviśeṣā ity abhimataṃ tad apy ayuktam /
T11arhebt_u:3936: yataḥ kāryotpādānuguṇasya viśeṣasya janakāḥ [S. 131b.] kṣitibījādayaḥ kīdṛśāḥ ye [T. 300a.] vyavadhānādirahitatvenopanipātinaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3937: tadbhāva eva tasya bhāvāt etāvanmātranibandhanatvāc ca 4janakaṃ vya(-kavya)vasthāyāḥ[540]/
T11arhebt_u:3938: te ca tathāvidhāḥ sarvadā na bhavantī kathaṃ pṛthag api kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣārambha eṣāṃ syāt?
T11arhebt_u:3939: , yataḥ kevalānām api kāryakriyā prasajyeta tad darśayati -- yogyo deśo yeṣāṃ te yogyadeśāḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3941: sā ādir yeṣāṃ avyavahitadeśatvādīnām avasthābhedānāṃ te tathoktāḥ,
T11arhebt_u:3942: te ca te avasthābhedāś ca tathoktāḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3946: naivaṃvidhāḥ sarvadā bījādaya iti katham eṣāṃ pṛthag api tathāvidhaviśeṣārambhaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:3947: etad api prāg evoktam `tatra yo 'vyavadhānādideśo rūpendriyādikalāpaḥ sa vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ'[541]iti vacanāt /
T11arhebt_u:3949: ihāpi tatra yo 'vyavadhānādideśaḥ kṣitibījādikalāpaḥ sa kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanane samartho hetur iti pratīyata eva /
T11arhebt_u:3950: sa ca [S. 132a.] tathāvidho viśeṣaḥ sarvadā na bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:3953: etad api pūrvam evoktam ity āha -- teṣāṃ ca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣa[janane] viśeṣavatāṃ
T11arhebt_u:3954: yata utpattis tad apy uktam asakṛd eva `yas teṣāṃ parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayaḥ pratyayaviśeṣaḥ
T11arhebt_u:3957: ye {p. 135.1} yogyadeśādyavasthā jātās te saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyanta'[543]ity anena,
T11arhebt_u:3959: tato yady apy eṣāṃ parasparato 'nupapatter[544]viśeṣo na bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:3961: na ca svahetuta eva sañjātaviśeṣāṇāṃ bhāve parasparatas tadāśaṃsā,
T11arhebt_u:3963: teṣāṃ ca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakānāṃ pratyayānāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthye 'pi khaṇḍaśaḥ kāryotpādāyogāt sakalasyaiva pratyekaṃ karaṇāt /
T11arhebt_u:3965: ekaikasya samarthasya bhāvasyābhāvād ity etad apy asakṛd evoktam `teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ
T11arhebt_u:3966: na paścāt na pṛthagbhāva iti samarthānāpi [S. 132b.] pūrvāparapṛthagbhāvabhāvino
T11arhebt_u:3969: aprasaṅgāt kutaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣārambhadvārakaṃ kāryam api syād iti? /
T11arhebt_u:3970: kutaḥ punar ayaṃ kāmacāro labhyate yadaṅkurādikāryaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇāṃ viśeṣaparamparāṃ janayantaḥ kurvanti,
T11arhebt_u:3971: kāryotpādānuguṇaṃ tu viśeṣaṃ vyavadhānādirahitadeśopanipātamātreṇety[546]ata āha -- kāryadvaividhyaṃca yasmāt tasmād evaṃvibhajyate /
T11arhebt_u:3973: ata āha -- sahakāribhir avyavadhānādideśair anantaraṃ sañjanitāḥ parasparasya prāgavasthāpekṣaviśiṣṭakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇā
T11arhebt_u:3976: anyac ca tadviparītaṃ yat sahakārisannidhimātreṇa bhavati na parasparakṛtāṃ viśeṣaparamparām apekṣate /
T11arhebt_u:3982: kuta etad? iti cet {p. 136.1} kāryakāraṇayoḥ svabhāvabhedāt /
T11arhebt_u:3985: kāraṇam api kiñcit [T. 301b.] svasannidhimātreṇa kāryajananasvabhāvaṃ svakāraṇebhya eva bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:3990: śālyaṅkuraś ca tadbījajanyasvabhāvo na yavādibījajanyasvabhāva iti na bhāvānāṃ svahetubalāyātāḥ pramāṇādhigatāḥ svābhāvāḥ paryanuyojyāḥ /
T11arhebt_u:3991: ye tu yajjananasvabhāvāḥ pramāṇato 'dhigatāḥ te kiṃ sarvadaiva tatsvabhāvāḥ?
T11arhebt_u:3994: tatra sarvadā tatsvabhāvatve paścād iva prāg api tatkāryakriyāprasaṅgena pararūpeṇākārakasya [S. 133b.] bhinnasvabhāvatā kārakākārakāvasthāyoḥ śāliyavabījādīnām iva tattvacintakair
T11arhebt_u:3995: ucyate / sadṛśāparabhāvanibandhanaṃ caikatayā pratyabhijñānaṃ lūnapunarjāteṣv iva keśanakhādiṣu 6ity atra[548]virodhābhāvād iti /
T11arhebt_u:3998: sati sahakāribhyaḥ kṣitibījādibhyas teṣāṃ parasparasantānopakāram apekṣate yat kāraṇam
T11arhebt_u:3999: antyavasthāprāptaṃ tasya yat kāryam aṅkurādikaṃ tajjanmanimittaṃ sahakāriṇāṃ prathamakṣaṇānantaraṃ
T11arhebt_u:4000: viśiṣṭadvitīyakṣaṇabhāvarūpo yo [T. 302a.] viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ ādyo bhavati
T11arhebt_u:4001: sa teṣāṃ sahakāriṇāṃ prathamasamparkkabhājāṃ parasparakṛto yo viśeṣas tajjanmā na
T11arhebt_u:4002: bhavati parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayād eva pratyayaviśeṣāt tasya bhāvāt /
T11arhebt_u:4003: tataḥ kāryotpādānuguṇād ādyād viśeṣāt prathamakṣaṇopanipātibhiḥ sahakāribhir anyataḥ [S. 134a.] samāsāditaviśeṣaiḥ janitāt tatprabhṛti ye viśeṣāḥ
T11arhebt_u:4005: kutaḥ? tatprakṛtitvāt tasyādyasya viśeṣasya parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayāt pratyayaviśeṣād āsāditatadanukūlaviśeṣaiḥ sahakāribhiḥ parasparopakāranirapekṣair
T11arhebt_u:4008: atha sahakāriṇā kṣityādinā kuśūlādyavastho 'pi bījādiḥ tenāpi kṣityādiḥ kṛtaviśeṣa evopatiṣthetānavasthaivaṃ syāt iti /
T11arhebt_u:4011: tatra yad uktaṃ pareṇa `yathā prathamasamparttabhājaḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparasya viśeṣamanād
T11arhebt_u:4013: tathā [S. 134b.] sthirarūpā api bhāvāḥ tadekakāryapratiniyatāḥ parasparakṛtaviśeṣanirapekṣā eva bhāviṣyanti' iti,
T11arhebt_u:4015: kṣaṇikavad akṣaṇiko 'pi yadi kāryaṃ karoti karotu nāma /
T11arhebt_u:4017: kintu yena svabhāvena kāryaṃ karoti sa yadi avilambitakāryakartṛdharmā apekṣeṇa karotīty evaṃśīlo dharmo yasya sa tathoktaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4018: tadā pṛthagbhāvasya sambhavāt kevalo 'pi na kevalaṃ sahitaḥ tathāsyāt tatkāryakārakaḥ syād ity uktaṃ bahuśaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4019: atatsvabhāvas tu akṣepakartṛsvabhāvavikalas tu tadā'pi sahitāvasthāyām api prāgvat akāraka eva pararūpeṇa kartṛtvasya pūrvam eva niṣedhāt /
T11arhebt_u:4020: tad evam ekārthakriyayā viśeṣotpādanena cākṣaṇikānāṃ sahakāritvaṃ niṣidhyopasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4021: dvividhasyāpi sahakāritvasyāyogān naivākṣaṇikasya kaścit [T. 303a.] sahakārīti kevalo
T11arhebt_u:4022: 'pi svakāryaṃ kuryād iti sahakāripratyayāpekṣasyākṣaṇikasya hetutāṃ bruvāṇasya kiṃ
T11arhebt_u:4023: yuktam iti [S. 135a.] darśayann āha -- prāyas tu ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4024: yo hi sthirahetuvādī tasya yadi sa hetuḥ pratyayāntarāṇy apekṣya kāryaṃ karoti tadā vyaktam avaśyaṃ tasya sthirasya hetoḥ pratyayāntarāpekṣakārakasya svabhāvāntarasyotpattir iti /
T11arhebt_u:4026: yataḥ sahakāriṇāṃ yaḥ saṃghātaḥ sannipātaḥ tatsthāyī tatra varttamāno bhāvasantānaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4027: prāyaḥ bāhulyena sahakāripratyayair upajanitaviśeṣaḥ san svakāryaṃkurvan dṛṣṭo {p.
T11arhebt_u:4031: tatsambhavino nyāyasyākṣaṇikeṣu pṛthagbhāvasambhavena kathañcid api kalpayitum aśakyatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:4032: prāgakārakasya paścāt kārakasvabhāvāntarotpattis tu na virudhyate /
T11arhebt_u:4033: tasyaiva hy akārakasya tadātmā kārakaḥ svabhāvo na yujyate na tv atadātmā /
T11arhebt_u:4037: atha matam -- kārakasvabhāvāntarotpattir iṣyate yadi sthirasya hetoḥ prāg api kārakasvabhāvo [S. 135b.] na syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4038: tasya tu prāg api bhāvāt pratyayāntarāpekṣā tadutpattir apy ukteti ata āha -- kārakasya ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4039: yadi hi samagrāvasthāyāḥ prāg api kārakasvabhāvo bhavet tadā 'syākriyā na yujyate,
T11arhebt_u:4044: yadi ca pratyayāntarair apy asau na kriyeta tat 2kim iti mudhaiva tāny apekṣate?[550]iti /
T11arhebt_u:4063: [549] na ghaṭābhāva iti nānāvasthā prāg -- T
T11arhebt_u:4066: tad evaṃ `tatsvabhāvasya jananāt'[551]ity asya `yo yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetor evotpadyamānaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4067: tādṛśo bhavati na punas tadbhāve hetvantaram apekṣate'[552]ity asyānekāntaparihārāyoktasya
T11arhebt_u:4068: prakārāntareṇānekānte udbhāvite tatparijihīrṣayā aparāparapratyayayogena[553]ity ādy abhihitam /
T11arhebt_u:4069: tatra yena nyāyena kṣaṇikānāṃ hetuphalasvabhāvaḥ tasyākṣaṇikeṣv asambhavaṃ pratipādayituṃ
T11arhebt_u:4070: prāsaṅgikaṃ yad upakrāntaṃ tat parisamāpayya prakṛtam anubadhnann āha -- tasmād yo yadātmā ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4071: yadi svabhāvenāsthitidharmaṇo bhāvasya [S. 136a.] na nāśakāraṇaiḥ prayojanaṃ svabhāvena sthitidharmaṇo bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- sthitidharmaṇo 'pi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4072: sthitidharmaṇo 'pi hi naiva nāśakāraṇaiḥ kiñcit prayojanam /
T11arhebt_u:4073: tasya svahetubhyaḥ samupajāto yaḥ sthiraḥ svabhāvaḥ {p. 139.1} tadanyathātvasyāsthirātmatāpatteḥ kenacit karttum aśakyatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:4074: kāmaṃ hi bhāvāḥ svayaṃ na bhaveyuḥ / na
T11arhebt_u:4075: tu santa eva svaṃ svabhāvaṃ parityajanti /
T11arhebt_u:4076: atha sthitidharmaṇo 'py anyathātvapratipattir iṣyate tadā 'nyathātvapratipattau vā tatsvabhāva eva sthitidharmaiva na syāt,
T11arhebt_u:4077: ātmabhūtasyāsthitidharmaṇaḥ svabhāvasya paścāt sambhave prāg apy abhāvaāyogāt /
T11arhebt_u:4081: tathā ca sati pūrva eva vikalpaḥ svabhāvenāsthitidharmā bhāva iti /
T11arhebt_u:4082: tatra ca pūrvavikalpe prāg evoktaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ vināśahetor vaiyarthyam iti /
T11arhebt_u:4084: kevalam asyāsthirasvabhāvatā prāg asati vināśahetor upajāyate,
T11arhebt_u:4085: anyathā nivṛttyayogād ity ata āha -- yaśca parasmāt nāśahetoḥ sthitidharmaṇaḥ [S. 136b.] sataḥ anyathābhāvaḥ asthitidharmatālakṣaṇo bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:4086: sa pūrvakāt sthitidharmaṇaḥ svahetusamudbhūtāt svabhāvāt aparaḥ anyaḥ svabhāvas tasmin niṣpanne paścā[j janya]tvād bhinnahetukatvāc ca kathaṃtasya svabhāvaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:4088: sārūpyād alakṣitavivekasya tathā pratibhāsanaṃ syāt yady asau [T. 304b.] pūrvasvabhāve saty evānyato bhavet /
T11arhebt_u:4091: yaś cāparaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa kathaṃ tasya? /
T11arhebt_u:4094: yo 'paraḥ svabhāvaḥ sa kim iti tasya na bhavati?
T11arhebt_u:4096: bhavatu vastvantaram eva tadaparasvabhāvatayā ko doṣaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:4097: ity ata āha -- tathāca vastvantaratve sati vināśahetor upajāyamānasya svabhāvasya
T11arhebt_u:4098: pūrvako bhāvaḥ svahetubhyo yaḥ sthitidharmā [S. 137a.] jātaḥ so 'cyutidharme sthito
T11arhebt_u:4100: vināśahetor vastvantarotpattau vyāpṛtatvād iti na tasya sthitidharmaṇo 'nyathābhāvo nivṛttiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4101: na hi mudgarāder vastvantarasya bhāve 'parasya nivṛttir yuktā,
T11arhebt_u:4103: tadupamarddena tadutpattau ca prāg eva proktam /
T11arhebt_u:4104: {p. 140.1} nanu ca dṛśyata eva kaṭhinādirūpasya tāmrāder agnyāder vināśahetor dravādisvabhāvāntarotpattiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4105: na ca pūrvakasya pracyutidharmatā ity ata āha -- etena anantaroktena kaṭhinādīnām
T11arhebt_u:4109: kathaṃ tarhi svabhāvāntarotpattiḥ pūrvasya cāpracyutidharme sthitasyābhāvo [T. 305a.] yuktaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:4110: ity āha -- tatrāpi kaṭhinādirūpe tāmrādau pūrvakasya kaṭhinadravādirūpasya svarasanirodhitvāt vināśahetvayogena /
T11arhebt_u:4112: sahakāriṇaḥ parasparopasarppaṇādyāśraya pratyayaviśeṣopajātātiśayād upādānāc ca yat tat kaṭhinādirūpaṃ tāmrādi svarasato virudhyate /
T11arhebt_u:4113: tata eva upādānakāraṇād agnyādisahakārikāraṇopādānapratyayopajātaviśeṣād apara eva anya eva dravakaṭhinādisvabhāvo dravagrahaṇasyopalakṣaṇatvāt,
T11arhebt_u:4114: [S. 137b.] utpanno na tu pūrvakam eva kaṭhinadravādirūpaṃ tāmrādi vyavasthitātmakaṃ dravakaṭhinādisvabhāvena pariṇatam iti /
T11arhebt_u:4115: atra para āha -- kenoktaṃ yathā `sthitidharmaṇaḥ sato 3vināśahetor asthitisvabhāvotpattis[555]tato vināśaḥ' iti,
T11arhebt_u:4116: yena `yaś ca parasmād anyathābhāvaḥ so 'paraḥ svabhāvaḥ' ityādy ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:4117: kintu sa svayaṃ sthitidharmaiva svahetubhir janito nāsyāsthirasvabhāvatā vināśahetor upajāyate /
T11arhebt_u:4118: kathaṃ jñāyate yathā `svahetubhiḥ [T. 305b.] svabhāvena sthitidharmaiva janitaḥ' iti? /
T11arhebt_u:4120: yadi svabhāvenāsthitidharmā svahetor jātaḥ syāt tadā tadasambhave 'pi nāvatiṣṭheta /
T11arhebt_u:4121: tasya svabhāvena sthitidharmaṇaḥ svahetubhir evāyam aparaḥ svabhāvo niyamito yaduta parasmāt virodhino 'gnyāder vināśaḥsvayaṃbhavatīti /
T11arhebt_u:4122: parasmād iti karmaṇi lyaplope pañcamī paramapekṣya ity arthaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4123: svahetubhir evāyaṃ {141.1} niyamitasvabhāvo jāto yathā tvayā virodhinam apekṣya svayaṃ nirva(va)
T11arhebt_u:4127: nanu yady asya vināśo virodhisannidhāne svayam eva bhavaty ahetukaḥ prāpnoti,
T11arhebt_u:4128: ahetoś ca deśakālasvabhāvaniyamo na yukta ity ata āha -- na ca naiva vināśo nāma vinaṃṣṭur aparaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4131: [S. 138a.] tasyāś ca niḥsvabhāvatvād dhetumattā naiva yujyate /
T11arhebt_u:4133: kevalam asau svayam eva na bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:4138: [T. 306a.] nanu ca kālāntarasthitidharmatām upagacchato naiva nityavikalpasyāvakāśaḥ / na /
T11arhebt_u:4140: tathā hi -- yady ayaṃ saṃvatsarasthitidharmā svahetubhir janitas tadā saṃvatsaraparisamāptau
T11arhebt_u:4141: yo 'syādāv udayakāle saṃvatsarasthitidharmā svabhāvo yato 'yaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ sthitaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4146: vināśahetusannidhau svayaṃ nivarttata iti copagamād anityavikalpo naśvarātmatāvikalpaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4147: tathā hi -- vināśahetvabhimatasannidhau svayaṃ vinaśyato yo 'sya svabhāva sa eva bhāvasyaikarūpatvād utpannamātrasyeti tadaiva vināśaprasaṅgāt katham asya
T11arhebt_u:4149: evaṃ vikalpe kṛte pāścātyavikalpopagame kālāntarasthitir evāsya truṭyatīti nityavikalpa evānenopagantavyaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4150: tatra [S. 138b.] vināśahetusannidhau svayaṃ nāśopagame prāṅ nityo bhūtvā paścād anityo [T. 306b.] vinaśvarasvabhāvo bhavatīti brūte /
T11arhebt_u:4155: yo 'sau nityaḥ svabhāvaḥ prāktanaḥ tasya nityābhimatasya svayaṃ paścān nāśaṃ bruvāṇaḥ sarvadā pratikṣaṇam eva nāśaṃ prāha /
T11arhebt_u:4156: anyathā pūrvoktena nyāyena paścād api nāśāsambhavāt /
T11arhebt_u:4157: atha pratikṣaṇam asya nāśo na bhavati tadā paścād api tadayogāt sarvadaivānāśaṃ prāheti kṛtvā pūrvasminn ity ābhimate svabhāve vināśahetur asamartho 'kiñcitkara eva /
T11arhebt_u:4158: nanu ca vināśahetor naiva sāmarthyam upagataṃ pareṇa virodhisannidhim apekṣya svayaṃ nāśopagamāt / na /
T11arhebt_u:4160: anyathā hy akiñcitkaraḥ kim ity asāv apekṣyate?
T11arhebt_u:4162: svahetava evātrāparādhyanti yadakiñcitkare 'pi tatrāpekṣāyāṃ niyuñjata iti cet /
T11arhebt_u:4163: kaḥ punar ayam asthānābhiniveśaḥ teṣāṃ yat tatra tathā niyuñjate /
T11arhebt_u:4167: na hy asyāvirodhitvābhimatād[559]viśeṣaḥ kaścid iti yatkiñcid etat /
T11arhebt_u:4168: yad apy uktaṃ `yathā 'nyeṣāṃ kṣaṇikavādinām akiñcitkaram api mudgarādikam apekṣya
T11arhebt_u:4169: [S. 307a.] ghaṭādipravāho nivarttate tathā 'smākam api kālāntarasthāyī bhāvaḥ' iti
T11arhebt_u:4171: yato nāsmākaṃ pravāho nāma kṣaṇavyatirikto 'sti yo 'kiñcitkaramudgarādisannidhau nivartteta /
T11arhebt_u:4173: te ca svanivṛttau na mudgarādikam apekṣante,
T11arhebt_u:4175: yā tu teṣāṃ kapālādivṛttilakṣaṇā paryudāsavṛttyā nivṛttiḥ yasyāṃ satyām ekatvābhiniveśino
T11arhebt_u:4176: lokasya sadṛśāparabhāvarūpasya vibhramanimittasyāpagamāt `nivṛttā ghatādayaḥ' iti vyavahāraḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4179: vegavan mudgarādisahakāriṇo ghaṭakṣaṇāt parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayāt {p. 143.1} pratyayaviśeṣāt [S. 139b.] sañjātātiśayāt kapālāder bhavanadharmatvāt tasya tajjananasvabhāvād iti /
T11arhebt_u:4180: svabhāvadvayopagamaprasaṅgād iti parijihīrṣayā para āha -- na prāg ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4183: sarvadaikasvabhāvasya sarvadā nityataiva na paścād anityasvabhāvatāsambhava iti /
T11arhebt_u:4184: siddhāntavādy āha -- sa tarhi bhāvaḥ [T. 307b.] sarvadā nityasvabhāvaḥ svabhāvena nāśamanāviśan apratipadyamānaḥ 1kathaṃ naiva naṣṭo (kathaṃ naṣṭo) nāma[560]? /
T11arhebt_u:4187: upasaṃharann āha -- yata evaṃ sthitidharmaṇāṃ vināśo naiva yujyate tasmāt sati asya
T11arhebt_u:4188: vināśe yady avaśyambhāvī kṛtakarūpasya sato vināśa iṣyate parais tadā vināśasvabhāvena
T11arhebt_u:4192: tena kṛtakarūpeṇa satā vastunā svahetubhyo bhavitavyam anyathā 'vaśyambhāvitayopagatasya kṛtakātmanāṃ satāṃ vināśasyaivāyogāt /
T11arhebt_u:4194: āha -- tathāpi svayaṃ vināśasvabhāvatve 'pi [S. 140a.] na kevalam avinaśvarasvabhāvatve
T11arhebt_u:4195: svabhāvānyathātvāsambhavād vyartho vināśahetur iti prathamavikalpopanyāsa evoktam na punar ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:4197: tad evaṃ vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣām asāmarthya-vaiyarthyābhyāṃ taddhetvayogena kṛtakalakṣaṇasya
T11arhebt_u:4198: sattvasyapūrvācāryadarśatāṃ pratipādya yathā 'sau viparyaye bādhakapramāṇatām anubhavati
T11arhebt_u:4199: tad darśayann āha -- tasmād vināśa ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4200: prayogas tv evam -- ye yadbhāvaṃ pratyanapekṣās te tadbhāvaniyatāḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4202: anapekṣaś ca kṛtakarūpaḥ san bhāvo vināśe {p. 144.1} 'vaśyambhāvivināśatayogataḥ parair iti svabhāvahetuprasaṅgaprayogo viparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃpūrvācāryapradarśitam
T11arhebt_u:4204: nāśasyākādācitkatvād udayānantaraṃ nāśa iti yaḥsan kṛtakalakṣaṇo bhāvaḥ sa vināśī
T11arhebt_u:4205: vinaśvarasvabhāvo naśvaratāyāḥ sādhyadharmasya nivṛttau ca kṛtakalakṣaṇasattvanivṛttir
T11arhebt_u:4206: iti kṛtvā kṛtakalakṣaṇasya sattvasya kṣaṇikatāyām anvayavyatirekasiddhiḥ sampadyate
T11arhebt_u:4208: tad evaṃpūrvācāryān prati akṛtakasya sato 'bhāvāt sadakāraṇavan nityam [VaiSū 4.1.1.] iti nityalakṣaṇavirahād eva na tannityatvam /
T11arhebt_u:4209: yat tu [S. 140b.] sad utpattimat tad uktena nyāyenāvaśyaṃ nāśitayopagataṃ paraiḥ kālāntarasthāyi na bhavatīti prati pāditam /
T11arhebt_u:4222: yadā tu yat sat tat kṣaṇikam eveti sāmānyenocyate kṛtakākṛtakalakṣaṇaṃ sato bhedam anapekṣya prauḍhavāditayā kṛtakasyāpi cāvaśyambhāvī vināśa iti paropagamo [T. 308b.] nāpekṣyate,
T11arhebt_u:4223: tadā vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣatvam eva sarvasya na sidhyati /
T11arhebt_u:4225: dṛṣṭo ghaṭādīnāṃ teṣām eva taddhetvayogāt tatrānapekṣā yujyate /
T11arhebt_u:4226: ye tu deśādivyavahitāḥ parvatādayo vā vināśam āviśanto na dṛṣṭāḥ teṣām avaśyaṃ vināśitvopagamanibandhanābhāvād
T11arhebt_u:4227: antye 'py ayaṃ vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣa eva vinaśyann 'viśeṣād ādāv api tadbhāvaniyata
T11arhebt_u:4229: vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣatvāsiddher akṛtakānāṃ cākāśādīnāṃ vināśisvabhāvasāpekṣāṇām ity
T11arhebt_u:4230: anapekṣayā sato naśvarasvabhāvatā 'siddheḥ anvayavyatirekayos tannibandhanayor ayogam
T11arhebt_u:4231: utpaśyann arthakriyāvirodhalakṣaṇam eva tadā bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ tādātmyaprasādhakam
T11arhebt_u:4232: abhidhānīyam iti manyamānaḥ pūrvapakṣam utthāpayann āha -- svabhāvato naśvaratve
T11arhebt_u:4233: 'py uktena {p. 144.1} nyāyena paridṛśyamānavināśānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ kaścid deśādivyavahitaḥ[562]parvatādir
T11arhebt_u:4234: vā 'nupalabdhavināśaḥ kṛtako 'pi sadrūpa ākāśādir vā 'kṛtakaḥ [S. 141a.] san na 'tatsvabhāvo
T11arhebt_u:4238: tataś ca vināśisvabhāvasāpekṣatvāt tadanapekṣatvam asiddham iti tadvaśāt[564]sādhyasya [T 309a.] kṣaṇikatvasya sattvasvabhāvatvāsiddheḥ tannibandhanā nānvayavyatirekasiddhir iti /
T11arhebt_u:4239: kiṃ punar atrāśaṅkānimittaṃ yena kaścid atatsvabhāvo 'py āśaṅkyata ity āha -- na hi sarvaḥsarvasya svabhāvaḥ iti /
T11arhebt_u:4240: vicitrasvabhāvā hi bhāvā dṛśyante -- kecit[565]sapratighāḥ kecid[566]apratighāḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4242: tathā kecid vināśinaḥ anye tv avināśisvabhāvāḥ śaṅkyanta iti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā /
T11arhebt_u:4247: yataḥ[567]sattvasya kṣaṇikatvasvabhāvatayā 'nvayavyatirekasiddhir ity ata āha -- śaktir hi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4258: evaṃ manyate -- iha tāvad idam eva vicāraṇīyam [S. 141b.] kiṃ lakṣaṇam etad bhāvānāṃ sattvaṃ yuktam iti /
T11arhebt_u:4262: vandhyāsutādīnām asattvāt kathaṃ sattāyogaḥ? iti cet / na /
T11arhebt_u:4264: yatas teṣām asattvaṃ sattāyogavirahād eva [T. 309b.] tadvirahaś cāsattvād iti /
T11arhebt_u:4265: yadi ca satām eva sattāyogaḥ evaṃ tarhy anyat sattvalakṣaṇam abhidhānīyam sattāyogasya ca vaiyarthyam,
T11arhebt_u:4268: evaṃ sati yad evārthakriyāsāmarthyayuktaṃ tasyaiva sattāyoga ity arthakriyāsāmarthyam eva bhāvalakṣaṇamāyātam ity apārthakaḥ sattāyogaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4270: anyathā sāmānyādīnāṃ kathaṃ svarūpaṃ sattvaṃ syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:4271: arthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ tu sarveṣām astīti tad eva bhāvalakṣaṇam /
T11arhebt_u:4277: yathā ca dhrauvyaṃ na tathotpādavyayāv iti naikaṃ vastu yathoktalakṣaṇaṃ [S. 142a.] syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4278: tato 'nyasya bhāvalakṣaṇasyāyogāt śakteś cāntaśaḥ svajñānajanane 'py upagamāt paraiḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4281: sarvagrahaṇaṃ ca sarvasya vastuno vastvantaraśaktiviraharūpatvād abhāvatānirāsārtham /
T11arhebt_u:4282: yasya tu na kvacicchaktiḥ sa evaikāntenābhāva ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:4283: śaktilakṣaṇam eva sattvam akṣaṇike syāt tataḥ kṣaṇikātmatā [T. 310a.] sattvasya na sidhyatīti kuto 'nvayavyatirekau?
T11arhebt_u:4284: iti cet, āha -- na caivākṣaṇikasya kvacit kārye 'ntaśo jñānalakṣaṇe 'pi śaktir asti tat kutas tasya tallakṣaṇaṃ sattvam atītāder iva bhaviṣyati?
T11arhebt_u:4286: nanu ca śakter atīndriyatvāt kāraṇānāṃ kāryārambhaniyamābhāvāc ca kathaṃ tadviraho
T11arhebt_u:4288: sattvaṃ kṣaṇikātmatām evānubhavet yato 'nvayavyatirekau syātām ity ata āha -- kramayaugapadyābhyām ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4289: naiva pratyakṣataḥ [S. 142b.] kāryavirahād vā sarvaśaktiviraho 'kṣaṇikatve ucyate,
T11arhebt_u:4291: tathā hi -- kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ kāryakriyā vyāptā prakārāntarābhāvāt /
T11arhebt_u:4292: tataḥ kāryakriyāśaktivyāpakayos tayor akṣaṇikatve {p. 147.} virodhāt nivṛttes tadvyāptāyāḥ
T11arhebt_u:4293: kāryakriyāśakter api nivṛttir iti sarvaśaktivirahalakṣaṇam asattvam akṣaṇikatve vyāpakānupalabdhir ākarṣati,
T11arhebt_u:4295: tato nivṛttaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikeṣv evāvatiṣṭhamānaṃ tadātmatām anubhavatīti -- `yat sat tat kṣaṇikam eva' ity anvayavyatirekarūpāyā vyāpteḥ siddhir niścayo bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:4296: nanu ca prakārāntarābhāvāt kāryam aṅkurādikaṃ bījādinā kramayaugapadyābhyām eva kriyata ity ucyate sa eva tu prakārāntaravirahaḥ [T. 310b.] kāryātmanaḥ kutaḥ siddhaḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:4300: tataḥ prakārāntareṇārthakriyāsambhavāt kramayaugapadyanivṛttāv api nārthakriyāsāmartthyanivṛttir iti kuto 'kṣaṇikatve sati sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇam
T11arhebt_u:4303: [S. 143a.] tathā hi -- kramo nāma paripāṭiḥ kāryāntarāsāhityaṃ kaivalyam aṅkurādeḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4307: kevalasya vā 'bhāve pratyakṣabodhagamyamāne saty upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpta eva svabhāvaḥ kramayaugapadyabhāvabahirbhūto nopalabhyate /
T11arhebt_u:4308: vastunaḥ upalabhyasyānyasāhitye kaivalye cāpanīte tadviviktadeśādipratibhāsinaḥ[569]pratyakṣasyodayāt svabhāvānupalambhata evābhāvaniścayādilakṣaṇavyavahāravṛtteḥ
T11arhebt_u:4309: tasya cāṅkurādibhāvasyāvasthādvayabahirbhāvaniṣedhe kayościddeśakālayoḥ deśāntarādau krameṇāṅkurādibhāvavatītarasmin vā bhāve 'pi na kācit kṣatiḥ
T11arhebt_u:4310: tataḥ pratyakṣata eva [T. 311a.] prakārāntarābhāvasiddheḥ kathaṃ kramayaugapadyābhyām arthakriyāśaktir avyāptā syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:4311: śāstrakāras tu yathā pratyakṣatā eva prakārāntarābhāvasiddhiḥ tathā svayam etena kramākramādayo 'pīti atidiśan vakṣyati /
T11arhebt_u:4312: {p. 148.1} anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatve 'pi prakārāntarasya kramayaugapadyayor anyo 'nyavya[S.143b.]vacchedarūpatvād evāśrayasi(-d evābhāvasi)
T11arhebt_u:4313: ddhiḥ tathā hi -- anyonyavyavacchedarūpāṇām ekaniṣedhenāparavidhānāt tasyā[570]'pratiṣedhe vidhipratiṣedhayor virodhād ubhayapratiṣedhātmanaḥ prakārāntarasya kutaḥ sambhavaḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:4314: atra prayogaḥ -- yatra yatprakāravyavacchedena yaditaraprakāravyavasthānaṃ na tatra prakārāntarasambhavaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4319: [573] ca tato bahirbhāvalakṣaṇa ity anayos tattvā 'nyatvarūpayor anyonyaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:4323: viruddhopalabdhiṣu bahirddharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvam upadarśya virodhasādhanam eva bādhakam,
T11arhebt_u:4325: tato viruddhayor ekatrāsambhavāt pratiyogyabhāvaniścayaḥ śītoṣṇasparśayor iva bhāvābhāvayor iva veti kuto 'navasthā? /
T11arhebt_u:4326: tatra na krameṇākṣaṇikaḥ kāryāṇi karoty aviśeṣād akārakāvasthāyām iva /
T11arhebt_u:4334: anyathā prāg apy akārakarūpāviśeṣād kriyā syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4336: śaktāśaktatayā tarhy ekatraiva kārye bhedaprasaṅgaḥ śālikodravabījāder iva /
T11arhebt_u:4337: nityaś ca yadā yugapat karoti tataḥ prāg api bhāvāt tadaiva tatkriyāprasaṅgaḥ punas tato 'pi pūrvataram ity evaṃ [S. 144b.] na kadācid yugapat kriyā syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4338: pūrvottarakālayoś caikadā yugapat kāriṇo 'nyadā {p. 149.1} sarvārthakriyāsāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇam asattvaṃ syād iti kathaṃ na kṣaṇikatā? /
T11arhebt_u:4342: tanānāmasattvaprasaṅgāt[575]kṣaṇikatāyām eva sattvam iti yat sat tat kṣaṇikam eveti sato naśvarātmatāsiddheḥ anvayavyatirekarūpavyāptisiddhir iti //[576]
T11arhebt_u:4353: [576] T. adds here brāhmaṇācataviracite vivaraṇe svabhāvahetvadhikāraḥ prathamaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4355: tad evaṃ svabhāvahetau tādātmyasiddhinibandhanam anvayavyatirekaniścayaṃ pratipādya
T11arhebt_u:4356: kāryahetau kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhinimittatvāt tayos tasyāś ca pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhanāyāḥ
T11arhebt_u:4357: prāg eva darśitatvāt tadgatam aparam api pareṣāṃ bhrāntikāraṇam apanetuṃ tadviṣayaṃ
T11arhebt_u:4358: darśayann āha -- arthāntare hetor vyatirikte vastuni gamye kāryaṃhetuḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4359: anarthāntare tu svabhāvo hetur ity uktam /
T11arhebt_u:4360: kasmāt [S. 145a.] punar arthāntare kāryam eva hetur ity āha -- avyabhicārāt iti kāryam
T11arhebt_u:4361: eva hy arthāntaraṃ na vyabhicarati nānyat yathoktaṃ prāk tataḥ kāryam evārthāntare
T11arhebt_u:4363: na ca kenacit ity[577]7ādinā yaḥ[578]sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaprasaṅgaācāryeṇoktaḥ parasya,
T11arhebt_u:4364: tam ihāpi kāryahetau paraḥ kadācit prasañjayed ity āśaṅkamāna āha -- kāryakāraṇa- ityādi [T. 312b.] yadi hi kāryaṃ hetur ucyate tadā kāryakāraṇabhāvena kāraṇenāsya gamakatvam /
T11arhebt_u:4365: tathā ca sati sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ prāpnoti /
T11arhebt_u:4366: agneḥ sāmānyadharmavad viśeṣadharmā api tārṇapārṇādayo gamyāḥ syuḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4367: dhūmasyāpi viśeṣadharmavad dravyatvapārthivatvādayo 'pi sāmānyadharmā gamakā bhaveyuḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4370: sa ca nāgnidhūmayor aṃśena api tu sarveṇa prakāreṇa /
T11arhebt_u:4371: tathā hi -- yathā agnir agnitvadravyatvasatvādibhiḥ sāmānyadharmair janakaḥ tathā tārṇapārṇatvādibhir viśeṣadharmair api,
T11arhebt_u:4372: yathā ca dhūmo dhūmatvapāṇḍutvādibhiḥ svaniyatair viśeṣadharmair janyaḥ tathā [S. 145b.]
T11arhebt_u:4374: tataś ca yathā tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tathaiva gamyagamakabhāvaḥ prāpnoti,
T11arhebt_u:4376: atrāha -- na sarvathājanyajanakabhāvaḥ tataś ca kutas tathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:4378: {p. 151.1} tadbhāve teṣāṃ tārṇapārṇatvādīnāṃ viśeṣadharmāṇām abhāve bhavato dhūmamātrasya tebhya eva viśeṣadharmebhyo bhavatīti evam ātmanaḥ tadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt /
T11arhebt_u:4379: tathā tadabhāve agnyabhāve bhavato dravyatvādeḥ [T. 313a.] sāmānyadharmasyāgner evāyaṃ bhavatīty evaṃrūpasya tadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt kutaḥ sarvathā janyajanakabhāvaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:4381: na hy asati tadutpattiniyame janyajanakabhāvo vyavasthāpayituṃ yuktaḥ[579]/
T11arhebt_u:4382: yata evaṃ tasmāt kāryaṃ dhūmādikaṃ svabhāvair yāvadbhir dhūmatvādibhiḥ svagataiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4384: ca tṛtīyā / avinābhāvi vinā na bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:4387: kāraṇāśritair yāvadbhiḥ [S. 146a.] svabhāvair vinā te kāryagatāḥ svabhāvā na bhavanti hetuḥ tais teṣām iti gamyate /
T11arhebt_u:4390: idānīṃ kāraṇasthaiḥ svabhāvair yāvadbhir agnitvadravyatvādibhir avinābhāvi teṣāṃ kāraṇagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmāṇāṃ hetuḥ kāryaṃ gamakam /
T11arhebt_u:4391: kasmāt? ity āha -- tatkāryatvaniyamāt teṣām eva kāraṇagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmāṇāṃ tat kāryam ity evaṃrūpasya niyamasya sadbhāvāt /
T11arhebt_u:4392: na hi tān sāmānyadharmān kadācid api kāryaṃ vyabhicarati /
T11arhebt_u:4393: evaṃkāraṇagatam aṃśaṃ pāścātyenārthena[580]nirūpya prāktanenārthena2 kāryagatam aṃśaṃ nirūpayann āha -- tair eva ca ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4394: kāryam api tair eva dharmaiḥ [T. 313b.] svagataiḥ kāraṇagatānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ gamakam
T11arhebt_u:4398: teṣām eva kāryagatānāṃ viśeṣadharmāṇāṃ kāraṇagatasāmānyadharmāpekṣayā kāryatvaniyamāt /
T11arhebt_u:4399: na hi te viśeṣadharmāḥ kāryagatāḥ [S. 146b.] kāraṇasthasāmānyadharmair vinā kadācid api bhavanti /
T11arhebt_u:4402: tad evaṃ kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmā eva gamyā na viśeṣadharmāḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4403: kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmā eva gamakā na sāmānyadharmāḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4406: viśeṣadharmā yais tatkāryatvaniyamaḥ kāryamātrasya nāstīti na te gamyāḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4407: ye ca kāryasya sāmānyadharmā dravyatvādayas teṣām api tatkāryatvaniyamābhāvād eva
T11arhebt_u:4408: gamakatvaṃ nāstīti kāryakāraṇabhāvena gamakatve kutaḥ sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4416: [ § 2. janyajanakabhāvasya sarvathā sattve 'pi gamyagamakabhāvasya na tathātvam /]
T11arhebt_u:4418: yadi hi kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmā eva gamyāḥ kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmā eva gamakāḥ tatkāryatvaniyamād iṣyante,
T11arhebt_u:4420: kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmā eva janakā na viśeṣadharmāḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4421: kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmā eva janyā na sāmānyadharmā iti syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4427: yadi hi kāryasya taiḥ kāraṇagatair viśeṣadharmair janyo yo viśeṣaḥ sa grahītuṃ śakyate,
T11arhebt_u:4429: tathā liṅgaviśeṣo dhūmatvādiḥ upādhir viśeṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ dravyatvādīnāṃ sāmānyānāṃ kāryagatānāṃ
T11arhebt_u:4431: tathā hi -- agurudhūmagrahaṇe bhavaty eva tadagner anumānaṃ dhūmatvaviśeṣaṇena ca dravyatvādinā 'gner anumānam /
T11arhebt_u:4432: na hi sarvathā janyajanakabhāvo 'stīty eva tathaiva gamyagamakabhāvo bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:4434: tathā hi -- na sattāmātreṇa liṅgasya gamakatvam,
T11arhebt_u:4436: jñāpako hi svaniścayāpekṣo jñāpyam arthaṃ jñāpayati, nānyathā /
T11arhebt_u:4438: sarvathā janyajanakabhāvābhyupagame [T. 314b.] tadabhāve bhāvasyaivābhāvād ity ata[h13]āha -- aviśiṣta ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4439: yadi hi tajjanyaviśeṣagrahaṇarahitam aviśiṣṭaṃ kāryamātram upādīyate liṅgaviśeṣopādhirahitaṃ
T11arhebt_u:4440: vā dravyādikaṃ tadā aviśiṣṭasāmānyavivakṣāyāṃ kāraṇagataviśeṣābhāve 'pi dhūmamātrasya
T11arhebt_u:4441: bhāvāt tadaviśiṣṭasya ca dravyatvāder agnyabhāve 'pi bhāvād vyabhicāra iti sarvathā [S.
T11arhebt_u:4446: tathā hi -- yadi nāma dhūmamātraṃ tārṇapārṇādiviśeṣābhāve bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:4451: tathā yady api dravyatvasattvamātram agnyabhāve 'pi bhavati na tu dhūmātmakam iti tadviśiṣṭasyāvyabhicārād gamakatvam api na vāryata iti /
T11arhebt_u:4456: atra parasya vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkyāha -- kasyacit dhūmādeḥ kadācit kasmiṃścit kāle
T11arhebt_u:4457: kutaścit agnyādeḥ bhāve 'pi sati sarvo dhūmādiḥ tādṛśo yādṛśa ekadā 'gnyāder bhavan dṛṣṭaḥ tajjātīyaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4458: tathāvidhajanmā yathāvidhāt sa eko bhavan dṛṣṭaḥ tādṛśād eva janma yasya sa /
T11arhebt_u:4461: tathā hi -- yadi nāma pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kasyaciddhūmasyāgnyādisāmagrīkāryatvam avagataṃ kim etāvatā 'nyasyāpi [S. 148a.] tādṛśasya tādṛśakāryatā
T11arhebt_u:4463: tatraiva hi tayor vyāpāras tasyaiva tatkāryatā bhavatu,
T11arhebt_u:4466: evaṃ hi kasyāściddhūmavyakter agnyādijanyatā dṛṣṭeti kinna ghaṭāder
T11arhebt_u:4470: iti cet; tathā ca pramāṇābhāvena tathāvidhajanmatvāniścayād atādṛśād api janmāśaṅkāyāṃ tādṛśasya dhūmāder agnyādinā 'nvayavyatirekau na niścitāv iti kutaḥ kāryahetor ggamakatvam? /
T11arhebt_u:4471: na hi yo 'smāv eko deśakālāvasthāniyato 'gniviśeṣahetuko dhūmo 'dhigataḥ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ tasyaivānvayavyatirekau pratipattavyau /
T11arhebt_u:4474: tādṛśasya sāmānyātmana eva liṅgatvāt tasya cātathāvidhād api janmāśaṅkāyāṃ kutas tathāvidhenānvayo vyatireko vā? / tad uktam -
T11arhebt_u:4479: evaṃ manyate -- ihaikadā dhūmāder agnyādisāmagrījanyatayā [S. 148b.] pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ
T11arhebt_u:4480: niścitarūpatve 'pi tādṛśasyātādṛśād api bhāvaḥ samāśaṅkyate yathāparidṛṣṭād anyatvena /
T11arhebt_u:4481: tatra yo 'sāv agnyādisāmagrījanyo dhūmaviśeṣa ekadā niścitas tadapekṣayā yathā 'nyo dhūmaviśeṣas tādṛśo yo 'nyādṛśād api -- bhāvānāṃ vicitraśaktitayā -- bhaved iti śaṅkyate,
T11arhebt_u:4482: tathā so 'py ekadā 'gnyādisāmagrījanyatayā niścitas tadanyāpekṣayā tādṛśa eva /
T11arhebt_u:4483: tatra yadi tad anyasya tādṛśasyātādṛśāj janma syāt 3tadā tādṛśasya[587]svabhāvasya
T11arhebt_u:4487: tato bhavan dṛṣṭo dhūmaḥ so 'pi na bhavet /
T11arhebt_u:4488: na hi yad yasya kāraṇaṃ na bhavati tat tataḥ sakṛd api jāyate,
T11arhebt_u:4490: atadbhāvinaḥ iti tacchabdena vivakṣitam agnyādikāraṇaṃ parigṛhyate,
T11arhebt_u:4493: atasmād[589]bhavituṃ [T. 316a.] śīlaṃ {p. 155.1} yasya tasyātadbhāvinas tādṛśasya tallakṣaṇasya dhūmavastunaḥ sakṛd api ekadā 'pi [S. 149a.] tataḥ agnyādeḥ abhāvād bhāvavirodhāt /
T11arhebt_u:4494: bhavati ca tādṛśo 'gnyādisāmagrītaḥ tatas tādṛśasya svabhāvasya tādṛśam eva kāraṇam ity avagamyate sakṛtpravṛttābhyām eva pratyakṣānupalambhābhyām iti kuto vyabhicārāśaṅkā? /
T11arhebt_u:4495: tena yādṛśo dhūmo 'gnyādisāmagryā bhavan dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛt tādṛśasya tasya tajjanyasvabhāvatayā tādṛśād eva bhāvāt `yatra dhūmas tatrāgnyādisāmagrī' ity anvayavyatirekaniścayaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4496: athavā 'nyathā vyākhyāyate -- iha pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhanā kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ prāguktā tannibandhanāv anvayavyatirekau 6pratipādayitum,
T11arhebt_u:4498: tathā hi -- kasyacit dhūmasyāgnyādisāmagryanantarabhāvina ādyasya kadācit prathamotpādakāle
T11arhebt_u:4499: kutaścid agnyādisāmagryāḥ bhāve 'pi utpāde 'pi sarvas 7tādṛśo yādṛśaḥ[591]prathamakṣaṇabhāvī
T11arhebt_u:4500: dhūmo dvitīyādikṣaṇeṣv api tādṛśaḥ pratyakṣata eva tasya pūrvakṣaṇāvilakṣaṇatayā pratīteḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4501: tathāvidhajanmā iti yathāvidhād agnīndhanasāmagrīlakṣaṇāt kāraṇād ādyo dhūmakṣaṇa
T11arhebt_u:4502: utpannas tathāvidhāj janma yasya sa tathāvidhajanmety etat kutaḥ naiva tasya dhūmāder
T11arhebt_u:4504: evaṃ ca yadyato dṛṣṭaṃ tasyānyato 'pi bhāvasya darśanāt sarvatrānāśvāsa [S. 149b.] iti anyamāna āha -- tathāca anagnito dhūmād api dhūmasya
T11arhebt_u:4505: bhāve śakramūrddhāder api tasya bhāvāvirodhād agninā dhūmasya nānvayavyatirekāv iti cen manyasa iti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā /
T11arhebt_u:4508: prathamadhūmakṣaṇajanito dhūmakṣaṇas tādṛśo 'paraprathamadhūmakṣaṇajanita eva dvitīyo dhūmakṣaṇo na tṛtīyādiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4509: evaṃ tṛtīyakṣaṇādiṣv apy aṅkurādiṣu ca sarvatra vācyam /
T11arhebt_u:4511: iti cet, āha -- atadbhāvinaḥ atasmād -- anagnīndhanādirūpād dhūmād [T. 317a.] bhavanaśīlasya
T11arhebt_u:4512: prathamakṣaṇāvilakṣaṇasya dhūmasya sakṛd api [S. 150a.] ekadāpi tataḥ agnyādisāmagryāḥ
T11arhebt_u:4514: yathā hi prathamakṣaṇāpekṣayā dvitīyas tādṛśas tathā tadapekṣayā prathamo 'pīti tādṛśatvāviśeṣāt tādṛśasyānagnito bhāve tādṛśo nāgnijanyasvabhāvaḥ iti sakṛd api tato na bhavet /
T11arhebt_u:4515: bhavan vā tajjanyasvabhāvatām ātmanas tādṛśaḥ khyāpayatīti kuto 'nyādṛśād bhavet?
T11arhebt_u:4516: tasmād anyādṛśād bhavann anyādṛśa eva tato na vyabhicāraḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4528: nanu sarveṣāṃ 2dhūmakṣaṇānāṃ kaṇṭhakṣaṇanākṣisrutikālīkaraṇādikāyām[593]arthakriyāyām upayogāt kathaṃ tādṛśasvabhāvatā na syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:4529: na, tasyā apy arthakriyāyāḥ kṣaṇabhedopadhīyamānarūpāyāḥ tādṛśatvābhāvāt tatrāpi tulyadoṣatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:4530: kathaṃ tarhi loke sarvatra dhūmavyavahāraḥ iti cet;
T11arhebt_u:4532: sādṛśye sati kathaṃ na tādṛśatā? iti cet /
T11arhebt_u:4534: tathā hi -- gosadṛśo bhavati gavayaḥ na tu tādṛśaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4536: paramārthenātādṛśe 'pi tādṛśābhimāno [S. 150b.] mandamatīnāṃ bhavan kathaṃ nivāryeta? /
T11arhebt_u:4537: tathā hi -- tattvādhyavasāyo 'pi tāvad -- atasminn arvāgdṛśāṃ [T. 317b.] vinivārayituṃ na pāryate,
T11arhebt_u:4541: tattvacintakās tu tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇabhedāt tādṛśātādṛśatāṃ bhāvānāṃ anumanyante na tādṛśatām /
T11arhebt_u:4542: tad yady atādṛśād api tādṛśo bhavet tadā tasya tajjanyaḥ svabhāva ity atadbhāvinaḥ sakṛd api tato bhāvo na syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4543: amum evārthaṃ samarthayamāna āha -- parasparāpekṣayā ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4546: yato hi kāraṇād yad bhavad dṛṣṭam tasya tajjanyasvabhāvaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4550: yadi nāmaivaṃ tataḥ prakṛte kiṃ siddham?
T11arhebt_u:4551: ity ata āha tatra evasmin nyāye sati yadi dhūmo yādṛśa ādyo 'gnyādisāmagrījanitas
T11arhebt_u:4555: tadā tasya tādṛśasya dhūmasvabhāvasya tajjanyo 'gnyādisāmagrījanyaḥ svabhāvo na bhavati kintu dhūmajanya eveti kṛtvā sakṛd api tato 'gnyādisāmagrīto na bhavet /
T11arhebt_u:4557: nāgnyādijanyasvabhāvateti kutaḥ sakṛd api tato 1bhāvo yujyate[596]/
T11arhebt_u:4559: yathā hy arthāntaram[597]atajjanyābhimatam anyato bhavat na tajjanyasvabhāvaṃ nāgnyādisāmagrījanyasvabhāvam
T11arhebt_u:4560: iti sakṛd api tato na bhavati tadvat tādṛśo dhūmo 'pīti tato bhavann anyādṛśa evāsāv iti gamyate /
T11arhebt_u:4561: syānmatam -- agnyādisāmagryā 'sāv atajjanyasvabhāvo 'pi tādṛśo balāj janyate kas tasya tapasvino 'parādhaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:4562: ity ata āha -- nāpi na kevalaṃ svayam atajjanyasvabhāvatayā tato na bhavet,
T11arhebt_u:4563: kintv agnyādisāmagry api taṃ tādṛśaṃ dhūmaṃ -- yādṛśo dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvī {p. 158.1} -- na janayet /
T11arhebt_u:4566: tādṛśasya hy anyato bhāve sa eva tajjananasvabhāvo nāgnyādisāmagrīti tajjananasvabhāvavikalā kathaṃ taṃ janayet ? /
T11arhebt_u:4568: yathā sāmagryantaram atajjananasvabhāvābhimataṃ [S. 151b.] na janayati tadvad agnyādisāmagry api /
T11arhebt_u:4569: tathā hi -- sā ātmīyaṃ svabhāvam anusṛtyaiva pravarttate,
T11arhebt_u:4578: syānmatam -- agnyādisāmagrījanyasvabhāvo 'pi tādṛśo 3dhūmo dhūmajanyasvabhāvo[598]'pi yathā sa eva dhūma indhanajanyasvabhāvo 'gnijanyasvabhāvaś cobhayato [T. 318b.] bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:4579: tathā tādṛśo 'pi dhūma ubhayasāmagrījanyasvabhāvatayobhayato bhaviṣyatīty ata āha
T11arhebt_u:4580: -- na ca naiva dhūmasya tādṛśasya tadatajjanyaḥ agnyādisāmagrījanyo dhūmajanyaś ca
T11arhebt_u:4584: na hi tasya kālabhede 'pi tādṛgrūpatā bhidyate /
T11arhebt_u:4586: tasya yadi tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇajanyatā syāt tatas tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvataiva syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4587: tad eva darśayann āha -- dhūmā'dhūma ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4594: kuta etat? ity āha -- kāryasvabhāvānām ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4595: kāryāṇāṃ hi ye svabhāvāḥ parasparāsaṃbhavinaḥ te parasparavilakṣaṇakāraṇasāmagrīsvabhāvakṛtā na svābhāvikā ahetukatvaprasaṅgāt /
T11arhebt_u:4598: kāryāṇām utpattimātra eva 6kāraṇāpekṣaṇād ity ata[601]āha -- akāraṇāpekṣaṇe ca tādṛśātādṛśarūpatāyāṃ tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇānapekṣaṇe ca tādṛśātādṛśatāyāḥ ahetukatvaprasaṅgāt /
T11arhebt_u:4599: na hi tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvayor abhūtvā bhāvavyatirekeṇānyā kācidutpattiḥ yatra[602]tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvakāraṇanirapekṣāṇām api tadapekṣā syāt
T11arhebt_u:4601: [S. 152b.] tatra kāraṇāpekṣopagame kathaṃ tādṛśātādṛśatāyāṃ kāraṇāpekṣā na syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4602: tasmāt sāmagrīṇāṃ tādṛśātādṛśatvād eva kāryāṇāṃ tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvavibhāga iti kuto 'nyādṛśāt tādṛśasambhavaḥ? iti /
T11arhebt_u:4603: yat tūktaṃ `yathaiko dhūmo 'gnīndhanābhyāṃ vilakṣaṇābhyāṃ janyate tathaikalakṣaṇam api kāryaṃ vilakṣaṇād api sāmagryantarād bhaviṣyati' iti
T11arhebt_u:4605: yato nāsmābhir vilakṣaṇānāṃ janakatvaṃ vāryate janayanty eva parasparavilakṣaṇā api svahetupariṇāmopanidhidharmāṇas tadavasthāniyatāḥ tad ekaṃ
T11arhebt_u:4606: tasya tu teṣāṃ ca parasparāpekṣayā [T. 319b.] janyajanakasvabhāvatāniyamāt tādṛśasya tādṛśād eva janmocyate nānyādṛśāt,
T11arhebt_u:4610: yadi tv agnir ivendhanopādānopakṛtas tadupādānopākṛtaṃ cendhanam iva tadavasthāniyatam
T11arhebt_u:4611: atādṛśam api 2dhūmādikaṃ tādṛśaṃ[603]dhūmaṃ janayet pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ ca tathā
T11arhebt_u:4612: 'vagamyeta tadā 'gnyādivat so 'pi tajjananasvabhāvatāniyamāt tādṛśajanakaḥ kena nānumanyeta /
T11arhebt_u:4613: tu tādṛśasya bhāve tayor janyajanakasvabhāvatāniyamābhāvāt kutaḥ kāryakāraṇatety ahetutaiva tādṛśasyānyādṛśād bhavataḥ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4614: yata evaṃ tasmāt so 'gnīndhanādisāmagrīviśeṣo mantavyo yaḥ ādyadhūmajanano nānyaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4615: sa dhūma ādyo yaḥ agnyādisāmagrīviśeṣeṇa janito nānya {p. 160.1} iti kṛtvā kāryakāraṇayor
T11arhebt_u:4616: evaṃ yathoktena nyāyena janyajanakarūpasya svabhāvasya 4niyamād yādṛśaṃ yasya[605]karaṇam
T11arhebt_u:4617: ekadā pratyakṣānupalambhābhyām evāvadhāritaṃ tadvijātīyāt tato 'nyādṛśāt kāraṇāt
T11arhebt_u:4618: utpattiḥ tādṛśasya [S. 153b.] kāryasya na bhavati anyādṛśasya eva na vāryata iti /
T11arhebt_u:4620: āha -- tat tasmāt yādṛśaṃ [T. 320a.] kāryaṃ yādṛśāt kāraṇāt dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ
T11arhebt_u:4621: niścitam ekadā tat tan na vyabhicarati tādṛśam anyādṛśān na bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:4622: yanaivaṃ tena kāraṇena siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve tādṛśasya kāryasya tādṛśam eva kāraṇam
T11arhebt_u:4623: iti niścaye sati yathoditena nyāyena kāryasya kāraṇena vyāptir anvayavyatirekarūpā siddhābhavati /
T11arhebt_u:4624: na vijātīyād utpattir iti dṛṣṭakāraṇavijātīyāt kāraṇād anyādṛśān notpattir ity amum artham apratipadyamānaḥ kāryasya {na (? s. p. xxxv)
T11arhebt_u:4625: } vijātīyāt kāraṇān notpattir ity ayam atrārtho 'bhimata iti manvānaḥ paraś codayann
T11arhebt_u:4626: āha -- nanu svato vijātīyād api kāraṇāt kiñcit kāryaṃ bhavad dṛṣṭaṃtat [S. 154a.]
T11arhebt_u:4627: kathaṃ na vijātīyād utpattir ity asya na dṛṣṭavirodhaḥ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4628: kathaṃ yathā[606]ity āha -- tad yathāgomayādeḥ ādigrahaṇāt śṛṅgacandrakāntādeḥ śālūkādi ādigrahaṇāc charodakādi /
T11arhebt_u:4629: tathā hi -- gomayāc chālūkasya bhāvaḥ śṛṅgāc charasya candrakāntādapām /
T11arhebt_u:4630: na ca gomayādikaṃ śālūkāder na vijātīyam tat kim ucyate na vijātīyād utpattiḥ iti /
T11arhebt_u:4631: siddhāntavādī parasya bhrāṃtatāṃ darśayann āha -- na vijātīyād utpattiḥ iti /
T11arhebt_u:4632: yato hi kāraṇād yad bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ tat tato 'nyādṛśyān na bhavati ity ayam
T11arhebt_u:4636: tad āha -- tathāvidham eva hi gomayādirūpaṃ tādṛśāṃ śāla{ū}kādīnām[608]ādinimittaṃ
T11arhebt_u:4637: śālūkādiprabandhasya7 ya ādiḥ prathama ārambhakṣaṇaḥ tasya kāraṇam iti kṛtvā śālūkādipabandhasyāder7
T11arhebt_u:4638: na {p. 161a.} kāraṇabhedo 'nyādṛśād utpattiḥ [T. 320b.] sarvasya tadā ''der ggomayādinimittatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:4639: yadā tu prabandhena pūrvakṣaṇanimittānām uttarottarakṣaṇānāṃ santānenotpattilakṣaṇā vṛttir bhavati śarasya tadā 1śarād bhāvaḥ[609]/
T11arhebt_u:4640: tad evaṃ yasya prabandhādeḥ śṛṅgādibhyo bhāvo na tādṛśasya śarādeḥ yasya ca [S. 154b.]
T11arhebt_u:4641: śarādes taduttarottarasya bhāvo na tādṛśasya 2śṛṅgāder iti[610]na dṛṣṭakāraṇavijātīyāt
T11arhebt_u:4642: kāraṇāt tādṛśasya sambhava iti kāryahetor anvayavyatirekaniścayaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4644: tadā 'pi gomayādibhyaḥ keṣāñcidbhāve 'pi tādṛśatvābhāvān na vyabhicāra iti darśayann
T11arhebt_u:4646: yasya śālūkasantānasya gomayādi kāraṇaṃ yasya ca sarvadā svajātinimittatvaṃ tayor
T11arhebt_u:4647: gomayetarajanmanoḥ śālūkayor asty eva svabhāvabhedaḥ parasparam anyādṛśatvaṃ rūpasyābhede 'pi sati /
T11arhebt_u:4650: yasmān nākāratulyataiva bhāvānāṃ tattve tādṛśatve nimittam yato gomayetarajanmanoḥ śālūkayor ākārasāmyāt tādṛśatvam eva syān na jātibhedaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4651: kuta etat ? ity āha -- abhinnākārāṇām api ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4652: yeṣām api hi samānākāratā [S. 155a.] keṣāñcid bhāvānāṃ teṣām api yata ākārād anyato [T. 321a.] viśeṣāj jātibhedo dṛśyate tato nākārasāmyam eva jāty ekatve nibandhanam /
T11arhebt_u:4654: 'pi kvacit puṣpād bhedo dṛśyate nīletarakusumayor iva sūryayoḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4658: kvacit prabhāvāt sparśopayogasraṃsinyor iva haritakyor iti /
T11arhebt_u:4659: tasmād ākārasāmyanibandhanaṃ yady api `tad evedam' iti pratyabhijñānaṃ sajātīyatāṃ
T11arhebt_u:4660: gomayetarajanmanoḥ śālūkayor upakalpayati tathāpi vilakṣaṇasāmagrījanyatayā tayor
T11arhebt_u:4663: tata eva pratyabhijñānasya bhrāntatayā tatkalpitasya tādṛśatvasyālīkatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:4680: yadi punar gomayetarādijanmanaḥ śālūkāder agnidhūmādijanmano vā dhūmādeḥ pratyabhijñāvaśād vilakṣaṇasāmagrīnibandhanatve 'pi samānasvabhāvataiva syāt ko doṣaḥ syāt?
T11arhebt_u:4681: ity ata āha -- anyathā hi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4682: yadi [S. 155b.] hi yā svajāti[lakṣaṇapratyayāntarasahitā sāmagrī yā ca] svajātinirapekṣā gomayādirūpā śālūkādeḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4683: dhūmasya vā yā 'gnīndhanādilakṣaṇā [T. 321b.] yā ca śakramūrddhādisvabhāvā dhūmādyātmikā avi(-kā tasyāḥ vi)
T11arhebt_u:4684: lakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryā avilakṣaṇam tādṛśam eva kāryaṃ dhūmaśālūkādikam utpadyeta
T11arhebt_u:4685: tadā na `kāraṇasya' sāmagrīrūpasya bhedābhedābhyāṃ vailakṣaṇyāvailakṣaṇyābhyāṃ kāryasya
T11arhebt_u:4686: bhedābhedau vailakṣaṇyāvailakṣaṇye tajjātīyavijātīyātmake syātām iti kṛtvā viśvasya
T11arhebt_u:4687: sakalasya padārtharāśeḥ ahetukau bhedābhedau sajātīyavijātīyatve syātām /
T11arhebt_u:4689: sāmagrī tatra kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpatve 'pi vijātīyataiva kāryasyeti /
T11arhebt_u:4690: nanu dhūmendhanādisāmagrībhede 'pi dhūmasya na jātibhedamāmanti vidvāṃsaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4694: śābaleyādyavāntarajātibhedepy agovyāvṛttinibandhanagojātivad gavāṃ [S. 156a.] sarvadhūmānām ekasantānavyavasthāvyu(py u)
T11arhebt_u:4697: tathā hi -- agurukarpūracandanādijātibhedam anukurvanty eva [T. 322a.] taddhūmāḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4704: tasmād indhanam eva tasyopādānakāraṇam agnyādisahakāripratyayāhitaviśeṣaṃ tathāvidhaṃ dhūmakāryamaṅgārādi bhinnākṛti janyatīty alam atiprasaṅgena
T11arhebt_u:4705: nanu ca yadi nāma sāmagrībhede 'pi kāryasya bhedo na jātaḥ tadā kāraṇabhede saty api tasyābhāvāt tasyāhetukatā 'stu,
T11arhebt_u:4707: yenobhayor ahetukatvam ucyata ity ata āha -- tathāhi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4708: yadā hi sāmagrībhede [S. 156b.] saty api kāryasya bhedo na jāta iti tasyāhetukatvam
T11arhebt_u:4709: -- na hi hetau saty abhavataḥ kathañcid api hetumattopapadyate -- tadā yo 'py asāv
T11arhebt_u:4712: yathā hi hetau saty abhavato na hetumattā tathā hetāv asaty api bhavato hetumattā kutaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:4714: na tarhy ayaṃ bhedaḥ kvacit padam ābadhnīyāt,
T11arhebt_u:4715: śālīkodravāder api [T. 322b.] hetubhedasyābhedahetutvān nimittam antareṇa kalpanāyāṃ viśeṣābhāvāt /
T11arhebt_u:4716: pratibhāsābhedasya ca kutaścid bhrāntinimittāt paramārthato bhede 'py upalakṣaṇāt /
T11arhebt_u:4717: syād etat -- yo hy atādṛśād api tādṛśodbhavam
T11arhebt_u:4718: icchati tasya bhedābhedayor ahetukatvam iṣṭam eva bhāvā eva kevalaṃ hetumanta ity ata āha -- tadvyatiriktaśca ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4719: na hi bhedābhedavyatiriktaḥ kaścid bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo 'sti yas tayor ahetukatve 'pi hetumān syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4720: tasya tābhyām anyatve `asyemau bhedābhedau' iti[619][S. 157a.] sambandhābhāvaprasaṅgāt,
T11arhebt_u:4722: ananyatve 'pi bhedābhedayor bhāvasvabhāvasya ca svātmanyevāvasthānāt anupakārāc ca kutaḥ sambandhitā? /
T11arhebt_u:4723: upakārakalpanāyāṃ ca yadi bhāvasvabhāvaḥ svahetubhya[620]eva na kutaścid bhinno 'bhinno vā samutpanna itīṣyate,
T11arhebt_u:4724: tadā tadbhāve[621]'pi svabhāvānyathātvābhāvāt kuto bhinnābhinnatā bhāvasvabhāvasya syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:4726: tāv api yadi bhinnau tadā bhāvasvabhāvas tadavastha eveti na tasya kutaścit svarūpato bhedo 'bhedo vā syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4727: punas tadvaśād bhedābhedakalpanāyāṃ bhāvasvabhāvasya tadavasthaṃ tādavasthyam
T11arhebt_u:4729: athābhinnau tadā bhāvasvabhāva eva bhedābhedābhyāṃ kriyata iti syāt,
T11arhebt_u:4731: vāt; tasya ca hetvantarāt paścād bhavatas tato 'nyatvāpatteḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4734: svahetubhya eva bhāvasvabhāvasya kutaścid bhinnābhinnātmana utpattikalpanāyāṃ vā bhedābhedayor vyatirekavatoḥ vayarthyam;
T11arhebt_u:4736: tasmādvaiśeṣikādikalpitayor bhedābhedayor viśeṣasāmānyātmanor[622]ayogāt bhāvasvabhāva eva bhedābhedaśabdavācyaḥ tayor[623]ahetukatve bhāvasvabhāvasyaivāhetukatvam āpatitam /
T11arhebt_u:4737: tato bhāvānām ahetukatvān nityaṃ sattvam asattvaṃ vā syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4738: ahetukatve hi bhāvānāṃ yadi kadācit sattvaṃ sarvadaiva syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4739: atha kadācid asattvaṃ tad api sarvadā syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4744: hetor bhāve bhavanto 'bhāve ca na bhavantaḥ kādācitkāḥ kadācid bhavā yujyante,
T11arhebt_u:4746: tasmān na vilakṣaṇāt kāraṇāt avilakṣaṇasya kāryasyotpattir abhyupagantavyā,
T11arhebt_u:4748: punar api vilakṣaṇāyāḥ sāmagryāḥ [T. 323b.] avilakṣaṇasya kāryasyotpattau doṣāntaram
T11arhebt_u:4749: āha -- vyavasthāvāṃśca pratiniyataḥ sādhyeṣu ghaṭapaṭādiṣu sādhanānāṃ mṛttantvādīnāṃ
T11arhebt_u:4750: loke yo niyogo ghaṭārthī mṛtpiṇḍam eva tatra niyuṅkte na tantūn,
T11arhebt_u:4751: paṭārthī ca tantūn eva na mṛtpiṇḍam ityādikaḥ sa na [S. 158a.] syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4752: kasmāt? ity āha -- kāraṇānāṃ -- sāmagrīṇāṃ yāḥ śaktayaḥ -- ātmātiśayalakṣaṇās tāsāṃ
T11arhebt_u:4753: pratiniyame kācid eva sāmagrī {p. 165.1} kvacid eva kārye upayujyate nānyā 'nyatrety
T11arhebt_u:4754: evaṃrūpe hi yasmāt kiñcid eva mṛdādikaṃ kasyacid eva ghaṭādeḥ sādhanāyopādīyate nāparaṃ
T11arhebt_u:4757: tasyaiva mṛdādeḥ tatra ghaṭādau śakter yogyatvāt anyasya tantvādes tatrāśakteḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4759: ity ata āha tayoḥ mṛdādes tantvādeś ca tajjananasvabhāvatvena ghaṭādijananasvabhāvatvena itarasvabhāvatvena ca ghaṭādyajananasvabhāvena ca bhedāt anyatvabhāvāt /
T11arhebt_u:4760: na hi mṛttantvādirūpatāto 'nyad eva tajjananetarasvabhāvatvaṃ nāma /
T11arhebt_u:4761: yadā tu sāmagrīṇāṃ parasparavilakṣaṇānām api śaktipratiniyamo neṣyate vilakṣaṇād
T11arhebt_u:4762: api avilakṣaṇakāryopagamāt [T. 324a.] tadā tajjananasvabhāvavilakṣaṇād api dhūmādijananasvabhāvaṃ
T11arhebt_u:4763: yat kāraṇam agnīndhanādisāmagrīlakṣaṇaṃ tadvilakṣaṇād api śakramūrddhādeḥ kṣaṇāśrayeṇa
T11arhebt_u:4764: vā dhūmādes tasyāgnīndhanādisāmagrījanyasya dhūmasya tatlakṣaṇasya cotpattāv iṣyamāṇāyāṃ
T11arhebt_u:4766: iti tasmād yat kiñcit kāryaṃ yataḥkutaścit kāraṇāt syāt utpadyeta,
T11arhebt_u:4770: tato vilakṣaṇasāmagrījanmanaḥ kāryasya kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpasyopalakṣaṇe 'py anyādṛśataiveti sarvas tādṛśas tathāvidhajanmeti siddham /
T11arhebt_u:4771: syānmatam -- vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryās tallakṣaṇakāryajananaśaktiḥ samāneti tallakṣaṇaṃ
T11arhebt_u:4772: kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati kasyāścid eva ca tathābhāvān na yathoditadoṣāvasara ity ata āha
T11arhebt_u:4774: uktam eva tāvad atra pūrvapakṣe `na ca dhūmasya tadatajjanyasvabhāvaḥ' ityādikaṃ dūṣaṇam /
T11arhebt_u:4778: tadā tacchaktisāmye tadevāgnīndhanādikam evārthān nāmāntareṇoktaṃ syāt,
T11arhebt_u:4780: sa eva hy agnir ya indhanavikāramādadhāno dhūmaṃ janayati,
T11arhebt_u:4783: yadi [S. 159a.] ca śakramūrddhāder api evaṃ bhavatā 'bhyupagamyate tadā kevalaṃ nāmni vivādaḥ syāt,
T11arhebt_u:4784: arthābhedam abhyupagamya tathābhidhānāt yata evam iti tasmāt kāryaṃ dhūmādikaṃ dṛṣṭam
T11arhebt_u:4785: ekadā pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ niścitam atadrūpavyāvṛttenātmanā kāraṇam indhanādikaṃ
T11arhebt_u:4786: santānāpekṣayā kṣaṇāpekṣayā vā na vyabhicarati tadvilakṣaṇād anyato na bhavatīti
T11arhebt_u:4808: [628] T. adds brāhmaṇācatena viracite hetubinduprakaraṇe kāryahetvadhikāro dvitīyaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4809: tad evaṃ kāryahetau yato yadbhavadṛṛṣṭaṃsakṛt pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃtādṛśasya sarvasya
T11arhebt_u:4810: tathāvidhād eva janma na tadvijātīyād ity ekasyā [T. 325a.] api kāryavyakteḥ kutaścid
T11arhebt_u:4812: anupalabdhau tu yathoktāyāṃ nimittāntarābhāvopadarśananibandhanayor nānvayavyatirekayor vipratipattiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4814: tathāhi kecid upalabdhyabhāvamātram anupalabdhim abhāvasya [S. 159b.] prasajyapratiṣedhātmanaḥ pramāṇāntaratvena gamikām icchantiīśvarasenaprabhṛtayaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4816: pratiṣedhyaviṣayajñānaviṣayarūpeṇāpariṇāmas HBṬĀ 380.28f.] ātmanaḥ tadanyavastuviṣayaṃ vijñānam eva vā 'bhāvasya gamakaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyaṃ pramāṇāntaram āhurmmīmāṃsakāḥ/
T11arhebt_u:4822: janayad iti HBṬĀ 381.3] tu nāstīti jñānaṃ janayat tadabhāvapramāṇākhyaṃ labhate,
T11arhebt_u:4824: tathā'nye anyabhāvalakṣaṇāṃ tajjñānalakṣaṇām[629]vā 'nupalabdhim abhāvasyaiva sādhanam āhur nābhāvavyavahārasya,
T11arhebt_u:4825: anupalabdher liṅgād abhāvasiddhau svayam eva tadvyavahārapravṛtteḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4827: na pramāṇāntaram abhāvasya tuccharūpasya paricchedātmakam ācakṣate tad evāsya [T.
T11arhebt_u:4828: 325b.] ghaṭādeḥ pratiṣedhyasyānupalabdhiśabdena yady ucyate na kaścid virodhaḥ iti /
T11arhebt_u:4829: tad evam anupalabdhau bhedaṃ gatā buddhayaḥ prativādinām iti [S. 160a.] tannirāsārtham anupalabdhisvarūpaṃ tāvad upadarśayann āha upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4833: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsv anyeṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavatī'ty evaṃrūpāśāstrakṛtā'nyatra {p. 168.1} vyākhyātānaiyāyikavipratipattinirāsārtham
T11arhebt_u:4834: te hy anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiśabdena mahattvānekadravyavattvarūpāṇi dravyāṇām āhuḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4835: mahattvād[: mahatīti HBṬĀ 382.7] anekadravyavattvād rūpāc copalabdhiḥ [VaiSū IV.1.6.] iti vacanāt[:
T11arhebt_u:4837: evaṃcopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ saty api vastuni sambhavatīty asadvyavahārasiddhāv anaikāntikīty ācakṣate /
T11arhebt_u:4838: na hi cākṣuṣasyāpi raśmer mahattvānekadravyavattvarūpāṇy upalambhakāni bhavanti /
T11arhebt_u:4839: na ca tāvatā 'nupalambha 'py asadvyavahāras tatra śakyate karttum /
T11arhebt_u:4843: indriyatvāt tvagādivat kila prāpyakāri cakṣur ity anumānataś cākṣuṣo raśmir upalabhyate tasya [S. 160b.] pratyakṣato 'nupalabdhiḥ katham abhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayet? iti /
T11arhebt_u:4844: tad evam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhim asadvyavahāre 'naikāntikīm āhurnaiyāyikāḥ[T. 326a.] tannirāsam[:
T11arhebt_u:4846: yadāhy upalambhapratyayāntarasākalyaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣaś ca yathokta upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir ucyate na mahattvādikaṃ tadā kuto vyabhicārāvakāśaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:4849: na hi rūpādivyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ tatpratibhāsavivekinā ''kārāntareṇa svajñāne pratibhāsate /
T11arhebt_u:4853: na ca svarūpeṇāmahataḥ tatsambandhe 'py asya mahattāsambhavaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4858: na ca mahattvaṃ rūpaṃ vā dravyodayakāle 'bhyupagamyate,
T11arhebt_u:4860: tac ca pratilabdhātmakam eva tathātām anubhavatīti prathame kṣaṇe dravyaṃ nirguṇam eva /
T11arhebt_u:4862: svasya HBṬĀ 382.13] dvitīye kṣaṇe prāktanarūpatyāgo 'sti rūpāntaraṃ vā ''virbhavati yataḥ{p. 169.1} prāgapratipannādhārabhāvaṃ mahattvādiguṇapratibandhād ādhāratāṃ yāyāt /
T11arhebt_u:4868: na caitat kṣaṇikatve sambhavati akṣaṇikatve vā prāg 'nādhārasya paścādādhārābhāvaḥ/
T11arhebt_u:4869: samavāyikāraṇāsambhavād evānekadravyavattvam apy asambhavi yasmād anekaṃ dravyam ārambhakaṃ samavāyikāraṇātmanā yasya vidyate tad evaṃvyapadiśyate
T11arhebt_u:4871: sattve 'pi mahattvāder neyam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir asmākam abhimatā /
T11arhebt_u:4874: śāstrakāro darśayām babhūva [S. 161b.] upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya yā anupalabdhiḥ
T11arhebt_u:4875: kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā pratiṣedhyād anyasya sā abhāvahetuḥ kāryasya vyāpyasya ca
T11arhebt_u:4877: yātu pratiṣedhyasyaivopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ sā 'bhāvavyavahārahetur eveti vāśabdena darśayati / yā tv
T11arhebt_u:4878: anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ pratyakṣānumānanivṛttilakṣaṇā sā saṃśayahetuḥ pramāṇanivṛttāv apy arthābhāvāsiddheḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4890: tatra ye tāvad upalabdhyabhāvamātram anupalabdhim icchanti,
T11arhebt_u:4891: vijñānaṃvā'nyavastuni [ŚlV abhāvapariccheda 11d.] iti vacanāt tadanyavastuvijñānam eva vā,
T11arhebt_u:4893: eva tāvad dvividhām darśayann āha -- atra anupalabdhivākye yopalabdhiḥ śrūyate kriyārūpā
T11arhebt_u:4894: sā yadā kartṛsthatayā 'pekṣyate tadā tasyā upalabhamānasya kartuḥ dharmatve apekṣyamāṇe
T11arhebt_u:4895: tajjñānam upalabhamānasya yajjñānaṃ tad upalabdhir ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:4896: upalabhamānaś ca buddhīndriyadehakalāpa eva ca pūrvakṣaṇasaṅgṛhīta[636]upalabdhijanaka ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:4897: tathā hi -- upalabdher janaka āśrayo vā karttā parair ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:4898: na {p. 170.1} cendriyāder anyasya janakatvaṃ [S. 162a.] sambhavati yato 'nvayavyatirekanibandhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvavyavahāraḥ,
T11arhebt_u:4899: tau cānvayavyatirekau nendriyāder anyasya sambhavataḥ satsv indriyādiṣu niyamenopalabdher bhāvāt / yadi
T11arhebt_u:4900: hīndriyādiṣu satsv api kadācid upalabdhir nopajāyate tadā satsv apy anyeṣu sakaleṣu hetuṣu kāryānutpattiḥ kāraṇāntaravaikalyaṃ sūcayatīti tadvyatiriktakāraṇāntaraṃ parikalpyeta /
T11arhebt_u:4904: 3yasmin sati bhavaty eva yat tato 'nyasya kalpane /
T11arhebt_u:4905: taddhetutvena sarvatra hetūnām anavasthitiḥ[638]// [PV I 26] iti /
T11arhebt_u:4906: āśrayatvam api janakasyaiveti tad apy ātmano na sambhavati /
T11arhebt_u:4908: kṣāṇikatve sthiter abhāvād upalabdher akṣaṇikatve 'pi svayam evāvināśād avasthānāt /
T11arhebt_u:4909: tathā hi -- upalabdher avināśa eva sthitir ucyate na pātābhāvaḥ [T. 327b.] tasyā gurutvābhāvāt saṃyogābhāvena gurutvāt patanam [VSū V.1.7.] iti capareṣāṃkṛtāntaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4920: evam upalabdhim ādarśyānupalabdhim ādarśayann āha -- tasmād upalabdhijñānād anyā vastvantaraviṣayā upalabdhiḥ jñānātmikā anupalabdhiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4923: yathā bhakṣyābhakṣyaprakaraṇe vivakṣitād bhakṣyād anyatvād `abhakṣyo grāmyakukkuṭaḥ' -- bhakṣyo 'pi san tadanyasya -- ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:4924: yathā ca sparśanīyāsparśanīyādhikāre vivakṣitāt sparśanīyād anyatvād `asparśanīyaś cāṇḍālādiḥ' -- tadanyasya sparśanīyo 'pi san -- ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:4928: paryudāsena pratiṣedhyasyārthasya varjanena yā viśiṣṭe 'rthe vṛttis tayā,
T11arhebt_u:4930: yatra vidheḥ [S. 163a.] prādhānyaṃ pratiṣedho 'rthagṛhītaḥ vidhibhāk svapadena nocyate ekavākyatā ca tatra paryudāsavṛttitā
T11arhebt_u:4931: / vidheś ca prādhānyaṃ `vivakṣitopalabdher anyopalabdhir bhavati' ity evaṃ vākyenānyopalabdher
T11arhebt_u:4932: vidhānāt [T. 328a.] anyopalabdhisāmarthyād eva vivakṣitopalabdheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratīyate /
T11arhebt_u:4933: vivakṣitopalabdher anivarttane tadapekṣayā 'nyasyā vidhānāyogāt svapadena nañā vidhibhāṅ nocyate /
T11arhebt_u:4935: anyaśabdena paryudāsāśrayeṇā 'nyaśabdasyaiva vākye prayogāt anyā upalabdhir anupalabdhir iti /
T11arhebt_u:4936: nañaś ca subantena sāmarthyaṃ na tiṅantena ity ekavākyatvaṃ `na upalabdhir anupalabdhiḥ' iti /
T11arhebt_u:4938: tatra hi pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ vidhir arthād gamyate vākyabhedaḥ svapadena nañā pratiṣedhabhāk sambadhyate /
T11arhebt_u:4939: tad evaṃ jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇām anupalabdhiṃ vyākhyāya jñeyadharmalakṣaṇāṃ pratipādayann āha -- upalabhyamānadharmatva ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4940: yadā karmasthakriyāpekṣayopalabhyamānasya vastuno dharma upalabdhir vivakṣyate tadā viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhir mantavyā /
T11arhebt_u:4943: pratiṣedhyasya ghaṭāder yadātmaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ tajjanane yā yogyatā tallakṣaṇo viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhiśabdenocyate /
T11arhebt_u:4946: dharmadharmiṇoś ca bheda eva ity ata āha -- yogyatāyāḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4947: yogyatā hi paramārthato [T. 328b.] bhāvarūpaiva na vastusvarūpād bhidyate,
T11arhebt_u:4948: anyathā bhāvo yogya eva na syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4949: yogyatā 'syeti ca sambandho bhāvato na syāt /
T11arhebt_u:4951: tad evam upalabdher viṣayadharmatāṃ pratipādyānupalabdher api pratipādayann āha tasmād anyaḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4953: eva na tadviparītaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭaviviktapradeśarūpaḥ sa eva cātrānupalabdhiśabdenocyate /
T11arhebt_u:4954: prāktanam eva nyāyam atrādiśann[642]āha pūrvavad iti /
T11arhebt_u:4956: kathaṃ punar ayaṃ nañ anyārthavṛttiḥ sāmānyaśabdaḥ san ghaṭaviviktapradeśasya [S. 164a.] tajjñānasyaiva 3vā ghaṭaviviktasyānupalabdhitvaṃ[643]paryudāsavṛttyā
T11arhebt_u:4958: ity ata āha -- yatra yasmin ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:4960: yasmin pradeśarūpādau upalabhyamāne niyamena avaśyaṃtayā yasyānyasya
T11arhebt_u:4961: padārthasya ghaṭrarūpāder upalabdhir bhavati sa ghaṭarūpādiḥ padārthaḥ tatsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ tena pradeśarūpādinā saṃsṛṣṭaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4965: yadā hi pradeśarūpaṃ vyavadhānaviprakarṣādirahitaṃ vijñāne svākāraṃ samarppayati tadā ghaṭarūpam api tatra[644]tathāvidhaṃ svākāraṃ samarppayaty eva /
T11arhebt_u:4966: yadi nāma yogyatā tasya tena tulyā svasvabhāvavyavasthites tu kathaṃ tatsaṃsṛṣṭatā?
T11arhebt_u:4968: ekatra hi jñāne dvāv api tau svākāradvāreṇa saṃsṛṣṭau na sākṣāt,
T11arhebt_u:4969: tadvijñānaṃ padārthadvayākāram ājāyamānaṃ tayor ātmani saṃsarggaṃ darśayati /
T11arhebt_u:4970: kim iti punas tat jñānaṃ padārthadvayākāram avaśyaṃ [S. 164b.] bhavati yatas tayor jñānadvārakaḥ saṃsarggaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:4972: / yāv etau tulyayogyatārūpau tau yadi santau bhavatas tadā naivaikākāraniyatā pratipattir bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:4974: na hy eṣa sambhavo 'sti -- yat tulyayogyatārūpayor eka eva pratibhāseta nāpara iti /
T11arhebt_u:4975: tathā hi -- aviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyāḥ kas tatra svākāraṃ na samarppayet? /
T11arhebt_u:4977: na cānubhavaviruddham ācakṣaṇā viduṣām avadheyavacaso bhavanti /
T11arhebt_u:4980: karaṇadharma evāyaṃ yad ekasminn eva karmaṇi kriyāṃ niṣpādayati nānekatra,
T11arhebt_u:4981: karaṇaṃ cendriyaṃ tato nānekapratipattihetur iti cet,
T11arhebt_u:4984: karttrekatvāt tarhi kriyaikatra karmāṇīti kathaṃ `karaṇadharmaḥ' ityādi vaco na plavate? /
T11arhebt_u:4985: na ca pratikṣaṇaviśarāruṣu bhāveṣu paramārthataḥ kartṛkaraṇādibhāvo [S. 165a.] yuktaḥ
T11arhebt_u:4987: na ca sarrvakārakānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyini kārye kasyacid atiśayo 'sti yenāyaṃ karttā kā(ka)
T11arhebt_u:4989: tasmād aviśiṣṭayogyatayoḥ kuta ekarūpaniyatāyāḥ pratipatteḥ sambhavaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:4992: na hy asati tulyayogyatārūpatve yugapad ekendriyajanitajñānapratibhāsitā rūparasavat sambhavatīti /
T11arhebt_u:4993: tatra yeṣāṃsaugatānām idaṃ darśanaṃ `ekāyatanasaṅgṛhīte 'nekatrāpy ekam evendriyajñānam ājāyate' iti teṣāṃ mukhya evaikajñānasaṃsarggaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:4994: ye tu `tatrāpi pratyarthaṃ bhinnāny evaikendriyanimittāny ekakālāni tadviṣayāṇāṃ yugapat sannihitānāṃ svajñāneṣu sāmarthyāviśeṣāt,
T11arhebt_u:4995: ata[646]evaikatayā loke 'dhyavasīyamānāni jñānāny upajāyante` iti varṇayanti [T.
T11arhebt_u:4997: yadi nāmaikajñānasaṃsarggāt tatsaṃsṛṣṭasyāpi [S. 165b.] sāmānyena sarvam anyam ayaṃ nañ kin na pratipādayati?
T11arhebt_u:4999: yasmād aviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyā yathoktena prakāreṇaikatra jñāne dvayor api saṃsarggaḥ
T11arhebt_u:5000: tasmād aviśiṣṭaṃ yogyatārūpaṃ yayoḥ tata evaikajñānasaṃsarggiṇau tau tasmāt tayor
T11arhebt_u:5001: evaṃrūpayoḥ parasparāpekṣam eva na sarvānyapadārthāpekṣam anyatvam iha anupalabdhyadhikāre abhipretam /
T11arhebt_u:5002: loke tu yady aviśeṣapadārthāntarāpekṣam anyatvaṃ nañā kvacid ucyate vyāptinyāyasamāśrayāt,
T11arhebt_u:5004: {p. 174.1} pratyāsatterāśrayaṇāt ekajñānasaṃsarggalakṣaṇā prattyāsattir āśrīyate nā 'nyā pramāṇacintādhikārāt anyathā 'nupalabdhir anaikāntikyeva syāt /
T11arhebt_u:5005: tasmāt tattvacintakais tathāvidham anyatvam āśrayaṇīyam yad anupalabdher avyabhicāranibandhanam /
T11arhebt_u:5007: tad evam ekajñānasaṃsarggāpekṣayā 'nyatvaṃ pratipādyānupalabdhiṃ darśayann āha -- sa kevalaḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5008: sa eva yadā kevalaḥ pradeśo yathoktaghaṭāpekṣayā tasmād anya ucyate [S. 166a.] tadā ghaṭaviviktapradeśajñānaṃ [T. 330b.] vā 'nupalabdhiḥ,
T11arhebt_u:5009: na tu yatheśvaraseno manyate upalabdhyabhāvamātram anupalabdhir iti,
T11arhebt_u:5012: na tu tadviviktajñānam eva yathāhakumārilaḥvijñānaṃvānyavastuni [ŚlV abhāvapariccheda 11d.] iti /
T11arhebt_u:5013: yathā hy anyavastuviṣayaṃ jñānam anubhūyamānaṃ pratiyogismaraṇāpekṣaṃ tadabhāvavyavahāranibandhanaṃ tathā tadviviktaḥ pradeśo 'pi /
T11arhebt_u:5014: tathā hi -- kasyacit pratipattuḥ `yataḥ kevalapradeśākāram eva jñānaṃ mayā saṃvedyate na tu ghaṭākāram api tasmād atra ghaṭo nāsti` iti evaṃ nāstitājñānam utpadyate;
T11arhebt_u:5015: kasyacit tu `yataḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'yaṃ dṛśyate na tu ghaṭasahitaḥ tasmān nāsty atra ghaṭaḥ` ity
T11arhebt_u:5016: evam / tasmād ubhayor nāstitājñānajanmani tulyaṃ sāmarthyam iti dvayor api anupalabdhivyavasthā yukteti /
T11arhebt_u:5017: tatra yadā tajjñānaṃ tadā jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇā 'nupalabdhiḥ kartṛsthakriyā 'pekṣayā yadā tatsvabhāvas tadā jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā karmasthakriyāpekṣayeti
T11arhebt_u:5018: evam anupalabdhiṃ [S. 166b.] paryudāsavṛttyā vyavasthāpya sādhyam asyā darśayann āha -- sāabhāvam ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5019: sarvānyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptavivikte 'pi [T. 331a.] pradeśādau dṛśyamāne yatra ghaṭādau pratiyoginy arthitvādibhiḥ smṛtir asya bhavati tasyābhāvaṃ
T11arhebt_u:5024: tatra `nāsty atra ghaṭaḥ` ity evam ākāraṃ jñānam,
T11arhebt_u:5025: evaṃvidhavastvabhidhāyakaṃ cābhidhānaṃ niḥśaṅkasya ca tatra pradeśe gamanāgamanalakṣaṇā pravṛttir iti /
T11arhebt_u:5026: {p. 175.1} atreśvarasenakumārilayor vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkya siddhāntavyavasthām eva kurvatā tanmate niraste 'pyāhatya tanmatanirāsārtham āha -- katham anyabhāva ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5027: īśvaraseno hi manyate -- kārya-svabhāvahetubhyāṃ bhāvarūpābhyāṃ anupalabdheḥ pṛthakkaraṇād avaśyam abhāvarūpatvam asyāḥ,
T11arhebt_u:5029: tvayā [S. 167a.] cānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya pradeśādes tajjñānasya vā bhāvarūpānupalabdhir ākhyāyate tannūnam anyabhāvas tadabhāvo yenaivam abhidhīyate /
T11arhebt_u:5032: kumārilo 'py evaṃ manyate -- yeyaṃ jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā dvidhā 'nupalabdhir abhāvarūpā tvayocyate tasyā bhavatu nāstitājñānaṃ prati sādhanabhāvaḥ
T11arhebt_u:5033: kintu sa evānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya vastunaḥ [T. 331b.] pratiṣedhyajñānād anyasya vā tajjñānasya yo bhāvo bhāvāṃśaḥ sa katham abhāvaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:5037: saty api dharmirūpeṇābhede tayoś codbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ grahaṇāgrahaṇavyavastheti / yad āha --
T11arhebt_u:5038: dharmayor bheda iṣṭo hi dharmyabhede 'pi naḥsthite /
T11arhebt_u:5041: uktottaratām asya darśayann āha -- uktam uttaram atra codye yathā paryudāsavṛttyāapekṣātaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5042: `pratiṣedhyaṃ tajjñānaṃ vā apekṣya tadvivikto 'rthas tajjñānaṃ [S. 167b.] vā 'bhāvo 'nupalabdhiś cocyate` itiīśvarasenasya prativacanam /
T11arhebt_u:5043: na hi prasajyapratiṣedha evaiko nañarthaḥ kin tu paryudāso 'pi /
T11arhebt_u:5049: paramārthatas tu pratiṣedhyābhāvavyavahārayogyatā {p. 176.1} vastubhūtaiva pradeśasya sādhyata iti na svabhāvahetoḥ svabhāvānupalabdhir bhidyata[649]iti
T11arhebt_u:5050: yat tu `anapekṣitārthāntarasaṃsarggaṃ pratiṣedhamātram anupalabdhiḥ` itīśvaraseno manyate tannirākurvann āha -- na pratiṣedhamātram ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5051: kasmāt? ity āha -- tasya sādhanāsiddheḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5052: [T. 332a.] na hy abhāvasya sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasya sādhanatvaṃ siddhihetutvaṃ sidhyati,
T11arhebt_u:5057: abhāvasya [S. 168a.] cānapekṣitasahakāriṇo anādheyātiśayatayā nāstīti jñānajanane nityaṃ tajjananaprasaṅgaḥ /
