T11arhebt_u:5058: tataś ca sādhakatvāyogād abhāvavyavahāra eva na sidhyet /
T11arhebt_u:5059: athavā tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmana upalabdhyabhāvasya sādhanam eva kiñcin na sidhyatīti /
T11arhebt_u:5060: sa hy abhāvatvād apareṇopalabdhyabhāvena sādhyaḥ syāt,
T11arhebt_u:5066: tasyāpi kathaṃ pratipattiḥ` ity 4atrāntare svayam eva vipañcayiṣyati[651]/
T11arhebt_u:5067: kumārilasyāpy uttaram āha -- tasya anyasya pratiyoginā vastvantareṇāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya /
T11arhebt_u:5068: na hy asau vastvantaraiḥ saṃsṛṣṭasvabhāva ekarūpaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5069: tathātve hy abhāvāṃśo 'pi na kvacit sidhyet /
T11arhebt_u:5070: tasyaivaṃvidhasya bhāvasiddhir eva bhāvāṃśasiddhir eva aparasya pratiyogino vastvantarasyābhāvasiddhir
T11arhebt_u:5071: abhāvāṃśasya tvadabhimatasya siddhir astu bhāvāṃśasyaivābhāvāṃśarūpatopapatter iti manyate /
T11arhebt_u:5072: tathā hi -- abhāvāṃśo 'pi pararūpāsaṃsṛṣṭatayaivābhāva iti vyapadiśyate,
T11arhebt_u:5074: sā ca bhāvāṃśasyāpi samāneti sa evābhāvo 'stu tannimittasya samānatvāt kim anyenābhāvāṃśopagatena? /
T11arhebt_u:5076: yata {p. 177.1} evam iti tasmād anyabhāvo 'pi anyasya vastuno bhāvo 'pi tvadabhimato bhāvāṃśo 'pi na kevalam abhāvāṃśas tvanmatyā 'bhāva iti vyapadiśyate 'smābhiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5079: yad uktaṃ `jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇayā svabhāvānupalabdhyā abhāvavyavahāra eva sādhyate nābhāvaḥ`[652]iti tat paro vighaṭayituṃ,
T11arhebt_u:5081: tasya sādhanāsiddheḥ`[653]iti dvitīye vyākhyāne[654]pratiṣedhamātrasyānupalabdhi[r i]ty 4etasya sādhanaṃ[655]darśayitum āha -- anyabhāvalakṣaṇa ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5082: evaṃ manyate -- loko hi kevalapradeśadarśanāt ghaṭābhāvam eva prathamaṃ pratipadyate
T11arhebt_u:5083: kevalapradeśajñānasaṃvedanadvāreṇa ghaṭajñānābhāvapratipattyā vā tato ghaṭābhāvasya vyavahāram /
T11arhebt_u:5084: tena lokapratītyanusāreṇa pratiṣedhyād anyasya pradeśasya pratiṣedhyajñānād vā tajjñānasya
T11arhebt_u:5085: yo bhāvas tallakṣaṇo 'bhāvaḥ svayaṃ pramāṇenendriyapratyakṣeṇa svasaṃvedanapratyakṣeṇa
T11arhebt_u:5086: ca siddho 'laṃ [S. 169a.] ghaṭābhāvaṃ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca yathākramaṃ sādhayitum,
T11arhebt_u:5087: sa ca ghaṭābhāvavyavahāram ity evaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ
T11arhebt_u:5088: yuktam / na caivam api vyavasthāpane [asma]tpakṣasya kācit kṣatiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5089: tathā hi -- pāramparyeṇāpi yad anupalabdheḥ tvadabhyupagatāyāḥ siddhaṃ tat tat eva siddhaṃ bhavatīti [T. 333a.] pratiṣedhamātrasyānupalabdhitve tatsādhanapratipādane 'pi /
T11arhebt_u:5090: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- yathā bhavato jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā bhāvarūpā dvividhā 'nupalabdhis
T11arhebt_u:5091: tathā mamāpi jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇopalabdhyabhāvo 'py anupalabdhisaṃjñito dvividho bhaviṣyati /
T11arhebt_u:5092: tatra jñeyadharmalakṣaṇenānyabhāvena pratyakṣasiddhena pratiṣedhyābhāvo jñeyadharmalakṣaṇopalabdhyabhāvarūpa 'nupalabdhisaṃjñitaḥ setsyati /
T11arhebt_u:5093: jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇena cānyabhāvena kevalapradeśajñānātmanā svasaṃvedanasiddhena jñātṛdharmaḥ pratiṣedhyajñānābhāvarūpo 'nupalabdhisamākhyātaḥ setsyati /
T11arhebt_u:5094: tataś ca kuto 'navasthā yena sādhanāsiddhiḥ syād iti /
T11arhebt_u:5095: tatra[656]anyabhāvalakṣaṇa iti pratiṣedhyāt tajjñānāc ca yo 'nyo bhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyaviviktaḥ pradeśaḥ
T11arhebt_u:5096: tajjñānaṃ ca tadātmako 'bhāvaḥ vivakṣitād bhāvāt pratiṣedhyād bhāvāt tajjñānāc cānyatvād
T11arhebt_u:5098: svasaṃvedanapratyakṣeṇa ca siddhaḥ saṃs tasya [S. 169b.] pratiṣedhyasyābhāvavyavahāraṃ
T11arhebt_u:5100: yathoktasya siddhyā siddho vā tadabhāvas tasya pratiṣedhyasya tajjñānasya[657]vā
T11arhebt_u:5101: 'bhāva iti evam apīṣyamāṇe na kaścid viśeṣaḥ tvadabhimatānupalabdhito 'smadabhimatānupalabdheḥ
T11arhebt_u:5103: nanv asty evaivam iṣyamāṇe viśeṣo 'nyabhāvalakṣaṇānupalabdhir itarayā[658]vyavahitā
T11arhebt_u:5104: tadabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayed itarā tu sākṣād ity āha -- sa viśeṣo nāsti yena viśeṣeṇānupalabdhyā
T11arhebt_u:5106: syāt / anyasya tu viśeṣasya sato 'py abādhakatvād asatsamatvam eva /
T11arhebt_u:5109: yataḥ sa eva tvadabhimato 'nyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyaviviktabhūtalātmakas tadviṣayā copalabdhir
T11arhebt_u:5111: tadupalabdhyabhāvasya ca kiṃ kasmāt na sādhanaṃ liṅgam iṣyate? /
T11arhebt_u:5112: tathā hi sati lokapratītir anusṛtā bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:5113: kiṃpunaḥkasmāt punaḥ abhāvasya dvividhasya siddhir eva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ na tatsādhyā kācid anyā [S. 170a] vidyata ity asmanmataniṣedhārthaṃ lokātikrāntam iṣyata iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5114: atrāha -- apṛthaksiddher anyabhāvāt tadabhāvasya pṛthaksiddher abhāvāt kuto liṅgaliṅgitā /
T11arhebt_u:5115: tathā sambandhābhāvāc ca anyabhāvatadabhāvayor na liṅgaliṅgiteti /
T11arhebt_u:5116: prathamaṃ tāvat kāraṇaṃ [T. 334a.] vivṛṇvann āha anyabhāvas tadviviktapradeśātmakas tāvan na sādhanaṃliṅgaṃ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya,
T11arhebt_u:5117: `tadupalabdhir api tadabhāvasya na sādhanam` iti paścād vakṣyate /
T11arhebt_u:5120: ity āha -- yatsiddhau yasya vastunaḥ siddhau pratītau yasya aparasya {p. 179.1} vastuno na siddhir na pratītiḥ tad vastu tasya vastuno liṅgaṃ bhavatīty ayaṃ liṅgaliṅginor nyāyaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5122: yathā -- yadā dhūmapratītau nāgniḥ pratīyate tadā tayor lliṅgaliṅgibhāvo bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:5125: ity ata āha -- anyasya vastuno yo bhāvaḥsvabhāvaḥ tatsiddhyaiva
T11arhebt_u:5126: tatpratītyaiva tadabhāvaḥ tasya [S. 170b.] pratiṣedhyasyābhāvaḥ prasidhyati pratīyate anyabhāvasyaiva tadabhāvātmakatvāt tatsiddher eva tatsiddhilakṣaṇatvāt
T11arhebt_u:5127: naiyāyikās tu manyante -- pratiṣedhyābhāvo hi prasajyapratiṣedhātmakas tuccharūpas tasya kathaṃ tadanyabhāvarūpatā?
T11arhebt_u:5130: ity ata āha -- tasya tadanyabhāvasya pradeśalakṣaṇasya tasmād anyena pratiṣedhyena ghaṭādinā asaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya rahitātmanaḥ kevalasya pratiṣedhyena śūnyātmanaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5133: , iti cet; na, pararūpeṇa tasyāpi tuccharūpatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:5134: [T. 334b.] yathā hy anapekṣitabhāvāntarasaṃsargaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ śūnyavikalpapratibhāsī pratiṣedhyena tuccharūpaḥ tadrūpavirahāt,
T11arhebt_u:5136: tataḥ katham asya pratiṣedhyena tuccharūpatā [S. 171a.] virudhyeta? /
T11arhebt_u:5138: anyathā katham asyānyabhāvatvaṃ parasya vā tatrābhāvaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:5139: yo hi yadabhāvarūpo na bhavati sa evāsau bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:5142: tasmāt sarvabhāvāḥ pararūpeṇa niḥsvabhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa rūpavattve 'pīty anavadyam /
T11arhebt_u:5144: na kaścit, kevalam anapekṣitarūpāntaram abhāvamātraṃ prasajyapratiṣedha iti loke kathyate /
T11arhebt_u:5146: na tu rūpāntaraṃ pararūpatucchātmakaṃ na bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:5148: kathaṃ tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmatā na syāt pararūpeṇa? /
T11arhebt_u:5151: tādātmyābhāve hi prasajyapratiṣedhasya paryudastāt [S. 171b.] pratītau tatkāraṇatve sati syāt pratipattiḥ nānyathā /
T11arhebt_u:5152: tasya tadanyāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya yat tattvaṃ tasya pratiṣedhyatuccharūpatāyā vyavasthāpakaṃ
T11arhebt_u:5153: pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣarūpam tat eva -- na taduttarakālabhāvino [T. 335a.] `nāstīha ghaṭaḥ` iti vikalpāt,
T11arhebt_u:5154: tasya gṛhītagrāhitayā smṛtitvenāpramāṇatvāt -- anyasya ghaṭādes tatrāsato vyavacchedasyābhāvasya siddhes tadabhāvātmakasyaiva
T11arhebt_u:5156: dvividho hy ayaṃ pradeśo ghaṭāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpas tadvyāvṛttarūpatayā tato 'nyo ghaṭavān api,
T11arhebt_u:5158: 4tasya tadvivekena[666]pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇe ghaṭād anyatvaṃ ghaṭavirahaś ca gṛhīta eva bhavatīti na vastvasaṃkarasiddhyarthaṃ,
T11arhebt_u:5159: `ihedaṃ nāsti` ity evam arthaṃ ca pramāṇāntaram anveṣaṇīyam /
T11arhebt_u:5160: vistaraś caitad uttaratra vakṣyata iti āstāṃ tāvat /
T11arhebt_u:5161: yataś cānyabhāvasiddhyaiva tadabhāva uktena nyāyena siddhyati tato nānyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya liṅgam /
T11arhebt_u:5162: dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyācakṣāṇa āha -- sambandhābhāvāc ca iti /
T11arhebt_u:5163: anyabhāvatadabhāvayor na [S. 172a.] kaścit sambandho 'sti tataḥ kuto liṅgaliṅgibhāvaḥ iti /
T11arhebt_u:5166: tadanyabhāvāt[668]pṛthag eva tadabhāvas tuccharūpa iṣyate paraiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5167: anyathoktena nyāyenānyabhāvasyaiva tadabhāvarūpatve tādātmyāt kathaṃ sambandhābhāvaḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:5170: tac ca tasya ityādyasyaiva vivaraṇaṃ vyatirekamukhena ekārthasamavāya iti[672][T. 335b.] paradarśanenoktaṃ /
T11arhebt_u:5171: pareṣāṃ hinaiyāyikādīnāṃvyatiriktāv eva kṛtakānityatvākhyau dharmāv ekasminn eva
T11arhebt_u:5172: dharmiṇi samavetāv iti kṛtakasyānityatvenaikasminn arthe dharmiṇi samavāyaḥ sambandhaḥ
T11arhebt_u:5174: atraikarthasamavāya iti saṃyogaḥ sa eva samavāyaśabdenoktaḥ
T11arhebt_u:5176: pareṣāṃ tv agnidhūmau svāvayaveṣv eva samavetāv iti na tayor ekārthasamavāya ādhārādheyabhāvo veti dhūmasyāgner upari darśanāl laukikaḥ sambandha uktaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5178: paramārthato 'gner janakatvāt itarasya ca janyatvād iti /
T11arhebt_u:5179: nanu ceśvarasenena saha vicāraḥ prakrāntaḥ tat kim itinaiyāyikābhimatasyāpi sambandhasyānyabhāvatadabhāvayor abhāva ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:5180: satyam, [S. 172b.] prasaṅgena tu tanmatasyāpi niṣedhārtham uktam /
T11arhebt_u:5181: pūrvaṃ hy anyabhāvagrāhipratyakṣasiddhatvāt pratiṣedhyābhāvasya na tadarthaṃ pratyakṣāntaraṃ `nāstīha ghaṭaḥ` ity evamākāraṃ kalpanīyam iti prasaṅgataḥ kathitam /
T11arhebt_u:5182: adhunā tu prasaṅgād idam ucyate -- yadānyabhāvagrāhipratyakṣasiddho 'yaṃ tadabhāvo
T11arhebt_u:5183: na bhavati tadā pratyakṣāntaraṃ `nāsti iha ghaṭaḥ` ity evam ākaraṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvalakṣaṇāt
T11arhebt_u:5187: tataḥ [T. 336a.] kutas tallakṣaṇāt sannikarṣāt tadabhāve[674]pratyakṣaṃ bhaved iti /
T11arhebt_u:5188: evaṃ sambandhasvarūpam ākhyāya tasyehāsambhavam āha -- naivam,
T11arhebt_u:5189: yathā kṛtakatvānityatvayor agnidhūmayor vaikārthasamavāyādilakṣaṇaḥ sambandho naivaṃ kaścid bhāvābhāvayoḥ sambandho yena asya tadabhāvasyānyabhāvaḥ sādhanaṃ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:5190: yāv ekatrārthe dharmirūpe pravarttete tayor ekārthasamavāyo bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:5191: anyabhāvaś ca pradeśākhyaḥ svāvayaveṣu yeṣu varttate na tatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5192: evaṃ hi pradeśāvayaveṣu ghaṭo nāstīti syāt na pradeśe /
T11arhebt_u:5209: na ca tadabhāvo dravyam ity uktam /
T11arhebt_u:5212: yataḥ so 'pi saṃyoganimitta ucyate `iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi` iti /
T11arhebt_u:5217: pañcānām eva hi dravyādīnāṃ padārthānāṃ samavāyitvam iṣyate;
T11arhebt_u:5219: na ca tadātmānupakāre saty ādhāravyapadeśaḥ sambhavati /
T11arhebt_u:5227: trayāṇām eva hi dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ dravyaṃ kāraṇam iṣṭam / na cābhāvo
T11arhebt_u:5234: sambandhibhedād bhede vā sāmānyādiṣv api tatprasaṅgaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5235: samavāyopy asyānantaram eva nirasta iti kutaḥ svakāraṇasattāsamavāyarūpā kāryatā tadabhāvasya syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:5237: tataḥ sarvathā sambandhābhāvān nānyabhāvaḥ tadabhāvasya sādhanam iti /
T11arhebt_u:5238: paraḥ sambandhāntaraṃ darśayann āha -- asti viṣayety ādi /
T11arhebt_u:5239: yathā hi artho viṣayaḥ śabdo viṣayīti tayor viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:5240: [S. 174a.] evam anyabhāvatadabhāvayor viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ sambandho bhaviṣyati [T. 337a.] pradeśākhyenānyabhāvena ghaṭābhāvasya pratyāyanād iti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā /
T11arhebt_u:5245: tatpratipādanābhiprāye sati arthapratipādanavivakṣāyāṃ satyāṃ tatprayogāc chabdoccāraṇāt /
T11arhebt_u:5246: tenārthena vivakṣāviparivarttinā śabdasya kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:5247: yady api ca śabdārthayoḥ buddhiparikalpitasāmānyarūpatā tathāpy arthapratibhāsinyā
T11arhebt_u:5252: paro hy avinābhāvalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandha iti vyavaharati /
T11arhebt_u:5255: āha -- ayaṃca anantaroktaprakāraḥ atra tadabhāvānyabhāvayoḥ na sambhavati /
T11arhebt_u:5256: na hi ghaṭābhāvapratipādanābhiprāye [S. 174b.] sati anyabhāvasya pradeśalakṣaṇasya prayogo[679]niṣpattir bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:5257: ghaṭābhāvapratipādanābhiprāyāt prāg api pradeśasya svahetubhya eva niṣpatteḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5262: syān matam -- yathā śabdārthayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvanimitto viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ tathā
T11arhebt_u:5263: anyabhāvatadabhāvayor api ity etāvanmātreṇa śabdārthayor dṛṣṭāntatety ata āha -- siddhe hi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5265: tadayogāt tathehāpi yadi tadabhāvānyabhāvayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ sidhyet tadā tanmukhena
T11arhebt_u:5267: yāvatā sa eva sādhyasādhanabhāvo 'sati sambandhe 3kāryakāraṇabhāvādike na sidhyati[680],
T11arhebt_u:5270: parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayāt pratyayaviśeṣād indriyaviṣayayor ekavijñānotpādanayor {p. 184.1} udayāt tathā vyapadeśaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:5275: naiva sambandhāntaranibandhano 'nyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvo 'pi tu viṣayaviṣayibhāvanimitta eveti cet;
T11arhebt_u:5276: āha -- anyathā yadi [T. 338a.] sambandhāntaraṃ neṣyate kin tu viṣayaviṣayibhāvāt sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ tasmāc ca viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:5278: tathā caikāsiddhau dvayor apy asiddhir bhaved iti /
T11arhebt_u:5279: kiñcānyabhāvāc ca liṅgabhūtād abhāvasya liṅginaḥ siddhāv anumitāv 4iṣyamāṇāyāṃ asamudāyaś[681]ca sādhyaḥ syāt,
T11arhebt_u:5280: anyabhāvena tadabhāvasya kevalasyaiva sādhanāt na kevalasambandhābhāvāt sādhyasādhanabhāvāyogaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5281: samudāyaś ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāpanno dharmadharmilakṣaṇaḥ sādhyo ya iṣṭas tadabhāvadoṣaś ceti `ca` śabdaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5283: āha -- tathā ca dharmamātrasyāpi svatantrasya sādhyatopagame `ghaṭābhāvas tadanyabhāvāt` ity evaṃrūpe prayoge ghaṭasya sarvatra deśe sarvadā cābhāvaḥ prasajyeta /
T11arhebt_u:5284: dharmiṇi hi kvaciddharmasya guṇabhūtasya sādhane tatraiva tatkāla eva ca bhāvo yukto nānyadeti sarvatra samudāya eva sādhyo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ na kevalo dharma iti /
T11arhebt_u:5288: `iha pradeśe ghaṭo nāsti` ity evaṃ ghaṭābhāvena pradeśādir dharmī viśeṣyate saghaṭāt
T11arhebt_u:5289: [T. 338.b.] pradeśāder bhedenāvasthāpyata iti tadviśeṣaṇatvaṃ prāptaḥ sādhyate na
T11arhebt_u:5290: tu ghaṭo nāstīty evaṃ kevalo dharmiṇaḥ kasyacidguṇabhāvamanāpannaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5291: tato nāsamudāyasya sādhyateti kutas tadbhāvī doṣaḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:5292: na ca naivāsminpakṣe liṅgasyānyabhāvātmano liṅginaśca pradeśādidharmilakṣaṇasya asambandhadoṣaḥprasajyate /
T11arhebt_u:5294: anyabhāvasya ghaṭaviviktapradeśādilakṣaṇasya pradeśādinā {p. 185.1} dharmiṇā sambandhāt tādātmyasadbhāvād iti /
T11arhebt_u:5295: tathā hi -- śabdādidharmiṇā kṛtakatvādes tādātmyalakṣaṇa eva sambandha iṣyate bhavatā /
T11arhebt_u:5299: siddhāntavādī tu sādhyadharmalakṣaṇasya liṅgino ghaṭābhāvākhyasyānyabhāvena liṅgena
T11arhebt_u:5300: sambandhābhāvaḥ prāg ukto na dharmiṇā tataḥ kvadam uttaraṃ saṃbadhyata iti manyamāno
T11arhebt_u:5301: dharmiṇā 'py anyabhāvākhyasya liṅgasya sambandhābhāvaṃ darśayann āha -- na liṅgaliṅginor
T11arhebt_u:5304: kin tu liṅgaliṅginor asambandha evāsamudāyasādhanam eva ca evam api bruvataḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5307: etad eva [S. 176b.] darśayati -- yatraiva hi pradeśādau dharmitayā tvayā kalpyamāne
T11arhebt_u:5308: yad [T. 339a.] ghaṭādikaṃ nāstīty ucyate lokena sa eva pradeśādis tena ghaṭādinā
T11arhebt_u:5309: 'saṃsṛṣṭas saṃsargarahitaḥ anyabhāvo liṅgatayeṣṭo nāparaḥ kaścit yataḥ taddarśanād
T11arhebt_u:5310: eva ghaṭāsaṃsṛṣṭapradeśādidarśanād evāsya pratipattuḥ `ghaṭo nāsti` iti vikalpo liṅgijñānatayopagato
T11arhebt_u:5312: yad eva hi dṛśyamānaṃ liṅgijñānaṃ janayati tad eva liṅgam ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:5315: tataḥ kathaṃ tasyaivānyabhāvasya vyāvṛttito 'pi bhedam ananubhavato liṅgaliṅgibhāvo liṅgatvaṃ liṅgitvaṃ vā? /
T11arhebt_u:5316: na hi liṅgam eva dharmī bhavitum arhati,
T11arhebt_u:5318: tataś cānyasya dharmiṇo 'bhāvāt katham anyabhāvātmano liṅgasya tatsambandhaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:5320: śabdakṛtakatvayos tu paramārthatas tādātmye 'pi vyāvṛttibhedanibandhano 'sty eva bhedaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5321: tataḥ śabdādidharmipratipattāv apy anityatvādyapratītau kṛtakatvādinā tat sādhyata iti yuktam /
T11arhebt_u:5322: syān matam -- sāmānyaviśeṣakalpanayā [S. 176b.] liṅgaliṅgitaikasyāpi bhaviṣyatīty ata āha -- na cātra prakṛte 'nyabhāve sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvakalpanāsambhavati,
T11arhebt_u:5323: yena [T. 339b.] sāmānyaviśeṣavikalpena sāmānyaṃ hetur bhaved viśeṣo dharmī,
T11arhebt_u:5324: yataḥ {p. 186.1} samudāyasādhyatā liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambandho vā syāt /
T11arhebt_u:5325: kuto na sambhavatīty āha -- tadviśeṣapratipatter eva ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣapratipatter eva tadabhāvasya ghaṭābhāvasya pratīteḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5326: yataś ca viśeṣa eva ghaṭābhāvapratītinibandhanaṃ tataḥ kiṃ tatra sāmānyakalpanayā kriyata iti /
T11arhebt_u:5327: sa eva viśeṣo 'nyatra varttamānaḥ sāmānyarūpatāṃ pratipatsyata iti cet,
T11arhebt_u:5328: āha -- tasya ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣasya anyatra sajātīye anvayasya anuvṛtter abhāvāt kutaḥ sāmānyātmatā? /
T11arhebt_u:5329: na hy asau deśakālāvasthāniyato viśeṣo 'nyam anvetīti /
T11arhebt_u:5334: tadā pratijñāyā yo 'rtho dharmadharmisamudāyas tadekadeśa eva dharmilakṣaṇo hetuḥ syāt,
T11arhebt_u:5337: atha mā bhūt [S. 177a.] eṣa doṣa iti na ghaṭavivikta eva pradeśaviśeṣo hetur iṣyate,
T11arhebt_u:5338: kin tu pradeśamātraṃ ghaṭaviviktatāviśeṣarahitam ity ata āha -- na ca yatra pradeśamātraṃtatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5339: saghaṭe 'pi pradeśe pradeśamātrasya bhāvād anaikāntiko hetuḥ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:5341: yādṛśo ghaṭaviviktaḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'grataḥ sthitas tādṛśe sarvatra pradeśe ghaṭasyābhāva iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:5342: tathāvidhapradeśaviśeṣapratītir eva ghaṭābhāvapratītis tato 'nyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ liṅgaliṅgitā 'nupapannety upadarśayann āha -- nanu tasyaiva ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5343: yo 'sau kevalaḥ pradeśaviśeṣo dharmitayā 'vasthāpitas tasyaiva yat kaivalyaṃ kevala ity anena viśeṣaṇenocyate bhavatā,
T11arhebt_u:5344: tad eva ghaṭaviraho ghaṭābhāva iti kathyate /
T11arhebt_u:5345: sa ca ghaṭaviraho liṅgabhūtasya kevalasya pradeśasya 1pratipattāv eva[683]siddho na tūttarakālaṃ tato 'nya eva ākārāntareṇa dhūmādivāgniḥ[684]sidhyati
T11arhebt_u:5346: tataḥ kasyedānīṃ tatpratipattāv eva sādhyapratītau satyāṃ talliṅgam[685]? /
T11arhebt_u:5348: jijñāsitasya ghaṭābhāvasya siddher anyasya kasyacid ajijñāsitatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:5350: ca yad etad uttarakālaṃ `yatra yatra kevalaḥ pradeśas tatra tatra ghaṭavirahaḥ` iti [S. 177b.] anvayasyānugamāmanu(gamanam anu)
T11arhebt_u:5351: saraṇam, tac ca nirarthakam ādāv eva sādhyapratīteḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5352: yata evaṃ tasmād anyabhāvaḥ kevalapradeśalakṣaṇaḥ sādhyasādhanayor bhedābhāvān na sādhanam abhāvasyeti sthitam /
T11arhebt_u:5353: tad evaṃ [T. 340b.] samudāyasādhyatāṃ 3liṅgasya ca dharmiṇā sambandhaṃ[686]pratipādayituṃ
T11arhebt_u:5354: yad uktaṃ pareṇa -- `pradeśādidharmiviśeṣaṇasyābhāvasya sādhanāt`[687]iti tadapṛthaksiddhidūṣaṇenaiva nirākṛtam /
T11arhebt_u:5355: viṣayaviṣayibhāvena tu sambandhapratipādane niraste paro 'nyathā sambandhaṃ sādhyasādhanayor darśayann āha -- asty anyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sambandho virodhākhyaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5356: tataḥ sambandhasadbhāvād anyabhāvād abhāvasya siddhir bhaviṣyatīti /
T11arhebt_u:5357: siddhāntavādī tu sādhyasādhanayor virodham evāsambhāvayan pṛcchati -- kena kasya virodhaḥ iti /
T11arhebt_u:5358: na hy atra sādhyasādhanayor virodhaḥ saṃbhavatīty abhiprāyaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5359: paro virodham abhiprāyānabhijñātayā darśayati -- anyabhāvena kevalapradeśātmanā pratiyogino yasyābhāvaḥ pramātum iṣṭo ghaṭādes tasyeti /
T11arhebt_u:5360: parasyaivaṃvādino asambandhābhidhāyitām ādarśayann āha -- kiṃnu vai pratiyogī ghaṭādiḥ pramātum iṣṭo yena pratiyogināḥ prameyatvena liṅgaliṅginor virodhaḥ sambandho 'bhidhīyate? /
T11arhebt_u:5361: naiva pratiyogī pramātum iṣṭaḥ kin tu tadabhāva iti cet,
T11arhebt_u:5364: [kumārilas tu manyate bhāvāṃśād bhinno '] [S. 179a.] yam abhāvāṃśas tato nānyabhāva eva tadabhāva iti kathaṃ tatpratipattir eva tadabhāvapratipattir iti /
T11arhebt_u:5366: na cāvastuno bhedaḥ sambhavati ato 'yaṃ vasturūpa eva / yad āha --
T11arhebt_u:5367: na cāvastuna ete syur bhedās tenāsya vastutā//
T11arhebt_u:5375: tat kathaṃ tatpratipattir evāparasya vyavacchedanam iti tannirāsārtham āha /
T11arhebt_u:5376: tasyānyasya pradeśasya [T. 342a.] kevalasya yat tat kaivalyam ekākitvam asahāyatā
T11arhebt_u:5377: tad eva aparasya pratiyogino ghaṭādeḥ vaikalyam abhāva iti tasmāt tadanyabhāva eva
T11arhebt_u:5378: bhāvāṃśa eva tvad abhimataḥ tadabhāvaḥpratiyogyabhāvāṃśo na tataḥ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmāntaram
T11arhebt_u:5380: tataś ca tatpratipattir eva ca tasyānyabhāvasya pratipattir eva 5ca tadapratipattiḥ[688] tasya pratiyogino 'pratipattir abhāvapratipattir iti yāvat /
T11arhebt_u:5381: evaṃ manyate -- yo 'yam abhāvāṃśo bhāvāṃśāt pṛthagbhūto vastuno dharmaḥ parikalpyate sa ghaṭādyabhāvātmakatāṃ [S. 179a.] tadrūpavaikalyād evānubhavati nānyathā /
T11arhebt_u:5385: na hi yad yadrūpavikalaṃ na bhavati tat tato 'nyatvam anubhavati,
T11arhebt_u:5388: sarvaṃ ca viśvam ekaṃ dravyaṃ prasajyeta,
T11arhebt_u:5390: sarvasya ca sarvatropayogaḥ syād ity avaśyam anyavastuno bhāvarūpatā tadanyābhāvātmikaiva /
T11arhebt_u:5392: tatsaṃyoga eva cendriyasya tadanyabhāvābhāvasaṃyoga [T. 342b.] iti kim ucyate --
T11arhebt_u:5396: pratyakṣeṇa tadākārotpattyā tadanyābhāvātmake[690]eva vasturūpe pratipanne pāścāt yasya {p. 189.1} yathāgṛhītābhilāpino vikalpasyopagamāt /
T11arhebt_u:5397: vistarataś cāyam abhāvavicāraḥpramāṇadvitvasiddhāv abhāvaṃ prameyaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca vicārayatā vihita iti tata evāvadhārya iti /
T11arhebt_u:5401: darśayann āha -- anyathā yadi tatpratipattir eva tadabhāvapratipattir iti neṣyate[691]tadā
T11arhebt_u:5402: tasya anyavastunaḥ svarūpaparicchedena tato 'nyasyātadrūpasya avyavacchede anirākaraṇe
T11arhebt_u:5403: tadabhāvāpratipattau tatpariccheda eva na syāt -- tasya tadanyavastunaḥ svarūpapratipattir eva na syāt /
T11arhebt_u:5405: tadatadrūpayoḥ tasya tadanyavastuno yadrūpaṃ pratiniyataṃ sakalatrailokyavilakṣaṇaṃ
T11arhebt_u:5406: yac cātadrūpaṃ tadrūpaṃ na bhavati pararūpaṃ tayoḥ avivekād avivecanād vivekenāvyavasthāpanād
T11arhebt_u:5408: sakalapararūpāsaṅkīrṇaṃ hi tadrūpam tac cet [T. 343a.] tatsāmarthyabhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa tathā nānukṛtaṃ kevalaṃ sammugdhākāram[692]eva tadutpannaṃ tadā kathan tena tatparicchedaḥ
T11arhebt_u:5409: syāt? / na hi yadrūpaṃ yadvastu tadrūpānanukāriṇā jñānena tatparicchedo yukto yathā -- śuklaśaṅkharūpānanukāriṇā kāmalinaḥ pītaśaṅkhāvabhāsinā jñāneneti /
T11arhebt_u:5410: pratiniyatarūpānukāre vā tatparicchedasya katham anyā 'vyavacchedo nāma? /
T11arhebt_u:5414: ity ata āha -- ya eṣa vyavahāraḥ sarvajanapratītaḥ kasyacid agnyāder vastuno darśanāt
T11arhebt_u:5415: kvaciddeśe tatsambandhini [S. 180b.] prāptyartho dṛṣṭasyādṛṣṭasya ca parihārārthaḥpravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ sa na syāt /
T11arhebt_u:5417: na hi yasmād ayaṃpratipattā analaṃpaśyann api saṅkīrṇatadatadrūpapratibhāsinā pratyakṣeṇa,
T11arhebt_u:5419: tathā hi -- asaṅkīrṇasyādarśane saṅkīrṇam api yadi na paśyet tadā loṣṭādiprakhyaṃ kathaṃ kasyacid etaddarśanaṃ syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:5420: sa evaṃbhūtaḥ saṅkīrṇadarśanavān {p. 190.1} pratipattā katham analam eva paśyati na salilādikam? /
T11arhebt_u:5421: kin tu saṅkīrṇarūpavastupratibhāsijñānatayā salilādikam api paśyati /
T11arhebt_u:5422: tataḥ kathaṃ salilārthītatra agnimati pradeśe na pravarteta? /
T11arhebt_u:5425: yas tu salilābhāvaḥ sa tatra salilasyānupalambhena /
T11arhebt_u:5426: tato jñānadvayena tadatadrūpayor vivekāl loke pravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ pratiniyato vyavahāraḥ sidhyatīti /
T11arhebt_u:5427: siddhāntavādy āha -- ko 'yam anupalambho nāma iti /
T11arhebt_u:5428: kadācit paro brūyāt salilopalambhavirahamātram ity ata āha -- yadi salila ity ādi /
T11arhebt_u:5429: kumārilasya tu salilopalambhanivṛttimātraṃ tuccharūpam abhāvapramāṇatayā nābhimatam eva /
T11arhebt_u:5433: kin tu yo 'bhāvātmanaḥ pratiṣedhyavastupratibhāsijñānātmanā 'pariṇāmaḥ sa tadanyavastupratibhāsijñānasahacarito 'bhyupagantavyo na kevala iti param abhyupagamayitum asyopanyāsaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5436: na ca tadanyavastuvijñānapariṇāmād anya eva tasyāpariṇāmo nāma bhavato 'bhimato bhāvāntarasyaivābhāvatvenopagatatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:5437: tulyayogyatārūpasyaikajñānasaṃsarggiṇa eva cānyavastuno vijñānaṃ tathopeyaṃ nānyasya,
T11arhebt_u:5439: na hi rūpajñānād rasādyabhāvapratītir yuktamatī [T. 344a.] deśādiviprakarṣavato vā /
T11arhebt_u:5441: rūpāntarāvabhāsitve hi tasya salilopalambhābhāva eva na sidhyet /
T11arhebt_u:5443: tadabhāvavyavahāre tv asmadabhimataivānupalabdhir āyāteti pratipādayitum asyopanyāsaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5445: [S. 181b.] tuccharūpo 'nupalambhas tadā katham {p. 191.1} abhāvaḥ kasyacit pratipattiḥ pariccheda iti yāvat,
T11arhebt_u:5447: atha na tasya pratipattirūpateṣyate kin tu taddhetubhāva ity āha -- pratipattihetur vā iti /
T11arhebt_u:5448: na hi sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasyābhāvasya pratipattiṃ prati hetubhāvo yuktaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5449: hetubhāve vā tasyānapekṣitasahakāriṇo nityaṃ tajjñānajananād abhāvajñānam evaikaṃ pratipattuḥ syāt,
T11arhebt_u:5451: na cājñātasyāsya nāstitājñānajananaṃ yuktam ity āha -- tasyāpi salilopalambhābhāvasya kathaṃ pratipattiḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:5452: athāyaṃ salilopalambhābhāvaḥ svayam apratīta eva salilābhāvapratītiṃ janayati tadā kasyacid api /
T11arhebt_u:5453: tad evāha -- tasya salilopalambhābhāvasya tato vā salilād anyasyānalādeḥ `vijñānaṃ vā 'nyavastuni` ity ata ātmano 'pariṇāmasya pṛthag avasthāpanāt,
T11arhebt_u:5454: tatrāpi tadaṅgīkaraṇe cātmano 'pariṇāmasya [T. 344b.] tadātmakatvān na tato bhedena vyavasthāpyeta /
T11arhebt_u:5455: tataś ca kasyacid api [S. 182a.] tasya tadanyasya vā 'pratipattāv api yady abhāvaḥ salilādeḥ pratīyate tadā svāpādyavasthāsv api salilādyabhāvaḥ kiṃ na pratīyate? /
T11arhebt_u:5458: vyavadhānādigrahaṇena caitaddarśayaty anyavastuno 'pi anyatvaṃ tattulyayogyatārūpāpekṣam eva,
T11arhebt_u:5462: prakāreṇānupalambhena salilābhāvapratītir na yujyate 'nalapratibhāsinaś ca jñānasya
T11arhebt_u:5463: pratiniyatākāratā nābhyupagamyate tasmād ayam analadarśī pratipattā 'nalaṃ paśyann
T11arhebt_u:5464: api saṅkīrṇarūpapratibhāsinā jñānena `analo 'yaṃ na salilam` iti nādhyavasyati anadhyavasyaṃś
T11arhebt_u:5465: ca salilarūpasyāpi pratibhāsanāt tadarthī na tiṣṭhet pravarteta nāpi pratiṣṭheta
T11arhebt_u:5467: tathā hi -- salilaṃ nāma tad ucyate yat sarvodanyāsantāpādyapanayanakṣamaṃ[694]sakalatadanyarūpāsaṅkīrṇapratiniyatākārajñānāvabhāsi /
T11arhebt_u:5468: idaṃ tv anyad eva śabalarūpaṃ kim apy avabhāsata iti /
T11arhebt_u:5469: {p. 192.1} tataśca pravṛttinivṛttiyor viruddhayor yugapad anuṣṭhātum aśakyatvāt dustaraṃvyasanaṃpratipattuḥsyāt /
T11arhebt_u:5470: atra parasya [S. 182b.] vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkyāha -- tata eva ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5471: na mayā [T. 345a.] salilopalambhanivṛttimātrāt tuccharūpāt tadabhāvagatir ucyate,
T11arhebt_u:5473: kin tu yad etad ekasya kevalasyānalasya darśanaṃ tata evānyasya tatrāpratibhāsamānasya salilasyābhāvagatir bhavati `vijñānaṃ vā 'nyavastuni` iti vacanāt /
T11arhebt_u:5476: tathā hi -- tasmin dṛśyamāne tadevāstīty avagacchatu,
T11arhebt_u:5477: tadanyat tu nāstīti kim iti pratyetīti /
T11arhebt_u:5478: tasyaiva paridṛśyamānasyānalādeḥ kevalasya salilāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya darśanād analajñāne pratibhāsanāt `salilaṃ nāsti` iti niścayaḥ sañjāyate /
T11arhebt_u:5479: tathā hi -- anala iva salilam api yadi tatrābhāviṣyat tadapy analavad darśane pratyabhāsiṣyata tayoḥ svajñānaṃ pratyaviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyā naikasya pratibhāso yuktaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5480: tasmād ekapratibhāsanam anyābhāvanāntarīyakaṃ ity anyābhāve tato jñānam utpadyate anyavastuni ca vijñānaṃ nāstīti jñānaṃ janayati /
T11arhebt_u:5482: tadrūpatayaiva[695]ca tajjñānam anyat[696]pratiyad evaṃ vyapadiśyate 'nyathā[697]tadayogād[698]ity anyapratipattir eva tadabhāvavikalpahetur iti siddhāntavādy āha
T11arhebt_u:5484: nanv asmābhir idam eva prāg abhihitaṃ tayoḥsatoḥnaikarūpaniyatāpratipattiḥ asambhavāt[699] ity ādibhir vacanaiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5485: tato yad evānyāsaṃsarggiṇaḥ kevalasya [T. 345b.] pratibhāsanaṃ tad eva tadanyābhāvasyāpi,
T11arhebt_u:5486: tasyaiva kevalasya tadanyābhāvātmakatvād anyasya cābhāvāṃśasya nirastatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:5487: tataḥ pratyakṣāvabhāsitatvāt tadabhāvasya tadbalāt pāścātyaṃ vyavahārapravartanarūpaṃ nāstitājñānaṃ {p. 193.1} vikalpakam ājāyate /
T11arhebt_u:5489: yatas tadanyavastuni vijñānaṃ pratyakṣātmakam apy anavagate tadanyābhāve jñānaṃ janayat pṛthag abhāvapramāṇatayā vyavasthāpyeta /
T11arhebt_u:5490: tathā hi -- tadanyākāraśūnya eva tadekajñānākāraḥ saṃvedyate /
T11arhebt_u:5492: na hi vikalpajñānasyāpi tadākāraśūnyarūpasaṃvedanād anyat tadabhāvasaṃvedanaṃ nāma /
T11arhebt_u:5495: anale `analo 'trāsti` iti pāścātyo vikalpo vyavahārapravartanamātraṃ na tataḥ pṛthak pramāṇaṃ yathoktaṃ prāk,
T11arhebt_u:5496: tathā nāstitājñānam api vikalpakaṃ tatphaladvāreṇa vā 'nyavastuvijñānaṃ na pratyakṣāt pṛthag abhāvākhyaṃ [S. 183b.] pramāṇam iti /
T11arhebt_u:5497: tasmād yad evāsmābhir abhihitaṃ tadanyābhāvapratītiṃ prati,
T11arhebt_u:5498: tad eva tvayā 'py abhidhīyata iti kasmāt puruṣam ivābhāti yatas tadanabhyupagamena pṛthagabhāvākhyaṃ pramāṇam abhyupagatam ity upahasati /
T11arhebt_u:5499: tathā hy agaty edānīṃ tvayocyate na madhyasthatayā anyathedam eva kiṃ na pūrvam evābhihitam?
T11arhebt_u:5500: , yata ālajālābhidhānena ''tmā parikleśita [T. 346a.] ity upasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt tīrādarśineva ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5501: yathā kila vahanārūḍhair vaṇigbhiḥ śakunirmucyate api nāma tīraṃ drakṣyatīti /
T11arhebt_u:5502: sa yadā sarvataḥ paryaṭaṃstīraṃ nāsādayati tadā vahanam evāgacchati tadvad etad api draṣṭavyam /
T11arhebt_u:5503: yataś cāvaśyābhyupagamanīyo 'yaṃ pakṣas tasmān na kiñcid anayā 'vidyamānapratiṣṭhānayā
T11arhebt_u:5505: tad evaṃ parasyānyabhāvatadabhāvayor liṅgaliṅgibhāvam icchataḥ sambandhābhāvād[700]asāv
T11arhebt_u:5506: ayuktaḥ iti pratipādite pareṇa `asati sambandhe 'nyabhāvagatyā 'pi tadabhāvagatir
T11arhebt_u:5507: na syāt` iti codite `na vai kutaścit sambandhād` ity ādy abhihitam /
T11arhebt_u:5508: tataḥ `anyabhāva eva tadabhāvo 'nyabhāvagatir eva ca tadabhāvagatiḥ` iti prasādhayatākumārilaparikalpitaḥ
T11arhebt_u:5509: kasyacid abhāvaniścayārtham abhāvapramāṇavādaḥ prasaṅgato nirastaḥ samprati tu --
T11arhebt_u:5512: ity etad āhatya nirākartuṃ [S. 184a.] pūrvapakṣam utthāpayann āha -- yady ekaparicchedād eva ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5513: yadi hi ekasya kevalasya paricchedād anyasya vyavacchedaḥpratiṣedhaḥ sidhyati tadā sarvasyā a(-syā)
T11arhebt_u:5514: nyasyā 'viśeṣeṇaiva tatra deśe yatrāsāv ekaḥ paridṛśyate tatrābhāvasiddhir bhavet,
T11arhebt_u:5515: na tu viśeṣaparigraheṇa [T. 346b.] tulyā svajñānajananaṃ prati yogyāvasthā yasya tasyaiveti /
T11arhebt_u:5516: tathā hi -- asau yathā tulyayogyatārūpapadārthaviviktarūpa upalabhyate,
T11arhebt_u:5519: tataś ca tadviviktākāratayā tadanyābhāvasādhane viśeṣābhāvāt pradeśarūpajñānaṃ ghaṭābhāvam iva rasādyabhāvam api sādhayet,
T11arhebt_u:5521: kiñ ca, yad etad `upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhir abhāvasādhanī` iti viśeṣaṇam uktaṃ tac ca na vaktavyam /
T11arhebt_u:5523: yato ye 'py anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptās teṣām api tatra deśe tadekākāratayā jñānasya vyavacchedo bhavaty eva /
T11arhebt_u:5524: tathā hi -- yathopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptās tadekākāravati jñāne na pratibhāsante tataś
T11arhebt_u:5525: ca vyavacchidyante [S. 184b.] tathā 'nupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptā apīti kim upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya
T11arhebt_u:5527: evaṃ pūrvapakṣe vyavasthite yadi tadanyavyavacchedaḥ -- tataḥ pṛthakkaraṇam anyatvena vyavasthāpanam abhimataṃ tadabhyupagamyata eva /
T11arhebt_u:5530: yena hi sāmarthyena tulyayogyatārūpasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya cābhāvaṃ sādhayati na tatsāmarthyam atulyayogyatārūpe 'nupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpte vā sambhavati /
T11arhebt_u:5531: `tayoḥ sator naikarūpaniyatā pratipattiḥ asambhavāt`[701]ity evaṃ hi tadabhāvasādhanam / na [T. 347a.] caitad
T11arhebt_u:5532: anyatra sambhavatīti pratipādayitum ekātmaparicchedāt ity ādinopakramate /
T11arhebt_u:5533: yat puro 'vasthitaṃ pratyakṣe 'vabhāsate tasyaikasyātmanaḥ pratiniyatasya rūpasya
T11arhebt_u:5534: paricchedāt tadākārotpattyā vidhivikalpotpādanena ca yaḥ tadanyaḥtato 'nyas tadvyatiriktas
T11arhebt_u:5535: tasya sarvasya ya ātmā {p. 195.1} svabhāvas tato vyavacchedo bhedanaṃ pṛthakkaraṇam
T11arhebt_u:5537: kathaṃ punar ekātmaparicchedād eva tasya[702]tadanyātmano vyavacchedaḥ pratyakṣeṇa kriyate?
T11arhebt_u:5538: , yāvatā pratyakṣaṃ puro 'vsthitapadārthasāmarthyabhāvi [S. 185a.] tadrūpam eva pratipadyatām /
T11arhebt_u:5539: yat tu tadvyatiriktam aśeṣapadārthajātaṃ tadātmanas tasya puro 'vasthitasya kathaṃ tadvyavacchedakam?
T11arhebt_u:5546: anyathā katham abhāvapramāṇato 'py asāṃkaryam eṣāṃ sidhyet? /
T11arhebt_u:5548: tasmin pararūpāsaṃkīrṇe svabhāvata eva tadātmaniyato yaḥ pratibhāsaḥ pararūpapratibhāsāsaṃkīrṇaḥ
T11arhebt_u:5549: tadekapadārthasāmarthyabhāvini pratyakṣe pararūpapratibhāsāyogāt tasya bhrāntatāpattyā pratyakṣatāhāneḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5550: tad uktam -- tad dhy arthasāmarthyenotpadyamānaṃtadrūpam evānukuryāt [PVin I 40.12f:
T11arhebt_u:5551: gaṅ gi phyir de don gyi nus pa las skyes pa na de 'i raṅ bḥzin kho na'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
T11arhebt_u:5553: tasya tadātmaniyatapratibhāsasya jñānāt pratyakṣeṇa svasaṃvittyā saṃvedanāt /
T11arhebt_u:5555: vyavacchedanaṃpṛthakkaraṇaṃ tadbalenaiva ca pāścātyaḥ `anyātmakam etan na bhavati` ity asāṃkaryavyavasthāpratyayo vikalpakaḥ saṃjāyate gṛhītagrāhī
T11arhebt_u:5558: yadi nāma tadātmaniyatapratibhāsajñānaṃ tathāpi katham anyātmanaḥ tasya pṛthakkaraṇam?
T11arhebt_u:5559: ity ata āha -- na hi tadātma ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5560: yasmāt tasya vastuno ya ātmā pararūpāsaṃkīṛṇnaḥ sa tadanyasya śeṣasya vastuna ātmā na bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:5564: na hi jñānenārtho haste gṛhītvā 'nyato nivarttanīyaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5565: kevalam anyarūpāsaṃkīrṇasyaikasātmano 'nukaraṇam evāsyānyato [T. 248a.] nivarttanam ucyata iti /
T11arhebt_u:5567: tadā 'sya viṣayasyānyātmanaḥ sakāśād avyavacchede pṛthag avyavasthāpane parātmano 'pi tatra paricchedaḥ syāt,
T11arhebt_u:5569: tataś cāvyavacchede 'nyātmanas tatparicchedaprasaṅgāt pravṛttinivṛttyor abhāva iti pūrvaḥ prasaṅgo `na hy ayam analaṃ paśyann
T11arhebt_u:5571: na kevalam anyātmanas tannivarttayati tadātmano 'py aśeṣam anyad iti darśayann āha
T11arhebt_u:5572: -- taṃca agrataḥ sthitaṃ deśākālasvabhāvāvasthāniyataṃ tadanyadeśādibhyo vyāvṛttātmanaḥ
T11arhebt_u:5577: kasmāt punar anyadeśāditāṃ tataḥ pṛthagavasthāpayati ity ata āha -- evaṃhi yasmād anyadeśatādes tataḥ pṛthakkaraṇe sati taddeśādiniyataḥ padārthaḥ [T. 348b.] paricchinno bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:5579: yady anyathābhāvo 'nyadeśāditā tadrūpānanukārād vyavacchinnaḥ -- bhavati tathātvaṃ ca taddeśādiniyatatvaṃ ca,
T11arhebt_u:5581: yata evam iti tasmād anyathābhūtād anyadeśādimatas tathābhūtaṃ
T11arhebt_u:5582: taddeśādimaṃtaṃ vyavacchindaty eva [S. 186b.] nivarttayanty eva tat paricchinattīti pūrvakasyopasaṃhāraḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5583: tathā tathābhūtād anyathābhūtaṃvyavacchindaty eva iti dvitīyasyopasaṃhāraḥ kārya iti /
T11arhebt_u:5584: evam uktena nyāyena ekasya pramāṇasya pratyakṣasyānumānasya vā tasyāpy evam eva svaviṣayaparicchedād vṛttiḥ pravṛttiḥ sarvabhāvān dvairāśye tattve 'nyatve ca vyavasthāpayati /
T11arhebt_u:5587: {p. 197.1} nanu ca vikalpavyāpāra eṣa `idam anyātmakaṃ na bhavati anyathaitad ātmakam` iti /
T11arhebt_u:5588: pratyakṣaṃ ca nirvikalpakam iṣyate tat katham asāṃkaryasiddhis tataḥ?
T11arhebt_u:5590: tad dhi pratyakṣaṃ vidhipratiṣedhavikalpau yadā svaviṣaye janayati tadaivāsya sāphalyam,
T11arhebt_u:5593: kṣāṇikatādāvanvayavyatirekabuddhī janayitum asāmarthyāt tatrāsya prāmāṇyaṃ neṣyata iti /
T11arhebt_u:5594: syān matam -- dvairāśyasādhane 'py asāṃkaryasiddhyarthā mā bhūd abhāvapramāṇakalpanā kin tu prakārāntarābhāvasiddhyarthā bhaviṣyati /
T11arhebt_u:5595: na hi tadabhāvasiddhau pratyakṣasya kaścid vyāpāraḥ [S. 187a.] pratipādita iti ata āha -- tadvyatiriktetyādi /
T11arhebt_u:5596: tasmāt paridṛśyamānād vyatiriktasyāśeṣasya vastuno vyavacchedena tataḥ pṛthakkaraṇenānyatvena yā vyāptis tatsādhanād eva prakārāntarasya tattvānyatvabahirbhūtasyābhāvaḥ sidhyati /
T11arhebt_u:5598: atha matam -- sarvasyāparidṛṣṭasya dṛśyamānād anyatayā vyāptiṃ naiva pratyakṣaṃ sādhayati tat kutas tṛtīyarāśyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣata eva syāt,
T11arhebt_u:5599: yato 'bhāvaprāmāṇyakalpanā vyarthā bhaved ity ata āha -- tasya tṛtīyarāśitayā kalpyamānasya
T11arhebt_u:5600: tato dṛṣṭād anyatayā vyaptyabhāve tena pratyakṣeṇa tato[709] 'rthāt svaviṣayasya
T11arhebt_u:5602: tadarthasya ca rāśyantaratvena kalpyamānasya svaviṣayād avyavacchedāt apṛthakkaraṇāt punar api bhāvasya svaviṣayasyāparicchedaprasaṅgāt /
T11arhebt_u:5603: [T. 349b.] sa hi tadviṣayaḥ sakalapararūpāsaṃkīrṇātmā yadi tenātmanā na paricchinnaḥ kathaṃ tena tasya paricchedaḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:5604: tenātmanā paricchede vā kathaṃ sarvasya tadanyatayā vyāptyasādhanam?
T11arhebt_u:5607: yata evaṃ tasmāt kvacid vastuni pramāṇaṃ {p. 198.1} pratyakṣādikaṃ [S. 187b.] pravṛttaṃ tadvastu
T11arhebt_u:5614: evam ekasya pramāṇasya vyāpāra eṣo 'nantarokta iti tam evopasaṃhṛtya sukhapratipattaye
T11arhebt_u:5615: darśayannāha -- tathāhi kvacid vastuni pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣādi pravṛttaṃ tad eva vastu
T11arhebt_u:5616: tadanyasmāt pararūpād vyavacchinatti tataḥ pṛthakkaroti tadasaṃkīrṇarūpatayā pratipadyate,
T11arhebt_u:5617: paramārthatas tasya tadrūpatvāt yathāvastu ca pratyakṣeṇa rūpānukārāt /
T11arhebt_u:5620: tathā tad anyad eva ca tasmād dṛśyamānād anyad eva ca vyavacchinatti /
T11arhebt_u:5626: anyasya pararūpasya tatra svālambane 'paricchedād avaśyam evāparicchinnasya [S. 188a.] paricchinnād anyatvaṃ bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:5627: yata evam ataḥ tad eva pramāṇam ekavastuparicchedakaṃ prakārāntarābhāvaṃ sādhayati,
T11arhebt_u:5631: vastuni dṛṣṭatadanyatvena tasyānyasya tatrāparicchidyamānasyānyatvaṃ tadanyatvaṃ dṛṣṭāt tadanyatvaṃ dṛṣṭatadanyatvaṃ tena sarvasya tadvyatiriktasya vyavasthāpanān na a(-panena a)
T11arhebt_u:5632: tad anyasyaiva ca yad anyan na bhavati puro 'vasthitaṃ sakalaparabhāvavyāvṛttaṃ tasyaiva tattvena dṛśyamānaprakāratayā vyavasthāpanād iti /
T11arhebt_u:5633: amum eva nyāyam anyatrāpy atidiśann āha -- etena kramākramādayaḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5634: etena anantaroktena nyāyena pratiniyataikapadārtharūpānukāriṇī buddhir upajāyamānā
T11arhebt_u:5635: tadviparītarūpaṃ sarvaṃ svaviṣayād vyavacchindatī dvairāśyaṃ tṛtīyaprakārābhāvaṃ
T11arhebt_u:5636: ca sādhayatīti[711]ye kecid anyonyavyavacchedarūpāḥ kramākramanityānityādayaḥ te vyākhyātāḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5637: {p. 199.1} tathā hi -- kāryasya kramamananyasahāyatāṃ pratiyaty eva buddhis tasyākramaṃ kāryāntarasāhityaṃ [T. 350b.] tataḥ pṛthakkaroti /
T11arhebt_u:5638: tataḥ kramākramatayā dvaitasiddheḥ tṛtīyasya prakārasya sambhavo nirasto bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:5640: evam udayānantaradhvaṃsitā [S. 188b.] kṣaṇikatocyata iti pratīyatī vyavasthāpanākāla
T11arhebt_u:5641: eva buddhis tadviparītarūpatāyāḥ svaviṣayād apākaraṇāt tato 'nyatvena prakārāntare
T11arhebt_u:5643: tad evam ekapramāṇanibandhanām asāṅkaryasiddhiṃ pratipādyopasaṃharayann āha -- tad
T11arhebt_u:5644: evam uktena nyāyena ekasya pratiniyatātmana upalambhāt tasyopalabhyamānasya yas tato
T11arhebt_u:5645: 'nyas tattulyayogyatārūpas tadviparīto vā tadrūpavikalas tadātmano vyavacchedaḥ pṛthakkaraṇaṃ
T11arhebt_u:5647: tathā tasya svaviṣayasya tadanyātmatāyā bhāvapradhānatvān nirdeśasya vyavacchedo bhavati asāṅkaryaṃ sidhyati /
T11arhebt_u:5648: tad yady etad aviśeṣaṇānyasya sarvasya tatrābhāvasiddhiḥ syād ity atrābhimataṃ tadā siddhasādhanam,
T11arhebt_u:5649: yataḥ sarvam aviśeṣeṇaiva tad ekākārayā budhyā tadrūpavikalaṃ svaviṣayād avacchidyate,
T11arhebt_u:5651: atha taddeśakālayor abhāvaḥ sarvasya [T. 351a.][S. 189a.] tadviparītarūpasya vyavacchedo
T11arhebt_u:5652: 'bhimataḥ sa na yukta iti darśayati -- na taddeśakālayoḥ yatrāsau pratiniyatātmā
T11arhebt_u:5653: sakalatrailokyavilakṣaṇaḥ padārtha upalabhyate tatra sarvasyānyasya bhāvasya tattulyayogyatārūpasyetarasya
T11arhebt_u:5655: yena hi kāraṇena tattulyayogyatārūpasya tatrāpratibhāsamānasya pratiṣedhas tasmin
T11arhebt_u:5656: sati tad ekarūpaniyatāyāḥ pratipatter asaṃbhavāt tad[713]abhāvanāntarīyikā 3sā bhavantī
T11arhebt_u:5658: ca na sambhavatīti kathaṃ tadabhāvaḥ sidhyet /
T11arhebt_u:5659: {p. 200.1} etad evopasaṃharann āha -- tasmād atadātmā ca sarvas tadviparītarūpas
T11arhebt_u:5660: tadekākārayā buddhyā prasādhitaḥ syāt taddeśakālaśca tasya pratibhāsamānasya yau
T11arhebt_u:5661: deśakālau tau yasya, sa ca syāt /
T11arhebt_u:5664: na hi rūpapratibhāsinā jñānena tadrūpavikalasya rasasya svaviṣayāt pṛthakkaraṇe 'pi tad asāṃkaryasādhane 'pi taddeśakālayor abhāvaḥ [S. 189b.] sidhyati /
T11arhebt_u:5665: tataś ca kathaṃ sarvasyātulyayogyāvasthasyāpi tatrābhāvaḥ syāt?
T11arhebt_u:5667: yata evaṃ tasmāt kvacit kadācit kasyacid abhāvasiddhir yathoktād evānupalambhād upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya [T. 351b.] tattulyayogyatārūpopalambhātmanaś cety evaṃrūpāt,
T11arhebt_u:5672: na hy anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpte pramāṇapañcakāpravṛttāv api tadabhāvaḥ sidhyati,
T11arhebt_u:5673: saty api tasmin svabhāvādiviprakarṣeṇa pramāṇapañcakāpravṛttisambhavād iti /
T11arhebt_u:5674: tad evaṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ parisamāpayya yad uktaṃpareṇa `sa evānyabhāvas tadviṣayā copalabdhiḥ
T11arhebt_u:5675: tadabhāvasya kiṃ na sādhanam`[715]iti tatrānyabhāvasya tadabhāvaṃ prati liṅgatve
T11arhebt_u:5676: niraste tadviṣayāyā upalabdher nirākurvann āha -- anyabhāvaviṣayetyādi /
T11arhebt_u:5677: yat punar uktam -- anyabhāvaviṣayopalabdhis tadabhāvasya kinna sādhanam`[716]iti sā tadabhāvasya sādhikeṣṭaivāsmākam,
T11arhebt_u:5680: yataḥ tatrāpy anyabhāvaviṣayāyām[717]upalabdhāv 'bhāvasya pṛthag anyabhāvāt sādhyatve kalpyamāne sambandhābhāvasya tadabhāvena tulyatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:5681: na hi tasyā api anyabhāvarūpāyāḥ tadabhāvena kaścid ekārthasamavāyādirūpaḥ sambandho 'stīti /
T11arhebt_u:5682: apṛthak siddher ity asyāpi tulyatāṃ darśayann -- āha liṅgāvirbhāvetyādi /
T11arhebt_u:5683: yeyam anyabhāvaviṣayā upalabdhir lliṅgatayocyate tasyās {p. 201.1} tadviviktapradeśākārāyā [T. 352a.] āvirbhāvakāla eva 2janmakāle pratītikāla eva[718]vā tadabhāvasiddheś ca /
T11arhebt_u:5685: tad eva sādhayati -- na hy anyasya tadviviktasya bhāvaṃ pratipadya pratipattā punar
T11arhebt_u:5691: tathā hi -- saghaṭapradeśāsaṃkīrṇarūpasya [S. 190b.] kevalapradeśasya darśanam eva ghaṭābhāvadarśanam /
T11arhebt_u:5692: na hi `ghaṭo 'tra nāsti` `ghaṭavānayaṃ na bhavati` `saghaṭād anyaḥ` ity arthabhedaḥ
T11arhebt_u:5693: kaścit / tataḥ saghaṭād anyatayā kevalapradeśasya darśanam eva ghaṭābhāvadarśanam iti /
T11arhebt_u:5697: pradeśavastv asti` `idaṃ tu ghaṭavastu nāsti` iti pāścātyena vikalpadvayena vyavasthāpanāt[720] /
T11arhebt_u:5700: tad eva vyatirekamukhena darśayati -- tac ca tasya ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5704: tad ekopalabdheḥ tasyaikasyānanyasaṃsarggiṇo yopalabdhir viśeṣarūpā tasyāḥ kvacid apy anyatrābhāvāt /
T11arhebt_u:5705: atha tadviviktopalabdhisāmānyaṃ hetur ucyate -- yatra yatra ghaṭaviviktabhūtalopalabdhis
T11arhebt_u:5706: tatra [S. 191a.] tatra ghaṭābhāvo yathā pūrvānubhūte ghaṭavivikte pradeśa ity āha
T11arhebt_u:5707: -- sāmānyena pradarśane kriyamāṇe dṛṣṭānte 'pi pūrvānubhūtaghaṭavivikte pradeśe ghaṭābhāvasya
T11arhebt_u:5709: kiṃ tu saiva tadanyabhāvopalabdhiḥ sādhyadharmasya tadabhāvalakṣaṇasya {p. 202.1} sādhikā /
T11arhebt_u:5710: sā ca yathā sādhyadharmiṇi tadabhāvasiddhaye dṛṣṭāntam apekṣate tathā
T11arhebt_u:5714: yata evaṃ tasmān na kutaścil lliṅgāt tadanyabhāvāt tadupalabdher vā tadabhāvasiddhir iti /
T11arhebt_u:5717: , ity ata āha -- so 'nyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣalakṣaṇena -- pratyakṣasyaiva vivakṣitopalambhād anyatvenānupalambhatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:5721: yas tv amūḍho [S. 191b.] viṣayapratipattau viṣayiṇaṃ smaraty eva tasyābhāvavyavahāraḥ
T11arhebt_u:5722: pratyakṣanibandhana eveti na tatrānupalabdher liṅgateti sucarccitam evānyatretīhālaṃ prasaṅgeneti /
T11arhebt_u:5726: [638] yeṣu satsu bhavaty eva yat tebhyo anyasya kalpane //
T11arhebt_u:5740: [651] atrāntare granthe svayam evācāryo vipa- -- T.
T11arhebt_u:5815: [724] anyabhāvo 'nupalambhena siddho yaḥ sa katham anupalabdhiḥ? ity āha
T11arhebt_u:5817: tad evam anupalabdher aśeṣavipratipattinirākaraṇena svarūpam avasthāpya prabhedanirddeśārtham āha -- seyaṃyatoktātridhā'nupalabdhiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5819: siddhe tatprasādhakena pramāṇena kāryakāraṇabhāve sati kāraṇasyānupalabdhiḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5822: tathā, vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ tatprasādhanapramāṇabalenaiva siddhābhāvasyaiva vyāpakasya nānyasya vyāpakānupalabdher evāsiddhatāprasaṅgād
T11arhebt_u:5825: kathaṃ punaḥ kāraṇavyāpakayor abhāvavyavahāraḥ sidhyati yatas tayoḥ siddhābhāvatocyata
T11arhebt_u:5826: [T. 353b.] ity āha -- tatra kāraṇavyāpakayor api na kevalaṃ yasya sākṣād abhāvavyavahāraḥ sādhyate /
T11arhebt_u:5827: svabhāvānupalabdhau svabhāvasyāsadvyavahārasya siddhir anyasya tadviviktasya bhāvasiddhir yā saivāsadvyavahārasiddhihetutvād evam ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:5830: yadā 'nayor virūpaviṣayatayā {p. 203.1} saviśeṣāṇām upalabdhir na sidhyati tadā'bhāvam abhāvavyavahāraṃvāsādhayati /
T11arhebt_u:5832: atha kiṃ svabhāvānupalabdhāv apy abhāvo liṅgatayā sādhyata ity āha -- svabhāvānupalabdhau tu ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5835: atra parasya vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkyāha -- yadi tarhi kāraṇavyāpakau siddho 'sadvyavahāro yayoḥ tau santau /
T11arhebt_u:5837: tadanyasya karaṇavyāpakaviviktasya bhāvasya siddhir yā pratyakṣātmikā tadrūpayā 'nupalabdhyā,
T11arhebt_u:5838: anyasya kāryasya vyāpyasya vā 'bhāvam abhāvavyavahāraṃ ca sādhayataḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5839: sā cānyabhāvopalabdhis tayoḥ kāraṇavyāpakayor upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāv eva satyām
T11arhebt_u:5840: asadvyavahārasya sādhikā nānyathā ity evam iṣyamāṇe [T. 354a.][S. 192b.] sati kathaṃ
T11arhebt_u:5842: yadā kāryasvabhāvahetvor vyatirekaprayogaḥ kriyate -- yatra yatrāgnir nāsti tatra tatra dhūmo 'pi nāsti,
T11arhebt_u:5843: tathā yatra yatra vṛkṣo nāsti kṣaṇikatā vā tatra tatra śiṃśapā nāsti sattvaṃ vā ity aśeṣapadārthaparigraheṇa vyatirekaprayoge sati /
T11arhebt_u:5848: tathā ca katham aśeṣopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptyā kāryasvabhāvahetvor vyatirekaḥ sidhyet? /
T11arhebt_u:5850: tasmāt kvacid adarśanamātrād eva vyatireka eṣṭavyaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:5853: siddhāntavādy āha -- naiva parokṣe 'rthe kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhyoḥ prayogo [S. 193.a]
T11arhebt_u:5854: vyatirekopadarśanakāle pramāṇatayā kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā 'nupalabdhiḥ pramāṇabhūtā naiva prayujyate /
T11arhebt_u:5856: liṅgasya kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhilakṣaṇasya tadabhāvalakṣaṇasya vā aniścayāt tadanupalabdhyoḥ sandeharūpatvāt tadabhāvasya ca [T. 354b.] sandigdhatvāt
T11arhebt_u:5860: vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasādhakena ca tadutpattilakṣaṇe tādātmyalakṣaṇe ca sambandhe sādhite
T11arhebt_u:5861: siddhasambandhayor yady abhāvo yatra yatrābhāvaḥ syāt parasyāpi kāryasya vyāpyasya
T11arhebt_u:5864: taddvāreṇa pratibandhaprasādhake pramāṇe smṛtiḥ kathaṃ nāma
T11arhebt_u:5865: syād ity etasyārthasya darśanārtham ete kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhī prayujyeta iti /
T11arhebt_u:5866: darśanādarśanabalena tu sādhane yatraivaikadarśane paro dṛṣṭo 'darśane vā na dṛṣṭaḥ tatraiva tasya bhāvo 'bhāvo vā bhavatu sarvatra tu kasmād bhavati? /
T11arhebt_u:5867: na hy apratibaddhātmanāṃ gavāśvādīnāṃ kvacit tathābhāvadarśane 'pi sarvatra tathābhāvo bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:5868: puruṣasya tu sarvadā kvacid ekabhāvābhāvayor aparasya [S. 193b.] bhāvābhāvadarśanaṃ yadṛcchāsaṃvādaḥ sambhāvyeta asati pratibandhe / tathā cāha
T11arhebt_u:5870: pramāṇasiddhe saty avaśyam eva yatra yatra kāryaṃ tatra tatra kāraṇam,
T11arhebt_u:5871: yatra yatra tadabhāvaḥ tatra tatra ca kāryasyāpy abhāvo 'nyathā kāraṇam antareṇa kāryasya bhāve tasyāhetutaiva syāt /
T11arhebt_u:5873: tathā yatra yatra yatsvabhāvas tatra tatra tadbhāvaḥ[726]anyathā tasya nairātmyam
T11arhebt_u:5874: eva syād iti vyāptyaivānvayavyatirekopadarśane pratibandhaḥ khyāpayituṃ śakyate nānyatheti
T11arhebt_u:5880: evaṃ kāraysvabhāvānupalabdhilakṣaṇe eva pakṣadharme tatsādhakapramāṇasadbhāvād anvayavyatirekasadbhāvo
T11arhebt_u:5881: nānyatreti pratipādyopasaṃharann {p. 205.1} āha -- iti eṣa eva [S. 194a.] svabhāvakāryānupalabdhilakṣaṇaḥ
T11arhebt_u:5883: yataś cānvayavyatirekavān pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇasadbhāvād uktena nyāyena iti tasmāt tadaṃśena vyāpto 'nvayavyatirekaniścayenaiva tadaṃśavyāpter niścayād yathoktaṃ prāk,
T11arhebt_u:5884: [T. 355b.] tataś ca tadaṃśavyāptivacanāt trilakṣaṇa eva trirūpa eva trividha eva
T11arhebt_u:5885: hetur ggamako nānyalakṣaṇo 'nyo vā yathoktatrairūpyasadbhāve rūpāntarasya vaiyarthyāt
T11arhebt_u:5887: kasmāt trilakṣāṇa eva trividha eva hetur ggamako nānyalakṣaṇo 'nyo veti darśayati svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārād iti trilakṣaṇasyaiva svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārāt
T11arhebt_u:5888: / svasādhyadharmāvyabhicāra eva ca gamakatvam iti rūpāntarakalpanā vyarthā /
T11arhebt_u:5890: tad anena `tridhaiva sa` ity asya trilakṣaṇa eva sa hetur avinābhāvasya svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārasya
T11arhebt_u:5892: ca rūpāntarakalpanāyām api hetvābhāsās tato 'pare yathoktatrilakṣaṇād apare rūpāntarayogitayā
T11arhebt_u:5898: yaduktaṃ `trilakṣaṇa eva hetur nānyalakṣaṇaḥ` iti tatra pareṣāṃ vipratipattiṃ darśayann āha -- ṣaḍlakṣaṇo hetur ity aparenaiyāyika-mīmāṃsakādayo manyante /
T11arhebt_u:5899: kāni punaḥ ṣaḍrūpāṇi hetos tair iṣyaṃte?
T11arhebt_u:5902: abādhitaḥ pramāṇenānirākṛto viṣayaḥ sādhyadharmalakṣaṇo yasya sa tathoktaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam aparaṃ rūpam /
T11arhebt_u:5904: ekā saṃkhyā yasya {p. 206.1} hetudravyasya tadekasaṃkhyaṃ vivakṣitam ekasaṃkhyaṃ hetudravyam āśrayatvena yasya hetusāmānyasya tadvivakṣitaikasaṃkhyaṃ tadbhāvo 'paraṃ rūpam /
T11arhebt_u:5905: yady ekasaṃkhyāvyavacchinnāyāṃ pratiheturahitāyāṃ hetuvyaktau hetutvaṃ bhavati tadā gamakatvaṃ na tu pratihetusahitāyām api 1dvisaṃkhyāyuktāyām
T11arhebt_u:5909: na hy ajñāto hetuḥ svasattāmātreṇa gamako yuktaḥ [T. 356b.] iti /
T11arhebt_u:5910: tatraiteṣu rūpāntareṣu yad etad abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ nāma tat tāvat pratibandhanibandhanānvayavyatirekātmakā 'vinābhāvasambhave sati tataḥ pṛthag anyallakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:5911: tadātmakaṃ tu tadvacanenaivoktam iti na vaktavyam iti /
T11arhebt_u:5914: tathā hi -- saty apy avinābhāve yathokte bādhāsambhavaṃ manyamānair abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaram ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:5917: tam eva virodhaṃ sādhayann āha -- avinābhāvo hi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5918: saty eva hi sādhyadharme bhāvo hetor avinābhāva ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:5920: yadi hi saty eva tasmiṃs tadabhāvaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravartteta tadā 'sya bhrāntatvād apramāṇataiva syāt
T11arhebt_u:5922: tataḥ sa hetuḥ tallakṣaṇaḥ sādhyāvinābhāvī dharmiṇi syāt /
T11arhebt_u:5925: tasmād avinābhāvasya pramāṇabādhāyāś ca sahānavasthānam avinābhāvenopasthāpitasya
T11arhebt_u:5926: dharmiṇi sādhyadharmabhāvasya pramāṇabādhopasthāpitasya ca tadabhāvasya parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇatayā
T11arhebt_u:5928: tam eva virodhaṃ saṣṭīkartuṃ paropahāsavyājenāha -- pratyakṣānumāne hi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5931: tasmiṃś ca sādhyadharme saty eva tadavinābhāvitvād dhetur bhavaṃs taṃ {p. 207.1}
T11arhebt_u:5932: sādhyadharmaṃ niṣkāsyamānaṃ gale gṛhītvā haṭhāt tatraiva dharmiṇyavasthāpayatīti
T11arhebt_u:5933: paraṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ vata bhāvānāṃ sādhyadharmalakṣaṇānāmasvāsthyaṃ vartate /
T11arhebt_u:5934: tathā hi -- yantradvayaniyantritānāṃ nirucchvāsitayā maraṇam eva prāptam iti /
T11arhebt_u:5935: paro bādhā 'vinābhāvayor viṣayabhedād avirodhaṃ darśayann āha -- anyatra sādhyadharmiṇaṃ parihṛtya dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sādhyadharmeṇāvinābhāvī hetur na punaḥ sādhyadharmiṇy eva /
T11arhebt_u:5936: tataḥ [S. 196-7a.] kuto bādhā 'vinābhāvayor virodho 'nyatra bādhayā sādhyadharmābhāvasādhanād anyatra ca hetunā tadbhāvasādhanāt /
T11arhebt_u:5937: tathā caivaṃvidhe saty api avinābhāve bādhāsambhavād abādhitaviṣayatvasya rūpāntarasya sambhava iti /
T11arhebt_u:5938: evaṃvidhāvinābhāvopagame saty apy abādhitaviṣayatvādike rūpantare hetvābhāsās tato
T11arhebt_u:5939: 'pare rūpāntarasambhavina ity āpāditāṃ hetvābhāsatāṃ vivarītuṃ paropahāsapūrvakam
T11arhebt_u:5940: āha -- tat kim ayaṃ sādhyadharmī tapasvī varākaḥ śaḍḍh(ṇḍha)
T11arhebt_u:5941: m udvāhya tasmin sādhyadharmasādhanaśāktivikalaṃ [T. 357b.] hetuṃ pariṇāyya sādhyadharmalakṣaṇaṃ putraṃmṛgayate? /
T11arhebt_u:5942: etad eva vyanakti -- yasya hetor ddharmiṇy asaty api sādhyadharme bhāva iṣyate,
T11arhebt_u:5944: taṃ tathāvidhaṃ sādhyadharmiṇy upadarśya kathaṃ dharmī sādhyadharmavān ity ucyate? /
T11arhebt_u:5945: na hy 'mbhastvasya[730]samudre[731]lavaṇatvenāvinābhave 'pi tadvyatirikte 'mbhasi lavaṇatayā sādhyatveneṣṭe 'mbhastvabhāve 'pi lavaṇatvasiddhir iti /
T11arhebt_u:5946: parasya vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkhyāha -- ata eva ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5947: etad eva vivṛnoti -- syād etad bhavato matam /
T11arhebt_u:5948: yata eva hetur anyathā 'pi sādhyadharmam antareṇāpi dharmiṇi bhaved ambhastvādiṣu tathādarśanāt,
T11arhebt_u:5949: sādhyadharmiparihāreṇa cāvinābhāopagamāt ata eva kāraṇāt pramāṇābhyām abādhitadharmā dharmīty ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:5950: yadi {p. 108.1} pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ sādhyadharmiṇi [s. 196-7b.] hetor viṣayaḥ sādhyadharmo na bādhyate yathā 'mbhastvasya lavaṇatvam,
T11arhebt_u:5953: tato 'nyatrāvinābhāvamātreṇa sādhyasiddher anabhyupagamāt na yathokto doṣa iti /
T11arhebt_u:5954: siddhāntavādy āha -- tat kim idānīṃ [T. 358a.] yadā hetor dharmiṇy avinābhāvitānabhyupagamāt
T11arhebt_u:5955: sādhyasiddher abhāvāt tatsiddhaye rūpāntaram abādhitaviṣayatvam ucyate tadā hetor
T11arhebt_u:5957: kasmāt? abādhayaiva hetum antareṇāpi sādhyasiddheḥ akiñcitkara eva hetuḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5958: tathā hy atra kalpanādvaiyam -- bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvo niyato vā syād? aniyato vā? /
T11arhebt_u:5959: tatra yadi pūrvo vikalpas tadā sādhyābhāvo hi bādhakapramāṇasya vṛttau niyataḥ,
T11arhebt_u:5961: tasmād abādhāyāṃ bādhakapramāṇavṛttyabhāve tanniyatasya sādhyābhāvasyāpy abhāvāt sādhyasiddheḥ bhavaty eveti vyartha eva hetur iti nopanyasanīya eva /
T11arhebt_u:5963: syān matam -- mā bhūd bādhakapramāṇavṛttyabhāve hetoḥ sāmarthyam,
T11arhebt_u:5964: yadā tu sādhyasya bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ dharmiṇi varttate tadā hetoḥ sādhyasādhane
T11arhebt_u:5965: sāmarthyaṃ bhaviṣyatīty ata [S. 198a.] āha -- bādhāyām api iti /
T11arhebt_u:5966: yadi bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ varttate tadā tena sādhyābhāvasya dharmiṇi sādhanāt punar
T11arhebt_u:5967: brahnaṇāpi tadbhāvasya karttum aśakyatvāt kim aṅga 3punaḥ śaṣṭhena hetuneti[732]kutaḥ
T11arhebt_u:5969: ata [T. 358b.] eva hi bhavadbhir abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaram ucyata iti /
T11arhebt_u:5970: atha bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvo na niyataḥ tadabhāve 'pibhāvād iti dvitīyaḥ
T11arhebt_u:5971: pakṣa iṣyate tad apy abādhāyāḥ sāmarthyaviraha iti darśayann āha -- aniyame bādhakapramāṇavṛttau
T11arhebt_u:5973: na ca -- bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt sādhyābhāvasya ca sambhavaḥ iti na sādhyasādhane sāmarthyam abādhāyāḥ satyām api sādhyābhāvasya smbhavād iti tadyogino 'pi hetvābhāsataiveti /
T11arhebt_u:5974: yad uktam -- abādhayaiva sādhyasiddher vyartho hetuḥ iti tatrānyathārtham abādhāyā darśayan hetusāmarthyaṃ pratipādayann āhaparaḥ-- na bādhāyā abhāvo samābādhā 'bhimatā /
T11arhebt_u:5977: sā ca tadanupalabdhiḥ puruṣasya śaktivaikalyāt kvacid deśādau bādhāyā sambhave 'pi syāt /
T11arhebt_u:5979: hetur abhidhānīya iti sa hetuprayogasya viṣayaḥ. tadā hi hetuḥ svasādhyaṃ sādhayan
T11arhebt_u:5981: siddhāntavādy āha -- kiṃ nu vai hetur bādhāyā yā upalabdhis tasyāḥ bibheti na punar
T11arhebt_u:5982: bbādhāyā yena bādhāṃ sambhavantīm apy anādṛtya tadanupalabdhau satyāṃ prayoktavya iṣṭo bhavataḥ /
T11arhebt_u:5983: kadācitparo brūyāt -- kiṃ kariṣyati vidyamānā'pi bādhā tapasvinī,
T11arhebt_u:5985: tasmāt tata eva hetor bhayaṃ tadabhāve hetuḥ prayoktavya evety ata āha -- sa tarhi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5986: evaṃ tarhi paramārthena bādhā kim asti nāstīty etadanapekṣya bādhāyā anupalabdhau satyāṃ prayoktavya iti kākvā pṛcchati /
T11arhebt_u:5987: kadācit paro brūyāt -- uktam evaitat kim arthaṃ pṛccyate?
T11arhebt_u:5990: paro 'navagatābhiprāya āha -- sādhyasiddhyartham iti bādhakapratyayābhāve prāmāṇyasyeṣṭatvāt tataḥ sādhyasiddhir avirūddhaiveti manyate /
T11arhebt_u:5991: siddhāntavādī satyāṃ bādhāyāṃ tadanupalambhe 'pi sādhyasiddhim asambhāvayan pṛcchati sa kiṃkvacid ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:5992: kiṃ [S. 199a.] punar asau hetuḥ satyām api bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayed iti sambhavyate bhavatā yenāsyā bādhāyā abhāva viniścayaṃ prati yatno na
T11arhebt_u:5995: tathā satyām api bādhāyāṃ sādhyasādhanasāmarthyopagame saty abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ na bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:5997: bādhāyām api satyām asya hetoḥ sāmarthyāt sāmarthyopagamāt /
T11arhebt_u:5998: tad dhi hetor lakṣaṇam ucyate yena vinā sādhyaṃ na sādhayed iti /
T11arhebt_u:6000: nābādhitaviṣayatvam ity ata āha -- tathāca ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6001: evaṃ sati bādhāyāḥ sadbhāvasambhave 'pi tām abhyupagamya tadanupalambhamātreṇa hetoḥ prayogaḥ prāptaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6002: yadi hi bādhām abhyupagamya hetuprayogo nābhimataḥ syāt tadā 'nupalambhamātreṇa bādhāyāṃ
T11arhebt_u:6003: saṃśayāt -- satām api keśāñcit kathañcidanupalambhasambhavāt -- saṃśayitasya hetuprayoge
T11arhebt_u:6005: tasmād yo yatsaṃśaye 'pi pravartate sa tasya bhāvapakṣam abhyupetyaiva pravarttate /
T11arhebt_u:6006: tathā ca yathā bādhānupalabdhau tām abhyupagamya hetuḥ prayujyate tathā tadupalabdhāv api prayujyatām,
T11arhebt_u:6007: bādhāyāḥ sadbhāvābhyupagame sati tadupalambhānupalambhayor viśeṣābhāvād iti nānupalabhyamānabādhatvam
T11arhebt_u:6008: api [S. 199b.] hetulakṣaṇaṃ yujyata iti kuto bādhakapratyayavirahe 'py asati pratibandhe
T11arhebt_u:6010: parasya vacanāvakāśam āśaṅkhyāha -- na bādhāyām ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6011: naiva hi bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyam iṣyate tat kathaṃ tadupalambhe 'pi prayogaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt_u:6012: siddhāntavādy āha -- yady evaṃ bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ hetur asamartho yadīṣyate tadā 'nirṇīto adhāyā asaṃbhavo yasya hetoḥ sa tathāvidhaḥ prayogaṃbādhā 'nupalambhamātreṇa nārhati /
T11arhebt_u:6014: mā bhūd bādhāyāḥ sambhasvapakṣe prayuktasyāpi hetoḥ sādhyasiddhau 1asāmarthyam iti[733]/
T11arhebt_u:6016: avaśyam arthānām asattvād dhetoḥ sāmathyam iti cen manyase siddhāntavādy āha -- kim
T11arhebt_u:6023: , yato hetor bbādhāyāḥ sambhavakṛtam asāmarthyaṃ na sambhaved iti /
T11arhebt_u:6025: [S. 200a.] pramāṇatayopagatasyāpy udayakāle 'nupalabdhabādhasya {p. 211.1} kālāntareṇa bādhakapratyayotpāde saty aprāmāṇyopagamāt /
T11arhebt_u:6028: iti anenaiva nyāyena jñānanivṛttyā bādhānivṛtter ity āha -- tathāpi vyartho hetuḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6033: tathā hi -- yatra bādhāyā anupalambhas tatra paramārthata eva sā na vidyata iti manyase /
T11arhebt_u:6036: anyathā paramārthena bādhāyā abhāvāyogāt. tataś ca sādhyadharmasyābhāvābhāve sati bhāva iti bhavanmatya sādhyapratīter vyarthatā hetor iti.
T11arhebt_u:6037: atha mā bhūd yuktivirodha iti nopalambhanivṛttau bādhānivṛttir iṣyate,
T11arhebt_u:6038: tatrāha -- upalambhasya nivṛttāv api satyāṃ bādhāyā anivṛttāv iṣyamāṇāyāṃ tadavasthaṃ
T11arhebt_u:6039: hetor asāmarthyam yadavasthaṃ bādhopalambha iti hetor aprayoga iti kasyābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ
T11arhebt_u:6041: etad evopasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt svasādhya ityādi. yata evaṃ vyāptya hetoḥ sarvatra
T11arhebt_u:6044: ca bhavan hetur dharmiṇi kiñcit sādhyaṃ na bhāvayati na sādhayati na vibhāvayati
T11arhebt_u:6045: tadviparītaṃ na niṣedhayati iti tasya vidhipratiṣedhāvakurvata upakṣepaḥ prayogo
T11arhebt_u:6046: na samarthaḥ ity avaśyaṃ hetuprayogam icchatā svasādhyāvinābhāvaḥ sarvatra hetor abhyupagantavyaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6049: tasmiṃś cābhyupagate bādhāvinābhāvayor virodhaḥ [T. 361a.] siddha ity upasaṃharann āha -- tan na ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6050: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇenābādhā rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:6051: yadi nāma bādhāvinābhāvayoḥ sahāvasthānābhāvād avinābhāve {p. 212.1} saty abādhā gamyate rūpāntaraṃ tu kim iti na bhavati?
T11arhebt_u:6052: iti, ata āha -- tan nāma ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6053: tad dhi tasmād viśeṣaṇāntaraṃ bhaved vastusthitayā /
T11arhebt_u:6054: [S. 201a.] lakṣaṇakāraiś ca rūpāntaratvenopādānam arhati yasya viśeṣaṇasya bhave 'pi yasyāparasyābhāvaḥ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:6055: yataḥ svabhāve vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇaviśeśyabhāvo na sambhava eva kevale /
T11arhebt_u:6057: saty api hi śrāvaṇatvādeḥ sapakṣe bhāvo nāsti /
T11arhebt_u:6058: saty api ca cākśuṣatvādeḥ sapakṣe bhāve sādhyadharmiṇi śabde sambandho nāsti /
T11arhebt_u:6059: tato 'nyoḥ sambavavyabhicārayor bhāvād viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo lakṣaṇāntaratvena copādānam[737]/
T11arhebt_u:6060: ihā 'py evaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ced āha -- na caitad anantaroditam abādhāyā avinābhāve sati sambhavati /
T11arhebt_u:6061: saty avinābhāve niyamenābādhāyāḥ sambhavād vyabhicārābhāvāt kuto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo
T11arhebt_u:6063: iti na hetoḥ sādhyāvinābhāvino viruddhasya ca sādhyaviparyayāvinābhāvino viṣaye bādhā sambhavati /
T11arhebt_u:6064: uktena prakāreṇa viparyaye samyagghetur evāviṣaye tu prayogād dhetvābhāsa ucyate /
T11arhebt_u:6065: yata evam iti tasmān na tadabhāvo bādhāvirahaḥ [T. 361b.] pṛthagavinābhāvād anvayavyatirekātmano 'nayor hetuviruddhayor lakṣaṇāntaratvena vācyaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:6067: yataś cāvinābhāve sati bādhā na sambhavati virodhāt,
T11arhebt_u:6068: tasmād dhetor yathoktalakṣaṇasya prayoge sati gamyārthāyā api pratijñāyā doṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣaviruddhādīnāṃ sambhavo nāsti,
T11arhebt_u:6070: tat kathaṃ bādhāviraho heto rūpāntaram ucyate?
T11arhebt_u:6071: asambhavināṃ ca teṣāṃ upavarṇanaṃ niṣphalam 3ity ākūtam[739]/
T11arhebt_u:6074: hetuprayoge hy asati kevalā pratijñaiva na prayujyate,
T11arhebt_u:6076: tataś caśāstrakārair na pratijñādoṣāḥ pratyakṣaviruddhādayo vācyā iti /
T11arhebt_u:6077: diṅnāgapādais tu {p. 213.1} sādhyāsādhyaviparyayeṇa[740]vipratipattidarśanād aprayogārhasyāpi pakṣasya lakṣaṇavidhāne nyāyaprāptam evāpakṣatva na ni(-tvaṃ ni)
T11arhebt_u:6082: tad evam abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ nirākṛtya rūpāntaraṃ nirākurvann āha -- etena avinābhāve
T11arhebt_u:6085: paraḥpṛcchati -- katham iti kena prakāreṇa -- yathā bādhāvinābhāvayoḥ sahānavasthānaṃ tathā pratihetvavinābhāvayor api?
T11arhebt_u:6092: atraiva dharmiṇi sa tallakṣaṇa eko bhavati tatraiva dharmiṇi tasmād anyo 'pi pratihetur viruddhastena hetulakṣaṇayuktaḥ kathaṃ bhavati? /
T11arhebt_u:6093: ekasya 3hetor yat sādhyaṃ[742]tadbādhakasya tadviruddhasyāparasya dharmasya bhāva
T11arhebt_u:6094: eva nābhāve bhāvād avinābhāvād iti bādhayā samānaṃ bādhāsambhavena samānaḥ pratihetur
T11arhebt_u:6096: atraiva dūṣaṇāntaram abhidhātuṃ vikalpayann āha -- api ca ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6097: `vastutaḥ` paramārthato yasya pratihetur na sambhavati -- kim asau samyagjñānasya
T11arhebt_u:6098: viparyayasya vopanyastasādhyaviparītajñānasya vā hetur iṣṭo [T. 362b.] yato vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ tallakṣaṇam ucyate,
T11arhebt_u:6099: āhosvid yasya pratihetus tatsādhyaviparītasādhako na pradarśitaḥ paramārthataḥ sann apīti /
T11arhebt_u:6100: paro doṣam apaśyann āha -- kiñcataḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6101: yadi nāma pūrvo vikalpa uttaro vā tataḥ ko doṣaḥ? iti[743]/
T11arhebt_u:6102: {p. 214.1} siddhāntavādy āha -- yady asambhavan pratihetur yasya sa samyagjñānādihetur iṣyate,
T11arhebt_u:6104: kasmāt? aśakyo niścayo yasya vastuto 'sambhavat pratihetutvasya sa tathoktaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6106: paro hi darśanādarśanābhyām asaty api pratibandhe 'vinābhāvam icchati /
T11arhebt_u:6107: paro hi darśanādarśanābhyām asaty api pratibandhe 'vinābhāvam icchati /
T11arhebt_u:6109: sa cānupalabhyamāno 'pi kadācit syād iti vastutas tadabhāvo niścīyate /
T11arhebt_u:6110: pratibandhanibandhanāvinābhāvavādināṃ tv asmākaṃ [S. 203a.] pratihetvasambhavaḥ suniścita eva /
T11arhebt_u:6111: na hi tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇe pratibandhe pramāṇataḥ siddhe tannimittāvinābhāvitayā
T11arhebt_u:6112: ekena hetuna svasādhye sādhite punas tatraiva dharmiṇi tallakṣaṇasya [T. 363a.] tadviruddhārthasādhakasya
T11arhebt_u:6116: svasādhyāvinābhāvinaḥ prathamasya tatra pramāṇato bhāvasiddhyayogād iti /
T11arhebt_u:6117: syān matam -- yadi nāma prastutaḥ pratihetvasambhavo 'smābhir niścetum aśakyas tathāpy asambhavat pratihetutvaṃ vivakṣittaikasaṃkhyatvapratipāditaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ kasmān na bhavati?
T11arhebt_u:6118: ity āha -- na hy aniścitātmanaḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6119: pratipādako yo dharmo hetos tasyāniścitasvabhāvasya yasmāt tallakṣaṇatvaṃ pratipādakadharmatā na bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:6121: nāpi sandigdhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa hetur bhavatīti na kaściddhetur bhaved iti hetvabhāvo [S. 203b.] vā ity asya samarthanam /
T11arhebt_u:6122: tataś ca hetvābhāsās tato 'pi ity atrāpi yojitam iti /
T11arhebt_u:6123: syān matam -- yasya pratiyogī dṛśyate tasyaiva pratihetubhāvāt ahetutvaṃ bhavatu,
T11arhebt_u:6124: yasya tu pratiyogī hetur na dṛśyate sa vastuta evāsambhavat pratihetuḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6125: na hi tatra vastutaḥ pratihetusambhavaḥ śaṅkyate,
T11arhebt_u:6126: bādhakapratyayam antareṇa bādhāśaṅkāyā ayogāt / tad uktam --
T11arhebt_u:6128: {p. 215.1} ata āha -- tulye lakṣaṇe hi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6130: tasmin dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyoginaḥ [T. 363b.] pratihetor bbādhakasya sambhava sa yeśām api
T11arhebt_u:6131: tattulyalakṣaṇānāṃ pratiyogī na dṛśyate teṣv api śaṅkāṃ pratihetusambhavaviṣayām utpādayati /
T11arhebt_u:6136: puruṣaśaktivaikalyādinā tu tadadarśanaṃ[744]sambhāvyeteti kim ucyate `nāśaṅkā niḥpra(ṣpra)māṇikā` iti /
T11arhebt_u:6137: atha viśeṣaḥ pratibandhalakṣaṇo 'vinābhāvaniścāyako dṛṣṭapratihetor adṛṣṭapratiyogina iṣyate yataḥ pratiyogisambhavāśaṅkā 'stam upaiti /
T11arhebt_u:6138: [S. 204a.] tadā sati vā viśeṣe sa viśeṣo hetor lakṣaṇam /
T11arhebt_u:6140: yatas tato viśeṣād dhetur ekāntena niścayena nirastapratipakṣas tathāvidhe dharmiṇi pratihetvasambhavāt
T11arhebt_u:6142: yas tathāvidho na bhavati tadviśeṣavirahāt dṛṣṭapratihetuḥ so 'tallakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:6143: tathā ca yadi nāmā 'hetau pratihetur dṛṣṭo,
T11arhebt_u:6146: yathoktāvinābhāvavacanenaiva tannivṛtter ity āha -- tathāca hetau tadviśeṣayogini pratihetvasambhave sati vyarthā niṣprayojanam ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣeti
T11arhebt_u:6147: [T. 364a.] yathoktaviśeṣāṅgīkaraṇe tallakṣaṇasya pratihetor asambhavāt kasyaikasaṃkhyāvivakṣayā vyavacchedaḥ kriyate?
T11arhebt_u:6149: viruddhāvyabhicāriṇaś ca hetvābhāsasya vyavacchedārtham ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā hetulakṣaṇe kriyate /
T11arhebt_u:6150: vastuto 'sambhavat pratihetutvasiddhye ca pratibandhalakṣaṇe viśeṣe hetāv iṣyamāṇe viruddhāvyabhicāry api hetvābhāso na [S. 204b.] bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:6152: iti darśayann āha -- ataḥ pratibandhalakṣaṇaviśeṣopagamāt viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo hetvābhāsasya yallakṣaṇaṃtad dhīyeta na sambhavet /
T11arhebt_u:6155: hetor yadātmīyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tadyuktayor hetvor {p. 216.1}ekatra dharmiṇi virodhena
T11arhebt_u:6157: na ca tat pratibandhāṅgīkaraṇe sati sambhavati /
T11arhebt_u:6158: na hi tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ svasādhyapratibandhavaty ekatra hetau kvaciddharmiṇi saṃbhavati dvitīyas tallakṣaṇas tatraiva hetuḥ sambhavet,
T11arhebt_u:6161: tadavyabhicāriṇo hetor dvitīyasya tatra kutaḥ sambhavāvakāśa iti /
T11arhebt_u:6162: nanu yadi tathāvidhaviśeṣasambhave [S. 205a.] sati viruddhāvyabhicārilakṣaṇaṃ hīyate,
T11arhebt_u:6165: tat kim uktaṃ hetvabhāvo vety ata āha -- na ca naiva tasya viśeṣasya pratibandhalakṣaṇasya,
T11arhebt_u:6167: svarūpaṃ tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇaṃ nirddeśyate bhavadbhiḥ yathā 'smābhir nirdiṣṭaṃ ydrūpaṃ pratītya pratipadya pratiyoginaḥ sambhavāsambhavāu utpaśyāmaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6168: yatra sa viśeṣo nāsti tatra pratiyoginaḥ sambhavaḥ kalpita āgamāśraye 'numāne /
T11arhebt_u:6169: yatra tv asti sa viśeṣo vastubalapravṛtte 'numāne tatra pratiyogino 'sambhava iti
T11arhebt_u:6170: yata evaṃ tasmān nāsty eva bhavatāṃ sa viśeṣaḥ -- bhavadbhir na jñāyata eva sa viśeṣa
T11arhebt_u:6171: 1iti -- tasmāt[745]sarvatra yatrāpi pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatrāpi ṣāṅkyā pratiyogiviṣayayā bhavitavyam /
T11arhebt_u:6174: yasyāpi [S. 205b.] hi pratihetur dṛṣṭas tasyāpi prāk pratiyogidarśanād itareṇa sarvakālam
T11arhebt_u:6175: adṛṣṭapratiyoginā kaścid viśeṣo lakṣyate [T. 365a.] yaddarśanāj jñāyeta `atra pratiyogī
T11arhebt_u:6176: sambhavati nyānyatra` iti darśanādarśanamātranibandhanayor anvayavyatirekayoḥ sarvatra samānatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:6177: tathāpi paścāt tatra pratiyogī dṛṣṭa iti sarvatra tattulyalakṣaṇe pratiyogisadbhāvaśaṅkā na vivarttata iti /
T11arhebt_u:6178: syān matam -- yeṣu pratiyogī sambhavati teṣvaśyam eva kadācid asāv upalabhyate /
T11arhebt_u:6179: yeṣu tu puruṣāyuṣeṇāpi nopalabhyate trṣv asau {p. 217.1} nāsty eva /
T11arhebt_u:6182: ity ata āha -- na ca ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6183: yeṣām api hi pratihetuḥ sambhavati teṣām api naiva sarvadā tasya pratihetor upalabdhiḥ pratipattṛṛṇām /
T11arhebt_u:6184: na hy asarvadarśinām upalabdhiḥ sarvabhāvasattāṃ vyāpnoti,
T11arhebt_u:6187: pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatra tadāśaṅkā [S. 206a.] kathaṃ kriyate? / tathā cāha --
T11arhebt_u:6191: tenaiva prajñātiśayaśāktinā pratihetava utprekṣitāḥ tatas taddarśanāt yāvaj jīvaṃ adṛṣṭapratihetuṣv api tadāśaṅkā nivarttate /
T11arhebt_u:6193: tulyalakṣaṇe hi ityādikam api pratiyogisambhavāśaṅkākāraṇam uktam eva /
T11arhebt_u:6194: na ca pratiyogisambhavam āśaṅkamānas tannimittasaṃbhavāt `utprekṣeta hi` ityādyākrośamātrea nivarttayituṃ śakyate /
T11arhebt_u:6196: abhihitaṃ `svabhāvahetor viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavaśād ātmyaniścaye saty anvayavyatirekayos tatra nirṇaya;
T11arhebt_u:6197: [S. 206b.] kāryahetau ca yathoktapratyakṣānupalambhataḥ kāryakāraṇasiddhes tanniścaya` iti /
T11arhebt_u:6198: yata evaṃ sarvatra pratiyogyāśaṅkā na nivarttate bhavad darśane tena kāraṇāniścayaḥ pratiyoginaḥ sambhavayoḥ `iha pratiyogī sambhavati iha tu na sambhavati` ity evaṃrūpa 4iti
T11arhebt_u:6199: -- tasmād[748]vastuto 'sambhavat pratihetutvaṃ {p. 218.1} yallakṣaṇam hetoḥ [T. 366a.] tasyāniścitatvād ekasaṃkhyāvivakśāv ādināṃ na kaściddhetuḥ syāt /
T11arhebt_u:6200: na hy aniścitalakṣaṇo hetur bhavatīty upasaṃhāra iti /
T11arhebt_u:6201: tad evaṃ `kiṃ yo vastuto 'sambhavatpratihetuḥ sa samyagjñānaviparyayahetur iṣṭaḥ`
T11arhebt_u:6202: iti amuṃ vikalpaṃ nirākṛtya dvitīyaṃ vikalpaṃ nirācikīrṣur āha -- athāpradarśitapratihetuḥ
T11arhebt_u:6204: ayaṃ ca pakṣaḥ kiladiṅnāgācāryasyāpy abhimata iti para upadarśayann āha -- yathāha diṅnāgācāryaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6206: śrāvaṇatvasya hi na kathañcidvyavacchedahetutvam iti diṅnāgācāryeṇokte pareṇābhihitam
T11arhebt_u:6208: nityaḥśabdaḥśrāvaṇatvātśabdatvavat ity evaṃ pareṇokte satyācāryeṇoktam -- yady atraśabdākhye
T11arhebt_u:6212: tad evamācāryāpadaiḥ[750]sākṣitve datte mujam utkṣipya śāstrakāraḥ pūtkurvann[751]āha -- 4idam idānīm[752]ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6213: 5yadā hyācāryasyāpy[753]etad abhimatam iti [T. 366b.] kaiścidvyākhyāyate tadidaṃ[754]sumahadvyasanam āyatam -- gurubhir abhihitatvād aprakāśyam,
T11arhebt_u:6214: na hi gurūṇāṃ doṣaḥ prakāśayituṃ yuktaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:6216: tat kiṃ gurūn[755]dūṣayāma uta 8nyāyam apy upekṣāmahe[756]ity 9ubhayam apy aśakyam[757]iti kaṣṭataraṃvyasanaṃkatham nirvoḍhuṃśakyeta? /
T11arhebt_u:6218: kaḥ punar atra doṣo yenedaṃ kaṣṭataram ity āha -- sa tāvad ayaṃ śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇo
T11arhebt_u:6219: hetur vastuni śabdādīni 10svasādhyaṃ tattvam[758]nityatvaṃ tatprakṛtīni tadātmakāni
T11arhebt_u:6221: puruṣāṇāṃmīmāṃsakavaiyākaraṇadīnāṃ tān {p. 219.1} abhyudayena svarggeṇa niḥśreyasena cāpavarggeṇa yojayitvā /
T11arhebt_u:6222: tathā hi -- vastutattvaṃ yāvan kleśān na prajahāti tāvat svargamāsādayati,
T11arhebt_u:6224: athavā śabdanityatvapratītau vedaprāmāṇyāt tadvahitāgnihotrānuṣṭhānāt[759]svarggo vedāntaniṣevaṇād apavarggaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6225: punar uttarakālaṃ pratibhāvatā[760] prajñājātīyenavaiśeṣikādinā puruṣeṇa hetvantarasya[761]
T11arhebt_u:6226: [T. 367a.] pratihetoḥ nidarśanena yad asya nityatvasādhanasāmarthya pratihetvanupadarśane[762]satyāsīt
T11arhebt_u:6229: tāṃś ca tatpramāṇakān[764]puruṣān svarggāpavarggasampadaḥ pracyāvya śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇo hetuḥ śaktivaikalyāt paritrātum aśakto bhraṣṭarājya iva rājā tapovanaṃ gacchati
T11arhebt_u:6230: svair eva duścaritair[765]iti kim atra vayaṃ brūmaḥ? /
T11arhebt_u:6231: tad evam upahasyaitasmin pakṣe [S. 208a.] doṣam upadarśayann āha -- puruṣapratibhā ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6232: yadā hy apradarśitapratihetur hetur iṣyate tadā puruṣapratibhākṛtaṃ sādhanatvam abhyupagataṃ bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:6233: tataś ca vastuto na kiñcit sādhanam asādhanaṃ vā prāptam /
T11arhebt_u:6234: tathā hi -- yadā pratihetur nopadarśyate tadā sādhanam,
T11arhebt_u:6235: yadā tūpadarśyate tadā na sādhanam iti puruṣapratibhākṛtaṃ sādhanatvam āyātam iti /
T11arhebt_u:6236: api ca -- apradarśitapratihetor hetor hetutve 'ṅgīkriyamāṇe vikalpadvayam -- kiṃ paramārthato hetus taddharmabhāvī,
T11arhebt_u:6238: tatrādyaṃ vikalpam adhikṛtyāha -- sa ca hetur yo 'sau prathamaṃ upādīyate /
T11arhebt_u:6239: sa yadi svabhāvataḥ eva tasmin sādhyadharme satyeva bhavati ity evaṃśīlo 'smad upavarṇitapratibandhopagamāt
T11arhebt_u:6240: [T. 367b.] yadīṣyate tadākatham anyathākriyeta hetvantareṇātaddharmabhāvī kathaṃ kriyate? /
T11arhebt_u:6243: vastūnāṃ [S. 208b.] hetulakṣaṇānāṃ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ -- `saty eva sādhyadharme bhavanātmakaḥ`
T11arhebt_u:6244: -- tadanyathābhāvasya tadviparyayasya abhāvād ubhayoś ca svasādhyadharmāvinābhāvitve
T11arhebt_u:6245: {p. 220.1} svabhāvata eva dharmiṇy ekatra tayor bhāve viruddāv ubhau svabhāvāv ekasya syātām /
T11arhebt_u:6249: asaty api sādhyadharme bhavanaśīlaḥ pratibandhānabhyupagamāt katham anyadā'pi apradarśitapratihetvavasthāyām api sādhanaṃkasyacit? /
T11arhebt_u:6253: yata evaṃ bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo 'nyathā kartuṃ na śakyate,
T11arhebt_u:6254: viruddhobhayasvabhāvaś caiko na sambhavati tasmāt paramārthataḥ svena svena [S. 209.1a.]
T11arhebt_u:6256: kāryasvabhāvalakṣaṇasya pratihetor asambhavād alakṣaṇam ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ
T11arhebt_u:6261: sa ca pratihetuḥ svalakṣaṇayuktayoḥ kāryasvabhāvayor na bhavaty eveti kathaṃ taddhetulakṣaṇaṃ syād iti /
T11arhebt_u:6262: tad evam anayor dvayo rūpayor yaḥ sambhavo yathoktāvinābhāvā 'sambhave satīti rūpāntaropagame 'pi hetvābhāsataiveti hetvābhāsās tato 'para iti ity asyārtho vivṛta iti /
T11arhebt_u:6264: abādhitaviṣayatvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ ca kāryasvabhāvahetvor evāvinābhāve sati
T11arhebt_u:6265: bādhāpratihetvor asambhavāt vyavacchedyābhāvatvena saty api liṅgadharmatve tallakṣaṇaṃ
T11arhebt_u:6272: na ca tat liṅgasyātmarūpam iti [T. 368b.] kathaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati? /
T11arhebt_u:6273: yady api vikalpapratibhāsī sāmanyākāro liṅgatayā 'vasthāpyate tathāpi na jñānasya liṅgadharmatā /
T11arhebt_u:6274: na hy asau svatantra eva liṅgam /
T11arhebt_u:6275: yad āha -- vikalpabhedāna {p. 221.1} svatantrāṇām anvarthāśrayaṇāt tatkalpitaviṣayāda[766]'rthapratipattāv[767] anarthapratilambha eva syāt iti /
T11arhebt_u:6278: vastudarśanahāneḥ[768]svalakṣaṇasya kvacidananvayāc ca taddharmatām eva tv anusmaranto
T11arhebt_u:6279: vikalpā nānaikavyatirekān[769]saṃdarśayanto vastuni paramparayā pratibandhād avisaṃvādakāḥ
T11arhebt_u:6281: na ca tasya kāryāder ātmarūpaṃ [S. 209.2a.] jñātam /
T11arhebt_u:6285: yasmād abāhyāsyāpi bāhyatayā vyavasitasyānanuyāyino 'py anuyāyitayā sāmānyāmakatvaṃ tathātve cāsya vikalparūpatayā kutaḥ? yadā ''ha --
T11arhebt_u:6290: etad eva sādhayann āha -- kiṃrūpād ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6291: kim ātmakāt hetor anumeyo 'rtho jñātavyaḥ iti cintāyāṃ prakṛtāyāṃ pratipattuḥ puṃso
T11arhebt_u:6292: yad avisaṃvādakaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya svarūpam abhidhīyate śāstrakāraiḥ [T. 369a.] yasya
T11arhebt_u:6293: rūpasya darśanādayaṃ pratipattā ôyatra tadrūpasambhavaḥ tat sādhanam tadrūpavikalam
T11arhebt_u:6294: asādhanamô iti pravibhāgena vyavasthāpya yat tatra sādhanatvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyeṣṭārthasannidhānasampratyayāt
T11arhebt_u:6296: tathā, etasmiṃś ca nyāye [S. 209.2b.] vyavasthite yad asya liṅgasyātmarūpaṃ tal lakṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati pakṣadharmādivat na tu yat pararūpam
T11arhebt_u:6297: syād etad -- jñātasya liṅgasya sādhakatvād yuktaiva sādhyasiddhyupayogino jñānasya liṅgalakṣaṇatety ata āha -- pratipattijanmani ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6298: yady anumeyapratītijanmany upayujyate jñānam iti tanmātreṇa liṅgasya lakṣaṇam iṣyate tadā 'tiprasaṅgaḥ prāpnoti /
T11arhebt_u:6299: tam evāha -- evaṃpratipattijanmany upayogamātrāl liṅgalakṣaṇatve prameyasya arthasya
T11arhebt_u:6300: puruṣasya {p. 222.1} pramātuḥ adi śabdāt saṃyogasamavāyādīnām ālokamanaskārādīnāṃ
T11arhebt_u:6302: atra kāraṇam āha -- na hi teṣv api prameyādiṣu asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā /
T11arhebt_u:6303: atra paro 'niṣṭam āpādayann āha -- niścitagrahaṇaṃtarhi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6304: yadi pararūpatvāj jñānaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati tadā ca yad etadācāryeṇa --
T11arhebt_u:6307: niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavataś cābhimataṃ [T. 369b.] tan na karttavyam /
T11arhebt_u:6308: tathā hi -- niścayo hi liṅgasya pararūpam eva /
T11arhebt_u:6310: jñānaṃ kim iti neśyate yato niścayo vijñānam eva tadviśeṣatvād asyeti /
T11arhebt_u:6311: siddhāntavāy āha -- na na karttavyaṃ kintu kartavyam eva tasya [S. 210a.] niścitagrahaṇasya liṅgarūpapratipādanād anyārthatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:6312: tām evānyārthatāṃ darśayann āha -- sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6313: pare hi sapakṣe darśanamātreṇāsapakṣe cādarśanamātrato gamakaṃ hetum icchanti /
T11arhebt_u:6314: teṣāṃ naiva darśanamātreṇa sādhyasiddhau samartho hetur bhavatīti jñāpanārthaṃ niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
T11arhebt_u:6315: yataḥ sator vidyamānayor api darśanādarśanayor agamakatvaṃ hetor dṛśyate `sa śyamaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:6317: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇena sapakṣe bhāvena vipakṣe sarvatrābhāvaviśiṣṭenā 'sapakṣe ca
T11arhebt_u:6318: sarvatrābhāvena sapakṣe tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇabhāvaviśiṣṭena gamako hetur ity
T11arhebt_u:6319: asyārthasya jñāpanārthaṃ lakṣaṇavākye niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ boddhavyam /
T11arhebt_u:6320: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yāv eva sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau pratibandhasādhakapramāṇavṛttyā niścitau tābhyām
T11arhebt_u:6322: na tu yathākathañciddarśanamātreṇety asyārthasya [S. 210b.] jñāpanāya niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam iti /
T11arhebt_u:6324: yena viśiṣṭayor bhāvābhāvayor eva khyāpanāya niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam,
T11arhebt_u:6327: tena pararūpaṃ liṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
T11arhebt_u:6328: yataḥ tena jñānādinā pararūpeṇa liṅgasya na kiñcid rūpaviśeṣo 'bhidhīyata iti /
T11arhebt_u:6329: {p. 223.1} nanu ca pare 'pi sapakṣavipakṣayor bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ gamakaṃ hetum icchanti,
T11arhebt_u:6332: iti, ata āha -- tau hi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6333: yady api pare bhāvābhāvābhyām eva gamakaṃ hetum icchanti tathāpi sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eveti bhāvābhāvau darśanādarśanamātrato vyavasthāpayanti /
T11arhebt_u:6334: na ca tatas tau tathāvidhāu sidhyataḥ,
T11arhebt_u:6335: pratibandhavikalānām apy athānāṃ kvacid bhāvābhāvayoḥ kathañciddarśanādarśanasambhavāt /
T11arhebt_u:6336: tasmād [S. 211a.] yau `hetoḥ sapakṣe eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` ity evam ātmakau
T11arhebt_u:6337: bhāvābhāvau tau tadbhāvasya sādhakaṃ yat pramāṇaṇ tādātmyatadutpattisādhanaviṣayaṃ
T11arhebt_u:6340: tadanabhyupagame hi hetoḥ sapakṣa eva bhāvaḥ sarveśāṃ hetumatāṃ bhāvānāṃ sādhyenānugamadarśane sati vipakṣe cābhāva eva sādhyavikalānāṃ sarvārthānāṃ
T11arhebt_u:6343: yata upayāntaraṃ nāsti tena kāraṇena tayor viśiṣṭayor bhāvābhāvayoḥ pratipādanāya niścitaśabdaḥ prayukto lakṣāṇe lakṣaṇakāeṇeti /
T11arhebt_u:6344: nanu ca bhāvābhāvavacanamātrād eva pramāṇato niścayo labhyate anyathā tayor eva sattā na prasidhyed iti,
T11arhebt_u:6347: ity anenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ [T. 370b.] bhāvābhāvavacanamātreṇa niścitagrahaṇanirapekṣeṇa tayor bhāvābhāvayor yat sādhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasya vṛttir yady apy ākṣipyate /
T11arhebt_u:6348: kathaṃ punar niścitagrahaṇam antareṇa bhāvābhāvavacanamātratas tadvṛtteḥ ākṣepaḥ?
T11arhebt_u:6349: ity āha -- anyathā yadi tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttir nākṣipyeta,
T11arhebt_u:6350: [S. 211b.] tadā tayor eva sapakṣavipakṣayor eva bhāvābhāvayor yā sattā svarūpavyavasthā tasyā aprasiddheḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6352: ity āha -- jñānasya upalabdher yā sattā utpattiḥ tannibandhanatvāj jñeyasya bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇasya sattāvyavasthāyāḥ svarūpavyavasthiteḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6353: na hy upalambham antareṇa svata evārthāḥ {p. 224.1} sidhyanti,
T11arhebt_u:6355: tasmād idam evaṃrūpaṃ naivaṃrūpam iti tadākārajñānodayād eva vyavasthāpyate /
T11arhebt_u:6356: yata evaṃ tasmāt sarvatra śāstre loke vā jñeyasattāvyavasthaiva niścitagrahaṇaṃ vinā 'pi tatsādhanaṃ
T11arhebt_u:6358: kiñ ca, parārthatvāc ca śāstrapraṇayanasya tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttir ākṣipyata iti sambandhaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6359: kīdṛśaṃ punas tacchāstrapraṇayanaṃ yat parārtharūpatayā svavyavasthāpitajñeyasattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇam ākṣipati?
T11arhebt_u:6361: yadi nāmaivaṃrūpaṃ parārthaṃ śāstrapraṇayanaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ tat sādhanapramāṇavṛttim
T11arhebt_u:6362: ākṣipatīty āha -- tadrūpaṃ tasya liṅgasya trirūpasya rūpaṃ svabhāvaṃ śāstroktaṃ ye
T11arhebt_u:6364: na teśāṃ tatas trirūpāl liṅgāc chāstroktād vāñcite 'rthe pravṛttir bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:6366: yata evam iti tasmāt paropalakṣaṇatvād eva pareṣāṃ jñāpakatvād eva pravarttake trirūpaliṅge jñānaṃ siddham iti yady api niścitagrahaṇam atiricyate tathāpi tāv eva
T11arhebt_u:6367: liṅgasya sapakṣāsapakṣayor bhāvābhāvau viśiṣṭau śastroktau `sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` ity evaṃrūpau kecinnaiyāyika prabhṛtayaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:6368: pare darśanādarśanamātreṇa -- ye darśanādarśane pratibandhasādhake na bhavataḥ --
T11arhebt_u:6369: tanmātreṇa vyavasthāpayanti yata eva[770] iti tasmāt teṣāṃ vādināṃ niśedhārtho 'yaṃ
T11arhebt_u:6371: yadi tu paravipratipattiḥ na syāt tadā naivāsau prayujyeteti /
T11arhebt_u:6372: kim iti punar darśanādarśanābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvaviśayābhyāṃ sapakṣā[sa]pakśayoḥ viśiṣṭau
T11arhebt_u:6373: bhāvābhāvāv anvayavyatirekātmakau [T. 371b.] neṣyeta ity āha -- sator api ityādi
