T11arhebt_u:6374: saty api kvacit sapakṣe bhāvadarśane hetoḥ kvacic cāsapakṣe 'bhāvadarśane `sa śyamaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:6376: tathā hi -- anvayo nāma sarvatra saty eva sādhye hetor {p. 225.1} bhāvo vyāptyā cāsati sādhye hetor abhāvo vyatirekaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6377: na ca kvacit sati sādhye [S. 212b.] hetor bhāvadarśane 'pi tanmātreṇa tathābhāvaḥ sarvatra bhavati,
T11arhebt_u:6379: tathā kvacit sādhyābhimatasyābhāve saty abhāvadarśane 'pi hetoḥ sarvatra tadabhāve 'vaśyam abhāvaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:6381: tasmāt pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva yathoktau sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau sidhyataḥ nānyatheti vipratipattinirāsārtham eva niścitagrahaṇaṃ
T11arhebt_u:6382: kṛtam ity upadarśayann āha -- tasmāt ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6383: asmābhiḥ ityācāryakṛte niścitagrahaṇe 'nyatrāsmākam abhimatatvāt asmābhiḥ ity āha /
T11arhebt_u:6385: asatyāṃ tu vipratipattau tan na kartavyam eveti pratipādya ata eva nyāyāt jñātatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ na bhāvatīti [T. 372a.] darśayann āha -- yato 'pi ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6388: tenaiva trairūpyavacanenaiva tatsādhanapramāṇākṣepataḥ avagatatvāt pratipannatvād iti /
T11arhebt_u:6390: yathā pakṣadharmatvavacanenaiva hetor upanayasyārtho 'vagatas tasya dharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvapradarśanātmakatvāt,
T11arhebt_u:6391: pakṣadharmavacanasya ca tadrūpatvāt tataḥ pṛthagupanayo [S. 213a.] rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati;
T11arhebt_u:6394: atra paro 'niṣṭam āpādayann āha -- anvayavyatirekayor api ityādi /
T11arhebt_u:6395: yadi trairūpyavacanenaiva sāmarthyāj jñānaṃ labhyata iti tat tataḥ pṛthag na vaktavyam hanta tarhi anvayāt pṛthag vyatireko na vaktavyaḥ vyatirekāc ca pṛthaganvayaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6397: ekasyānvayasya vyatirekasya vā prayogād ubhayasya gateḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6399: tathā jñātatvasyāpi trairūpyād gamyamānasyāpi pṛthagvacanaṃ karttavyam iti /
T11arhebt_u:6403: tathā hi -- anvayo hetoḥ {p. 226.1} sapakṣe bhāva ucyate,
T11arhebt_u:6405: na ca tau parasparam ākṣipataḥ [T. 372b.] parasparam antarbhavato vidhipratiṣedharūpayor bhinnasvabhāvatvāt /
T11arhebt_u:6406: na ca yo yato bhinnasvabhāvaḥ sa tatrāntarbhūto yuktaḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6407: nanu ca yady anvayavyatirekayor bhinnarūpatā kathaṃ tarhi trairūpaṃ liṅgam ucyate? /
T11arhebt_u:6408: na hi parasparabhinnāv ātmānāv evāsya yujyate,
T11arhebt_u:6411: yato yathā 'nvayavyatirekau [S. 213b.] vyavasthāpyete na vā nayo(-pyete tathā tayo)
T11arhebt_u:6416: vyāvṛttibhede 'pi ca paramārthato bhedo nāstīty ekaṃ liṅgaṃ trirūpam ity ucyata iti /
T11arhebt_u:6417: kathaṃ tarhi prāguktam[771]`nānayor arthaḥ kaścid bhedaḥ,
T11arhebt_u:6420: anvayamukhena vyatirekamukheṇa vā prayuktam ekaṃ vākyam ubhayam anvayaṃ vyatirekaṃ ca bhinnalakṣaṇam eva gamayatīty ucyate 'smābhir naiko 'rthaḥ svabhāvo dvitīyasyocyate,
T11arhebt_u:6424: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- lakṣaṇavākyapratipāditāv anvayavyatirekāv āśritya parasparāntarbhāvaścodyate /
T11arhebt_u:6426: tathā hi -- `tatraiva bhāvaḥ` ity atra lakṣaṇavākye tadarthatayā[773]tadabhāve 'bhāvo gamyate;
T11arhebt_u:6429: pratibandhaś ca tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ tadbhāve bhāvarūpa eva /
T11arhebt_u:6430: tataś caikenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣyor bhāvābhāvapratipādakena [S. 214a.] prativiśiṣṭena lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagater dvitīyavacanaṃ na karttavyam iti
T11arhebt_u:6432: tataś ca yaduktam `anvayavyatirekayor api tarhi na pṛthaktvam iti` tat tadavastham eveti /
T11arhebt_u:6433: {p. 227.1} siddhāntavādy āha -- vacanam etad `tatraiva bhāvaḥ` ityādirūpam ubhayamākṣipati pratipādayati /
T11arhebt_u:6436: niyamas vyāpakasya `sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva` iti sāvadhāraṇasya dvitīyākṣepanāntarīyakatvāt dvitīyapratipādananāntarīyakatvāt
T11arhebt_u:6437: na ca tāvataikavākyapratipādanamātreṇobhayor ekasvabhāvatā bhinnasvabhāvānām apy athānām ekavākyena pratipādanāt /
T11arhebt_u:6438: ekenaiva ca lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagatāv api yat pṛthaabhidhānaṃ tat prayoganiyamārtham /
T11arhebt_u:6441: vaidharmyaprayoge ca sādharmyavacanam iti na punar ekābhidhānenānavagatasya rūpāntarasya pratipādanārtham /
T11arhebt_u:6442: na ca tathā trairūpyavacanena jñānanibandhanena jñeyasattāvyavasthāyāḥ paropalakṣaṇāthena ca śāstrapraṇayanenāśritajñānasyaiva trairūpyasya [S. 214b.] pratipādanāl
T11arhebt_u:6443: labdhasya jñānasya punarvacane na kiñcit prayojanam astīti nāsya pṛthagvacanaṃ yuktam iti /
T11arhebt_u:6444: syānmatam -- kevalāv api tarhy ekavākyārthānantarbhūtau parasparama'bhinnasvabhāvau
T11arhebt_u:6445: bhaviṣyataḥ tata evaikavākyārthāntarbhāvād ity ata āha -- na punaḥkevalau ekavākyārthānapekṣau
T11arhebt_u:6448: nanu ca niyamavantāv api bhāvābhāvau kevalāv eva,
T11arhebt_u:6449: tayoḥ parasparākṣepe kevalayor api tatprasaṅga ity ata āha -- niyamavantau ca sāvadhāraṇavākyapratipāditau na kevalau kintu sahitāv eva /
T11arhebt_u:6452: tad evaṃ sāvadharaṇena [T. 374a.] vākyena naiva kevalo 'nvayo vyatireko vā 'bhidhīyate /
T11arhebt_u:6453: tadantarbhāvāt tu dvitīyagatiḥ kintu parasparānantarbhūtāv eva sahitāv ekena vākyenābhidhīyeta
T11arhebt_u:6454: iti pratipādyopasaṃharann āha -- tasmāt tatraiva [S. 215a.] sapakṣa eva bhāva {p.
T11arhebt_u:6455: 228.1} ity anena vākyena na sapakṣe bhāva evocyate /
T11arhebt_u:6458: tathā cetareṇāpy asapakṣe 'bhāva eveti vacanena nābhāva eva kevala ucyate kintu sapakṣe bhāvo 'pi,
T11arhebt_u:6459: yena kevalavacanena bhāvo 'bhāvo vā tadātmakatayā dvitīyam ākṣiped yato 'nayoḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na syāt /
T11arhebt_u:6460: tasmād yadā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvāv abhipretau tadā tau bhinnarūpāv eveti kathaṃ tayoḥ na pṛthaktvam? /
T11arhebt_u:6461: atha niyamavatā vākyenābhihitau tadaikavākyād evobhayagateḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na karttavyam eva /
T11arhebt_u:6462: tat tu kṛtaṃ nāpratipannapratipattaye kintu prayoganiyamārtham ity uktam etad iti /
T11arhebt_u:6463: syānmatam -- yathā 'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇau na parasparātmakau tataś ca tayoḥ parasparato rūpāntaratvam,
T11arhebt_u:6464: evaṃ paropalakṣaṇaśastrapratipāditāt trailakṣaṇyād bhidyata eva jñānam,
T11arhebt_u:6466: tato rūpāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatīty ata [T. 374b.] āha -- naivam,
T11arhebt_u:6471: trairūpyaviṣayāṃ pratītiṃ kāryante yena śāstreṇa tato yat trailakṣaṇyaṃ pratīyate āgṛhītajñānaṃ tasmād avyatirekād āgṛhītajñāne trailakṣaṇye 'ntarbhāvād iti yāvat,
T11arhebt_u:6472: iti tasmān na lakṣaṇāntaraṃ trairūpyād iti /
T11arhebt_u:6473: tad ayam atra samudāyārthaḥ -- yadi jñātatvaṃ jñānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ uktena prakāreṇa jñānam evocyate tadā talliṃgasyānātmabhūtam iti
T11arhebt_u:6475: athāvi(pi )jñānāpekṣaḥ karmabhāvo jñātatvam ucyate tadā 'pi jñeyasattāvyavasthāyā jñānasattānibandhanatvāt trairūpyavyavasthaiva tatsattāvyavasthāpakaṃ jñānam ākṣipati /
T11arhebt_u:6476: tatas tadapekṣo 'pi karmabhāvo 'nuktasiddha iti na tadvacanaṃ pṛthakkarttavyam /
T11arhebt_u:6478: tad evam abādhitaviṣayatvādikaṃ rūpatrayaṃ nirākṛtya nigamayann āha -- tasmān na hetuḥṣaḍlakṣaṇaḥ/
T11arhebt_u:6486: mā yatata imā yā tadrūpā bala (?)
T11arhebt_u:6491: na guror upadeśam agrahīt bubudhe vastu tato ... ... dhīḥ /
T11arhebt_u:6492: yatato sma na tasya vṛddhaye na parispanditum apy apārayat // [1 //]
T11arhebt_u:6493: jīvātmakaṃ cāndramasaṃ ca tejaḥ kṛtāspadaṃ tasya tai ...t /
